[\[199b.5\]]pa mthong nas legs ldan byed kyis legs bshad gang /_/gcig nas gcig tu brgyud las 'ongs dang bdag gis rnam par phye las rnyed pa gang /_/de dag bsdams [#]te blo chen ldan rnams mgu bar bya phyir yang dag bstan pa yin/_/dpyod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang
[\[199b.6\]]ldan rtog ge 'joms byed blo gsal rnams la tshig gi ni/_/'od zer dag gis 'di na gnas don yang dag ma dkrugs dngos su gsal byed cing /_/'grel pa che [#]gsal 'di yang byed pa'i zla ba grags ldan 'di deng shar ba yis/_/'jig rten rnams kyi yid
[\[199b.7\]]gnyis mun pa stug po dag dang lhan cig sel ba yin/_/lung dang rigs pa la brten 'grel pa bsdebs [#]legs ma dkrugs tshig dang ldan pa 'di/_/blo bzang dad ldan rnams la nges par bsgrub par bya phyir gus par byas nas ni/_/bdag gis
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]bsod nams stong pa nyid ltar yangs par gyur pa gang zhig bsags pa des/_/'jig rten ma lus lta tshogs spangs nas spros kun chad pa'i go 'phang bgrod par shog/_ston pa gau tam dang ni de'i chos la zhugs rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[200a.2\]]mtha' dag dang /_/rgyal ba'i sras po'i tshogs dang de dag gis gsungs chos la phyag 'tshal nas/_/sangs rgyas gsung mtha' yas la blta phyir lus can rnams kyi mig gyur dbu ma ni/_/gang gi [#]thugs rje'i sgo nas mdzad pa'i klu sgrub de la bdag ni phyag
[\[200a.3\]]'tshal lo/_/[#]bstan bcos dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa tshig gsal ba zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba grags pa theg pa mchog la thugs gzhol ba/_mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje mnga' ba/_ri mor bris pa'i ba drus las [#]'o ma bzhos pas
[\[200a.4\]]bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba yongs su rdzogs so/_/gsung rab rgya mtsho bsrubs byung de nyid bdud rtsi'i snod/_/shes rab ces bya snang byed tshig gsal rin chen sgron/_/bsgyur las dge ba gang bsags de yis [#]nyi ma
[\[200a.5\]]grags/_/lta thibs spangs te spros bral mkha' la 'gro bar shog/_kha che'i grong khyer dpe med kyi dbus[#]/_rin chen sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang gi 'dabs su/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rtog ge ba chen po/_ma hA su ma ti'i zhal snga nas dang /_
[\[200a.6\]]bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dang mthun pa ltar bsgyur/_phyis ra sa ra mo che'i gtsug lag khang du kha che'i mkhan po ka Na ka bar ma [#]dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba de nyid kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs kyi dpe dang
[\[200a.7\]]gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//_//[#]khungs rnams ji ltar grags bzhin bris/_/phyin chad skad gnyis 'byung srid na/_/'grel pa sgra don bzhin bsgyur la/_/[#]gzu bor byos la dpyad par rigs//_//[ #]
[\[200b\]]
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]{D3861}]@#/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//[# ]
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]@#/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma d+h+yA ma ka a [#]ba tA ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_dbu ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyan thos sangs rgyas 'bring rnams thub dbang skyes/_/sangs rgyas byang
[\[201b.2\]]chub sems dpa' las 'khrungs shing /_/snying rje'i sems dang gnyis su med blo dang /_/byang chub sems ni rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyu/_/gang phyir brtse nyid rgyal ba'i lo thog phun tshogs 'di'i/_/sa bon dang ni spel la chu 'dra yun ring du/_/longs spyod
[\[201b.3\]]gnas la smin pa lta bur 'dod gyur pa/_/de phyir bdag gis thog mar snying rje bstod par bgyi/_/dang por nga zhes bdag la zhen gyur zhing [#]/_/bdag gi [#]'di zhes dngos la chags bskyed pa/_/zo chun 'phyan ltar rang dbang med pa yi/_/'gro la snying rjer gyur
[\[201b.4\]]gang de la 'dud/_/'gro ba g.yo ba'i chu yi nang gi zla ba ltar/_/g.yo dang rang bzhin nyid kyis stong par mthong ba yi/_/rgyal ba'i sras po 'di yi sems gang 'gro ba rnams/_/rnam par grol bar bya phyir snying rje'i dbang gyur zhing [#]/_/kun tu bzang po'i
[\[201b.5\]]smon pas rab bsngos dga' ba la/_/rab tu gnas pa de ni dang po zhes bya'o/_/de nas bzung ste de ni thob par gyur pa yis/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'i sgra nyid kyis bsnyad do/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs su'ang skyes pa ste/_/'di
[\[201b.6\]]ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum po thams cad spangs pa yin/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni dga' ba mchog tu gyur 'chang zhing /_/'jig rten khams brgya kun nas g.yo bar nus par gyur pa'ang yin/_/sa nas sar gnon byed cing gong mar [#]rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de tshe
[\[201b.7\]]'di yi ngan 'gro'i lam rnams mtha' dag 'gag par 'gyur/_/de tshe 'di yi so so skye bo'i sa rnams thams cad zad/_/'di ni 'phags pa brgyad pa ji lta de ltar nye bar bstan/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems lta dang po la gnas kyang /_/thub dbang gsung skyes dang bcas
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]rang sangs rgyas rnams ni/_/bsod nams dag gi [#]dbang gis pham byas rnam par 'phel/_/de ni ring du song bar blo yang lhag par 'gyur/_/de tshe de la rdzogs sangs byang chub rgyu/_/dang po sbyin pa nyid ni lhag par 'gyur/_/rang sha ster la'ang
[\[202a.2\]]gus par byas pa yis/_/snang du mi rung dpog pa'i rgyur yang 'gyur/_/skye bo 'di kun bde ba mngon 'dod cing /_/mi rnams bde ba'ang longs spyod med min la/_/longs spyod kyang ni sbyin las 'byung mkhyen nas/_/thub pas dang por sbyin pa'i gtam mdzad do/_/
[\[202a.3\]]snying rje dman zhing shin tu rtsub sems can/_/rang don lhur len nyid du 'gyur ba gang /_/de dag gi yang 'dod pa'i longs spyod rnams/_/sdug bsngal nyer zhi'i rgyur gyur sbyin las 'byung /_/'di yang sbyin pa'i skabs kyis nam zhig tshe/_/'phags pa'i skye bo
[\[202a.4\]]dang 'phrad myur du 'thob/_/de nas srid rgyun yang dag bcad byas te/_/de yi rgyu can zhi bar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'gro la phan par dam bcas yid can rnams/_/sbyin pas ring por mi thogs dga' ba 'thob/_/gang phyir brtse bdag brtse bdag ma yin pa/_/
[\[202a.5\]]de phyir sbyin pa'i gtam nyid gtso bo yin/_/ji ltar byin zhig [#]ces sgra thos bsams las/_/rgyal sras bde 'byung de ltar thub rnams la/_/zhi bar zhugs pas bde ba byed min na/_/thams cad btang bas lta zhig smos ci dgos/_/lus bcad ster zhing bdag gi
[\[202a.6\]]sdug bsngal gyis/_/gzhan dag rnams kyi dmyal ba la sogs pa'i/_/sdug bsngal rang rig nyid du mthong nas ni[#]/_/de bcad bya phyir myur du brtson 'grus rtsom/_/sbyin pa sbyin bya len po gtong pos stong /_/'jig rten 'das pa'i pha rol phyin zhes bya/_/gsum po [# ]
[\[202a.7\]]dag la chags skyes gyur pas de/_/'jig rten pa yi pha rol phyin ces bstan/_/de ltar rgyal ba'i sras kyi yid la rab gnas shing /_/dam pa'i rten la 'od chags mdzes pa rnyed [#]gyur pa'i/_/dga' ba 'di ni nor bu chu shel ji bzhin du/_/mun pa stug po thams cad rnam par
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]bsal nas rgyal/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa las/_sems bskyed pa dang po'o/_/de tshul phun tshogs yon tan dag ldan phyir/_/rmi lam du yang 'chal khrims dri ma spangs/_/lus ngag yid kyi rgyu ba dag gyur pas/_/dam pa'i las lam bcu char sog [#]par
[\[202b.2\]]byed/_/dge ba'i lam 'di lta zhig bcu char yang /_/de la klags te shin tu dag par 'gyur/_/ston ka'i zla ltar rtag tu rnam dag de/_/zhi 'od chags par de dag gis rnam mdzes/_/gal te de ni khrims dag rang bzhin lta/_/de phyir de ni tshul khrims dag mi
[\[202b.3\]]'gyur/_/de phyir de ni rtag tu gsum char la'ang /_/gnyis blo'i rgyu ba yang dag bral bar 'gyur/_/sbyin pas longs spyod dag ni 'gro ngan na'ang /_/skye bo tshul khrims rkang pa nyams la 'byung /_/bskyed [#]bcas dngos 'du yongs su zad pas na/_/phyin chad de la
[\[202b.4\]]longs spyod 'byung mi 'gyur/_/gang tshe rang dbang 'jug cing mthun gnas pa/_/gal te 'di bdag 'dzin par mi byed na/_/g.yang sar lhung bas gzhan dbang 'jug 'gyur ba/_/de las phyi nas gang gis slong bar 'gyur/_/de phyir rgyal bas sbyin pa'i gtam mdzad
[\[202b.5\]]nas/_/tshul khrims rjes 'gro'i gtam nyid mdzad pa yin/_/yon tan tshul khrims zhing du rnam 'phel na/_/'bras bu nyer spyod chad pa med par 'gyur/_/so so'i skye bo rnams dang gsung skyes dang /_/rang byang chub la bdag nyid nges rnams dang /_/rgyal sras
[\[202b.6\]]rnams kyi nges par legs pa [#]dang /_/mngon mtho'i rgyu ni [#]tshul khrims las gzhan med/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho ro dang lhan cig dang /_/bkra shis rna nag ma dang lhan cig bzhin/_/de ltar tshul khrims dbang byas bdag nyid che/_/de 'chal ba dang lhan cig gnas mi 'dod/_/
[\[202b.7\]]gang gis gang zhig gang la spong byed pa/_/gsum du dmigs pa yod na tshul khrims de/_/'jig rten pa yi pha rol phyin zhes bshad/_/gsum la chags pas stong de 'jig rten 'das/_/rgyal sras zla ba las byung srid min srid pa yi/_/dpal gyur dri ma dang
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]bral dri ma med 'di yang /_/ston kha'i dus kyi zla ba'i 'od ni ji bzhin du/_/'gro ba'i yid kyi gdung ba sel bar byed pa yin/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa las/_sems bskyed pa gnyis pa'o/_/shes bya'i bud shing ma lus sreg pa'i me'i/_/
[\[203a.2\]]'od 'byung phyir na sa ni gsum pa 'di/_/'od byed pa ste bde gshegs sras po la/_/de tshe nyi ltar zangs 'dra'i snang ba 'byung /_/gal te gnas min 'khrug pa 'ga' yis de'i/_/lus las sha ni rus bcas yun ring du/_/srang re re nas bcad par gyur kyang de'i/_/
[\[203a.3\]]bzod pa gcod par byed la lhag par skye/_/bdag med mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la/_/gang zhig gang gis gang tshe ji ltar gcod/_/gang phyir chos kyang [#]de yis gzugs brnyan [#]ltar/_/mthong ba des kyang de yis bzod par 'gyur/_/gnod pa
[\[203a.4\]]byas pas gal te der bkon [#]na/_/de la bkon pas byas zin ldog gam ci/_/de phyir der [#]bkon nges par 'dir don med/_/'jig rten pha rol dang [#]ni 'gal bar 'gyur/_/sngon byas pa yi mi dge'i las kyi 'bras bu gang /_/zad par byed par brjod par 'dod pa de
[\[203a.5\]]nyid ko/_/gzhan la gnod pa dang ni khro bas sdug bsngal phyir/_/sa bon nyid du ji lta bur na 'khrid [#]par byed/_/gang phyir rgyal sras rnams la khros pa yis/_/sbyin dang khrims byung dge ba bskal pa brgyar/_/bsags pa skad cig gis 'joms de yi phyir/_/
[\[203a.6\]]mi bzod las gzhan sdig pa yod ma yin/_/mi sdug gzugs su byed cing dam pa min par [#]bkri/_/tshul dang tshul min shes pa'i rnam dpyod 'phrog byed cing /_/mi bzod pa yis myur du ngan 'gror skyur bar byed/_/bzod pas bshad zin dang 'gal yon tan
[\[203a.7\]]rnams byed do/_/bzod pas mdzes shing skye bo dam pa la/_/phangs dang lugs dang lugs min shes pa la/_/mkhas par 'gyur zhing de yi 'og tu ni/_/lha mi'i skye dang sdig pa zad par 'gyur/_/so so'i skye bo dang ni rgyal sras kyis/_/khro dang bzod pa'i skyon
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]yon rig [#]byas te/_/mi bzod spangs nas 'phags pa'i skye bo yis/_/bsngags pa'i bzod pa rtag tu myur bsten bya/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub phyir bsngos kyang /_/gsum dmigs yod na de ni 'jig rten pa'o/_/dmigs pa med na de nyid sangs
[\[203b.2\]]rgyas kyis/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i pha rol phyin zhes [#]bstan/_/sa der rgyal sras bsam gtan mngon shes dang /_/'dod chags zhe sdang yongs su zad par 'gyur/_/des kyang rtag tu 'jig rten pa yi ni/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags 'joms par nus
[\[203b.3\]]par 'gyur/_/sbyin sogs chos gsum de dag phal mo cher/_/bde bar gshegs pas khyim pa rnams la bsngags/_/bsod nams zhes bya'i tshogs kyang de dag nyid/_/sangs rgyas gzugs kyi bdag nyid sku yi rgyu/_/rgyal ba'i sras po nyi ma
[\[203b.4\]]la gnas 'od byed 'di/_/rang gtogs mun rnams dang po yang dag bsal byas nas/_/'gro ba'i mun pa rnam par 'joms par mngon par 'dod/_/sa 'dir shin tu rno bar gyur kyang khro mi 'gyur/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa las/_sems bskyed pa gsum
[\[203b.5\]]pa'o//_//yon tan ma lus brtson 'grus rjes 'gro zhing /_/bsod nams blo gros tshogs ni gnyis kyi rgyu/_/brtson 'grus gang du 'bar bar gyur pa [#]yi/_/sa de bzhi pa 'od ni 'phro [#]ba 'o/_/der ni bder gshegs sras la rdzogs pa yi/_/byang
[\[203b.6\]]chub phyogs lhag bsgoms [#]pa las skyes pa'i/_/snang ba zangs kyi 'od pas lhag 'byung zhing /_/rang du lta ba dang 'brel [#]yongs su zad/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa las/_sems bskyed pa bzhi pa'o//_//bdag nyid che de bdud rnams kun gyis kyang /_/
[\[203b.7\]]sbyang dka'i sa la pham par nus ma yin/_/bsam gtan lhag cing blo bzang bden rang bzhin/_/zhib mo rtogs la'ang shin tu mkhas pa 'thob/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa las/_sems bskyed pa lnga pa'o//_//mngon du phyogs par mnyam bzhag sems
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]gnas te/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mngon phyogs shing /_/'jig rten [#]'byung ba'i de nyid mthong ba de/_/shes rab gnas pas 'gog pa thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar long ba'i tshogs kun bde blag tu/_/mig ldan skyes bu gcig gis 'dod
[\[204a.2\]]pa yi/_/yul du 'khrid [#]pa de bzhin 'dir yang blos/_/mig nyams yon tan blangs te rgyal nyid 'gro/_/ji ltar de yis chos zab chos rtogs pa/_/lung dang gzhan yang rigs pas yin pas na/_/de ltar 'phags pa klu sgrub gzhung lugs las/_/ji
[\[204a.3\]]ltar gnas pa'i lugs bzhin brjod par bya/_/so so skye bo'i dus na'ang stong pa nyid thos nas/_/nang du rab tu dga' ba yang dang yang du 'byung /_/rab tu dga' ba las byung mchi mas mig brlan zhing /_/lus kyi ba spu ldang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa/_/de la rdzogs pa'i
[\[204a.4\]]sangs rgyas blo yi sa bon yod/_/de nyid nye bar bstan pa'i snod ni de yin te/_/de la dam pa'i don gyi bden pa bstan par bya/_/de la de yi rjes su 'gro ba'i yon tan 'byung /_/rtag tu tshul khrims yang dag blangs nas gnas par 'gyur/_/sbyin pa gtong bar 'gyur
[\[204a.5\]]zhing snying rje sten [#]par byed/_/bzod pa sgom byed de yi dge ba byang chub tu/_/'gro ba dgrol bar bya phyir yongs su bsngo byed cing /_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus par byed/_/zab cing rgya che'i tshul la mkhas pa'i skye bos ni/_/rim gyis rab tu
[\[204a.6\]]dga' ba'i sa ni 'thob 'gyur bas/_/de ni don du gnyer bas lam 'di mnyan par gyis/_/de nyid de las 'byung min gzhan dag las lta ga la zhig_/gnyi ga las kyang ma yin rgyu med par ni ga la yod/_/de ni de las 'byung [#]na yon tan 'ga' yang yod ma yin/_/
[\[204a.7\]]skyes par gyur pa slar yang skye bar rigs pa'ang ma yin nyid/_/skyes zin slar yang skye bar yongs su rtog par 'gyur na ni/_/myu gu la sogs rnams kyi skye ba 'dir rnyed mi 'gyur zhing /_/sa bon srid mthar thug par rab tu skye ba nyid du 'gyur/_/ji ltar de nyid kyis de
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]rnam par 'jig par byed par 'gyur/_/byed rgyu sa bon gyi las tha dad myu gu'i dbyibs dang ni/_/kha dog ro nus smin pa'i tha dad khyod la med par 'gyur/_/gal te sngar gyi bdag gi dngos po bsal nas de las gzhan/_/ngo bor 'gyur na de tshe de yi de nyid ji ltar 'gyur/_/
[\[204b.2\]]gal te khyod kyi sa bon myu gu 'dir gzhan ma yin na/_/sa bon bzhin du myu gu zhes bya de gzung med pa 'am/_/yang na de dag gcig pas ji ltar myu gu 'di bzhin du/_/de yang gzung du yod 'gyur de phyir 'di ni khas mi blang /_/gang phyir rgyu zhig na yang de yi 'bras bu
[\[204b.3\]]mthong ba'i phyir/_/de dag [#]gcig pa yin zhes 'jig rten gyis kyang khas mi len/_/de phyir dngos po bdag las 'byung zhes rab tu brtags pa 'di/_/de nyid dang ni 'jig rten du yang rigs pa ma yin no/_/bdag las skye bar 'dod na bskyed par bya dang skyed byed dang /_/
[\[204b.4\]]las dang byed pa po yang gcig nyid 'gyur na de dag ni/_/gcig nyid ma yin pas na bdag las skye bar khas blang bar/_/bya min rgya cher bshad pa'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur phyir ro/_/gzhan la brten nas gal te gzhan zhig 'byung bar 'gyur na ni/_/'o na me lce las
[\[204b.5\]]kyang mun pa 'thug po 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/thams cad las kyang thams cad skye bar 'gyur te gang gi phyir/_/skyed par byed pa ma yin ma lus la yang gzhan nyid mtshungs/_/rab tu bya bar nus pa de phyir 'bras bur nges brjod cing /_/gang zhig de skyed [#]nus pa de ni gzhan
[\[204b.6\]]na'ang rgyu yin la/_/rgyud gcig gtogs dang [#]skyed par byed las skye ba de yi phyir/_/sA [#]lu'i myu gu nas la sogs las de lta min zhe na/_/ji ltar nas dang ge sar dang ni keng shu ka la sogs/_/sA [#]lu'i myu gu'i skyed par byed par 'dod min nus ldan min/_/rgyud gcig
[\[204b.7\]]khongs su gtogs min 'dra ba ma yin nyid de bzhin/_/sA [#]lu'i sa bon yang ni de yi min te gzhan nyid phyir/_/myu gu sa bon dang ni dus mnyam yod pa ma yin te/_/gzhan nyid med par sa bon gzhan pa nyid du ga la 'gyur/_/des na myu gu sa bon las skye 'grub par
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]'gyur min pas/_/gzhan las skye ba yin zhes bya ba'i phyogs 'di gtang bar byos/_/ji ltar srang gi mda' gnyis mtho ba dang ni dma' ba dag_/dus mnyam ma yin par na [#]min par mthong ba de bzhin du/_/bskyed par bya dang skyed byed dag gi skye 'gag
[\[205a.2\]]'gyur zhe na/_/gal te gcig tshe yin na 'dir dus gcig med de yang [#]min/_/gal te skye bzhin pa de skye la phyogs pas [#]yod min zhing /_/'gag bzhin pa ni yod kyang 'jig la phyogs par 'dod gyur pa/_/de tshe 'di ni ji lta bur na srang dang mtshungs pa yin/_/skye ba
[\[205a.3\]]'di ni byed po med par rigs pa'i ngo bo'ang min/_/gal te mig gi blo la rang gi skyed byed dus gcig pa/_/mig la sogs dang lhan cig 'byung ba 'du shes la sogs las/_/gzhan nyid yod na yod la 'byung bas dgos pa ci zhig yod/_/ci ste de med ce na 'di la nyes
[\[205a.4\]]pa bshad zin to/_/skyed par byed pa bskyed bya gzhan skyed [#]pa de rgyu yin na/_/yod pa'am 'on te med dang gnyi ga gnyis bral zhig [#]skyed grang /_/yod na skyed byed ci dgos med la'ang des ni ci zhig bya/_/gnyis nyid la des ci bya gnyis dang bral la'ang des ci bya/_/gang gis
[\[205a.5\]]rang lta la gnas 'jig rten tshad mar 'dod pas na/_/'dir ni rig [#]pa smras pa nyid kyis lta go ci zhig bya/_/gzhan las gzhan 'byung ba yang 'jig rten pa yis rtogs 'gyur te/_/des na gzhan las skye yod 'dir ni rigs pa ci zhig dgos/_/dngos kun yang dag brdzun [#]pa
[\[205a.6\]]mthong ba yis/_/dngos rnyed ngo bo gnyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur/_/yang dag mthong yul gang de de nyid de/_/mthong ba brdzun [#]pa kun rdzob bden par gsungs/_/mthong ba brdzun [#]pa'ang rnam pa gnyis 'dod de/_/dbang po gsal dang dbang po skyon ldan no/_/skyon ldan dbang
[\[205a.7\]]can rnams kyi shes pa ni/_/dbang po legs gyur shes ltos log par 'dod/_/gnod pa med pa'i dbang po drug rnams kyis/_/gzung ba gang zhig 'jig rten gyis rtogs te/_/'jig rten nyid las bden yin lhag ma ni/_/'jig rten nyid las log par rnam par bzhag_/_
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]mi shes gnyid kyis rab bskyod [#]mu stegs can/_/rnams kyis bdag nyid ji bzhin brtags pa dang /_/sgyu ma smig rgyu sogs la brtags pa gang /_/de dag 'jig rten las kyang yod [#]min nyid/_/mig ni rab rib can gyis dmigs pa yis/_/rab rib med shes la
[\[205b.2\]]gnod min ji ltar/_/de bzhin dri med ye shes spangs pa'i blos/_/dri med blo la gnod pa yod ma yin[#]/_/gti mug rang bzhin sgrib phyir kun rdzob ste/_/des gang bcos [#]ma bden par snang de ni/_/kun rdzob bden zhes thub pa des gsungs te/_/bcos mar gyur pa'i dngos ni
[\[205b.3\]]kun rdzob tu'o/_/rab rib mthu yis skra shad la sogs pa'i/_/ngo bo log pa gang zhig rnam brtags pa/_/de nyid bdag nyid gang du mig dag pas/_/mthong de de nyid de bzhin 'dir shes kyis/_/gal te 'jig rten tshad ma yin na ni/_/'jig rten de nyid mthong bas
[\[205b.4\]]'phags gzhan gyis/_/ci dgos 'phags pa'i lam gyis [#]ci zhig bya/_/blun po tshad mar rigs pa'ang ma yin no/_/rnam kun 'jig rten tshad min de yi phyir/_/de nyid skabs su 'jig rten gnod pa med/_/'jig rten don ni 'jig rten grags nyid kyis/_/
[\[205b.5\]]gal te sel na 'jig rten gyis gnod 'gyur/_/gang phyir 'jig rten sa bon tsam btab nas/_/bdag gis bu 'di skyed [#]ces smra byed cing /_/shing yang btsugs [#]so snyam du rtog [#]des na/_/gzhan las skye ba 'jig rten las kyang med/_/gang phyir myu gu sa bon las gzhan
[\[205b.6\]]min/_/de phyir myug tshe sa bon zhig pa med/_/gang phyir gcig nyid yod min de phyir yang /_/myug tshe sa bon yod ces brjod mi bya/_/gal te rang gi mtshan nyid brten 'gyur na/_/de la skur bas [#]dngos po 'jig pa'i phyir/_/stong nyid dngos po 'jig pa'i rgyur
[\[205b.7\]]'gyur na/_/de ni rigs min de phyir dngos yod min/_/gang phyir dngos po 'di dag rnam dpyad na/_/de nyid bdag can dngos las tshu rol tu/_/gnas rnyed ma yin de phyir 'jig rten gyi/_/tha snyad bden la rnam par dpyad mi bya/_/de nyid skabs su rigs pa gang zhig gis/_/
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]bdag dang gzhan las [#]skye ba rigs min pa'i[#]/_/rigs des tha snyad du yang rigs min pas/_/khyod kyi skye ba gang gis yin par 'gyur/_/dngos po stong pa gzugs brnyan la sogs pa/_/tshogs la ltos rnams ma grags pa yang min/_/ji ltar der
[\[206a.2\]]ni gzugs brnyan sogs stong las/_/shes pa de yi rnam pa skye 'gyur ltar/_/de bzhin dngos po thams cad stong na yang /_/stong nyid dag las rab tu skye bar 'gyur/_/bden pa gnyis su'ang rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/_/de dag rtag pa ma yin chad pa'ang min/_/gang
[\[206a.3\]]phyir rang bzhin gyis de mi 'gag pa/_/de phyir kun gzhi med kyang 'di nus phyir/_/la lar las 'gags yun ring lon las kyang /_/'bras bu yang dag 'byung bar rig par gyis/_/rmi lam dmigs pa'i yul dag mthong nas ni/_/sad kyang blun la chags pa skye
[\[206a.4\]]'gyur ba/_/de bzhin 'gags shing rang bzhin yang [#]min pa'i/_/las las kyang ni 'bras bu yod ma [#]yin/_/ji ltar yul ni yod nyid min mtshungs kyang /_/rab rib can gyis skra shad rnam par ni/_/mthong gi dngos gzhan rnam par ma yin ltar/_/de bzhin
[\[206a.5\]]smin las slar smin min shes kyis/_/de phyir rnam smin mi dge nag po'i las/_/rnam smin dge nyid dge las yin mthong zhing /_/dge mi dge med blo can thar 'gyur te/_/las 'bras rnams la sems pa'ang dgag pa mdzad/_/kun gzhi yod cing gang zag nyid yod
[\[206a.6\]]la/_/phung po 'di dag 'ba' zhig nyid yod ces/_/bstan pa 'di ni de ltar ches zab don/_/rig [#]par mi 'gyur gang yin de la 'o/_/'jig tshogs lta dang bral yang sangs rgyas kyis/_/ji ltar nga dang nga yi bstan pa ltar/_/de bzhin dngos rnams rang bzhin med
[\[206a.7\]]mod kyi/_/yod ces drang don nyid du bstan pa yin/_/gzung ba med par 'dzin pa ma mthong zhing /_/srid gsum rnam shes tsam du rab rtogs pas/_/shes rab la gnas byang chub sems dpa' des/_/rnam shes tsam du de nyid rtogs par 'gyur/_/ji ltar rlung gis
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]bskul bas rgya mtsho ni/_/che las chu rlabs 'byung ba de bzhin du/_/kun gyi sa bon kun gzhi zhes bya las/_/rang gi nus pas rnam shes tsam zhig 'byung /_/de phyir gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo gang /_/dngos po [#]btags par yod pa'i rgyur 'gyur zhing /_/phyi rol gzung
[\[206b.2\]]ba med par 'byung 'gyur la/_/yod dang spros kun yul min rang bzhin yod/_/phyi rol med sems dpe ni gang du yod/_/rmi lam ji bzhin zhe na de bsam bya/_/gang tshe nga la rmi lam na yang sems/_/yod min de tshe khyod kyi dpe yod min/_/gal te sad tshe rmi lam
[\[206b.3\]]dran las yid/_/yod na phyi rol yul yang de bzhin 'gyur/_/ji ltar khyod kyi ngas mthong snyam dran pa/_/de 'dra phyi rol la yang yod pa yin/_/gal te gnyid nang [#]mig blo mi srid pas/_/yod min yid kyi shes pa kho na yod/_/de yi rnam pa phyi rol nyid du zhen/_/
[\[206b.4\]]rmi lam ji lta de bzhin 'dir 'dod na/_/ji ltar khyod kyi phyi yul rmi lam du/_/ma skyes de bzhin yid [#]kyang skyes ma yin/_/mig dang mig gi yul dang des skyed [#]sems/_/gsum po thams cad kyang ni brdzun [#]pa yin/_/rna sogs lhag ma gsum po'ang skye ba med/_/rmi
[\[206b.5\]]lam ji lta de bzhin sad 'dir yang /_/dngos rnams brdzun [#]yin sems de yod ma yin/_/spyod yul med cing dbang po rnams kyang med/_/'di na ji ltar sad bzhin ji srid du/_/mi [#]sad de srid de la gsum po yod/_/sad par gyur na gsum char yod min ltar/_/
[\[206b.6\]]gti mug gnyid zad las de de bzhin no/_/dbang po rab rib bcas pa blo gang gis/_/rab rib mthu las skra rnams gang mthong ba/_/de blo la ltos gnyis char bden pa ste/_/don gsal mthong la gnyis ka'ang brdzun [#]pa yin/_/gal te shes bya med par blo
[\[206b.7\]]yod na/_/skra de'i yul dang mig ni rjes 'brel pa'i/_/rab rib med la'ang skra shad blor 'gyur na/_/de lta ma yin de phyir de yod min/_/gang phyir mthong ba dag la blo nus ni/_/smin med de phyir de la blo mi 'gyur/_/shes bya yod dngos bral bas min zhe na/_/nus de med
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]pas 'di ni 'grub ma yin/_/skyes la nus pa srid pa yod ma yin/_/ma skyes ngo bo la yang nus yod min/_/khyad par med par khyad par can yod min/_/mo gsham bu la'ang de ni yod par thal/_/gal te 'byung bar 'gyur bas bsnyad 'dod na/_/
[\[207a.2\]]nus pa med par 'di yi 'byung 'gyur med/_/phan tshun don la brten pa'i 'grub pa ni/_/grub min nyid ces dam pa rnams kyis gsungs/_/gal te 'gags pa'i nus smin las 'gyur na/_/gzhan gyi nus pa las gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rgyun [#]can rnams der
[\[207a.3\]]phan tshun tha dad yod/_/de phyir thams cad kun las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gal te der ni rgyun can tha dad kyi/_/de dag la rgyun tha dad med de'i phyir/_/nyes med ce na 'di ni bsgrub bya zhig_/tha mi dad rgyun skabs mi rigs phyir ro/_/byams pa nyer sbas la brten chos rnams
[\[207a.4\]]ni/_/gzhan nyid phyir na [#]rgyud gcig gtogs min te/_/gang dag rang mtshan nyid kyis [#]so so ba/_/de dag rgyud gcig gtogs pa rigs ma yin/_/mig blo skye ba rang nus gang zhig [#]las/_/de ma thag [#]tu kun nas skye 'gyur zhing /_/rang gi rnam shes rten gyi nus de la/_/
[\[207a.5\]]dbang po gzugs can mig ces bya bar rtogs/_/'di na dbang po las byung rnam par rig_/phyi gzung med par rang gi sa bon las/_/sngo sogs snang nyid 'byung bar ma rtogs nas/_/skye bos phyi rol bzung [#]bar sems khas len/_/rmi lam na ni gzugs don gzhan
[\[207a.6\]]med par/_/rang nus smin las de yi rnam can sems/_/'byung ba ji lta de bzhin sad la'ang 'dir/_/phyi rol med par yid ni yod ce na/_/ji ltar mig med par ni rmi lam du/_/sngo sogs snang ba'i yid sems 'byung de ltar/_/mig dbang med par rang gi sa bon ni/_/
[\[207a.7\]]smin las long ba la 'dir cis mi skye/_/gal te khyod ltar rmi lam drug pa yi/_/nus pa smin yod sad par med gyur na/_/drug pa'i nus smin ji lta [#]'dir med pa/_/de ltar rmi tshe med ces cis mi rigs/_/ji ltar mig med 'di yi rgyu min ltar/_/rmi lam du yang gnyid ni
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]rgyu ma yin/_/de phyir rmi lam du yang de dngos mig_/brdzun [#]pa'i yul can rtogs pa'i rgyur khas blang /_/'di yis lan ni gang dang gang btab pa/_/de dang de ni dam bca' mtshungs mthong bas/_/rtsod 'di sel byed sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/_/'gar yang dngos
[\[207b.2\]]po yod ces ma bstan to/_/rnal 'byor pa yis bla ma'i man ngag las/_/keng rus kyis gang sa gzhi mthong ba gang /_/der yang gsum char skye ba med par mthong /_/log pa yid la byed pa [#]bstan phyir ro/_/khyod kyi dbang blo'i yul rnams ji lta ba/_/de ltar mi
[\[207b.3\]]sdug yid kyi yang 'gyur na/_/de bzhin yul der blo gtad cig shos kyis/_/rtogs 'byung [#]de ni brdzun [#]par yang mi 'gyur/_/rab rib dang ldan dbang po can mtshungs la[#]/_/chu 'bab rlung la yi dgas rnag blo yang /_/mdor na ji ltar shes bya med de bzhin/_/blo
[\[207b.4\]]yang med ces don 'di shes par gyis/_/gal te gzung med 'dzin pa nyid bral zhing /_/gnyis kyis stong pa'i gzhan dbang dngos yod na/_/'di yi yod pa gang gis shes par 'gyur/_/ma bzung bar yang yod ces byar mi rung /_/de nyid kyis de myong bar 'grub [#]ma
[\[207b.5\]]yin/_/gal te phyi dus dran pa las 'grub na/_/ma grub bsgrub [#]par bya phyir brjod pa yi/_/ma grub 'di ni sgrub par byed pa min/_/rang rig pa ni grub la rag mod kyi/_/de lta'ang dran pa'i dran pa rigs min te/_/gzhan phyir ma shes rgyud la skyes pa bzhin/_/gtan
[\[207b.6\]]tshigs 'dis ni khyad par dag kyang 'joms/_/gang phyir gang gis yul myong gyur de las/_/dran pa 'di gzhan nga la yod min pa/_/de phyir nga yis mthong snyam dran 'gyur te/_/'di yang 'jig rten tha snyad tshul lugs yin/_/de phyir rang rig [#]yod pa ma yin na/_/
[\[207b.7\]]khyod kyi gzhan dbang gang gis 'dzin par 'gyur/_/byed po las dang bya ba gcig min pas/_/de nyid kyis de 'dzin par rigs ma yin/_/gal te skye ba med cing ma shes pa'i/_/bdag can gzhan dbang ngo bo'i dngos yod na/_/gang gis na 'di yod pa [#]mi rigs pa/_/
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]gzhan la mo gsham bus gnod ci zhig bskyal/_/gang tshe gzhan dbang cung zad yod min na/_/kun rdzob pa yi rgyur ni gang zhig 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi ltar na rdzas la chags pa yis/_/'jig rten grags pa'i rnam bzhag kun kyang brlag_/slob dpon
[\[208a.2\]]klu sgrub zhabs kyi lam las [#]ni/_/phyi rol gyur la zhi ba'i thabs med do/_/de dag kun rdzob de nyid bden las nyams/_/de las nyams pas thar pa 'grub yod min/_/tha snyad bden pa thabs su gyur pa dang /_/don dam bden pa thabs byung gyur pa ste/_/de gnyis rnam
[\[208a.3\]]dbye [#]gang gis mi shes pa/_/de ni rnam rtog log pas lam ngan zhugs/_/ji ltar khyod kyis [#]gzhan dbang dngos 'dod ltar/_/kun rdzob kyang ni bdag gis khas ma blangs/_/'bras phyir 'di dag med kyang yod do zhes/_/'jig rten ngor byas bdag ni smra bar byed/_/
[\[208a.4\]]ji ltar phung po spangs nas zhir zhugs pa/_/dgra bcom rnams la yod pa min de ltar/_/'jig rten la yang med na de bzhin 'di/_/'jig rten las kyang yod ces bdag mi smra/_/gal te khyod la 'jig rten mi gnod na/_/'jig rten nyid ltos 'di ni dgag par gyis/_/
[\[208a.5\]]khyod dang 'jig rten 'dir ni rtsod gyis dang /_/phyi nas stobs ldan bdag gis brten par bya/_/mngon gyur mngon phyogs byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/srid gsum rnam shes tsam du gang rtogs pa/_/rtag bdag byed po bkag pa rtogs phyir des/_/byed pa po ni sems
[\[208a.6\]]tsam yin par rtogs/_/de phyir blo ldan blo ni 'phel bya'i phyir/_/lang kar gshegs mdo de las kun mkhyen gyis/_/mu stegs spo mthon ri 'joms dag rang bzhin/_/rdo rje 'di ni dgongs pa bcad phyir gsungs/_/ji bzhin rang gi bstan bcos de de las/_/mu stegs
[\[208a.7\]]rnams kyis gang zag sogs de dag_/smras pa de dag byed por ma gzigs nas/_/rgyal bas sems tsam 'jig rten byed por gsungs/_/de nyid rgyas la sangs rgyas bsnyad ji bzhin/_/de bzhin sems tsam gtsor gyur 'jig rten la/_/mdo las sems tsam zhes
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]gsungs gzugs ni 'dir/_/'gog pa de ltar mdo yi don ma yin/_/gal te 'di dag sems tsam zhes mkhyen nas/_/de las gzugs nyid dgag par mdzad na ni/_/slar yang de las bdag nyid chen pos sems/_/gti mug las las skyes par ci phyir
[\[208b.2\]]gsungs/_/sems nyid kyis ni sems can 'jig rten dang /_/snod kyi 'jig rten shin tu sna tshogs 'god/_/'gro ba ma lus las las skyes par gsungs/_/sems spangs nas ni las kyang yod ma yin/_/gal te gzugs yod mod kyi de la ni/_/sems bzhin
[\[208b.3\]]byed pa po nyid yod ma yin/_/des na sems las gzhan pa'i byed pa po/_/bzlog gi gzugs ni bkag pa ma yin no/_/'jig rten pa yi de nyid la gnas la/_/phung po 'jig rten grags te lnga char yod/_/de nyid ye shes 'char bar 'dod pa na/_/rnal 'byor pa la de lnga
[\[208b.4\]]'byung mi 'gyur/_/gzugs med na ni sems yod ma 'dzin zhig[#]/sems yod 'di [#]na'ang gzugs med ma 'dzin zhig[# ]/de dag shes rab tshul mdor sangs rgyas kyis/_/mtshungs par spangs shing mngon pa'i chos las gsungs/_/bden gnyis rim pa 'di dag bshig
[\[208b.5\]]nas kyang /_/khyod kyi rdzas ni bkag pas 'grub mi 'gyur/_/de phyir de lta'i rim pas dngos gdod [#]nas/_/de nyid ma skyes 'jig rten skyes rig bya/_/mdo sde gang las phyi rol snang yod min/_/sems ni sna tshogs snang ngo zhes gsungs pa/_/gzugs la shin tu chags
[\[208b.6\]]gang de dag la/_/gzugs bzlog pa ste de yang drang don nyid/_/'di ni ston pas drang don nyid gsungs shing /_/'di ni drang don nyid du rigs pas 'thad/_/rnam pa de lta'i mdo sde gzhan yang ni/_/drang don nyid du lung 'dis gsal bar byed/_/shes bya med na shes pa bsal
[\[208b.7\]]ba ni/_/bde blag [#]rnyed ces sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/_/shes bya med na shes pa bkag 'grub pas/_/dang por shes bya dgag pa mdzad pa yin/_/de ltar lung gi lo rgyus shes byas te/_/mdo gang de nyid ma yin bshad don can/_/drang don gsungs pa'ang rtogs nas
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]drang bya zhing /_/stong nyid don can nges don shes par gyis/_/gnyis las [#]skye ba'ang rigs pa'i ngo bo ma yin gang gi phyir/_/bshad zin nyes pa de dag thog tu 'bab pa yin phyir ro/_/'di ni 'jig rten las min de nyid du yang 'dod min te/_/gang phyir re re
[\[209a.2\]]las ni skye ba 'grub pa yod ma yin/_/gal te rgyu med kho nar skye bar lta zhig 'gyur na ni/_/de tshe mtha' dag rtag tu thams cad las kyang skye 'gyur zhing /_/'bras 'byung ched du 'jig rten 'di yi sa bon la sogs ni/_/brgya phrag dag gi sgo nas sdud par byed par yang mi 'gyur/_/
[\[209a.3\]]gal te 'gro ba rgyu yis stong par gyur na nam mkha' yi/_/ut+pa la yi dri mdog ji bzhin gzung du med nyid na/_/shin tu ches bkra'i 'jig rten 'dzin pa'ang de yi [#]phyir/_/rang gi blo bzhin 'jig rten rgyu las yin par shes par gyis/_/'byung ba de dag bdag nyid gang zhig
[\[209a.4\]]gis ni khyod kyi blo'i/_/yul du 'gyur ba de yi bdag nyid can ni ma yin na/_/gang la yid kyi mun pa 'thug po 'di nyid du yod pa/_/des ni ji ltar 'jig rten pha rol yang dag rtogs par 'gyur/_/'jig rten pha rol 'gog par byed pa'i dus su bdag nyid ni/_/shes bya'i
[\[209a.5\]]rang bzhin phyin ci log tu lta bar rtogs bya ste/_/de yi lta ba'i rnam pa'i rten mtshungs lus dang ldan nyid phyir/_/gang tshe 'byung ba'i bdag nyid yod nyid khas len de tshe bzhin/_/'byung ba de dag ji ltar yod min de ltar bshad zin te/_/gang gi phyir na gong du rang gzhan
[\[209a.6\]]las dang gnyis ka las/_/skye dang rgyu med thun mong du ni bkag zin de yi phyir/_/ma bshad 'byung ba 'di dag lta zhig yod pa [#]ma yin no/_/gang gi phyir na bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka las skye dang /_/rgyu la ma ltos yod pa min pas dngos rnams rang bzhin bral/_/gang
[\[209a.7\]]gis sprin tshogs dang mtshungs gti mug stug po 'jig rten la/_/yod pa des na yul rnams log pa dag tu snang bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar rab rib mthu yis 'ga' zhig skra shad zla gnyis dang /_/rma bya'i mdongs dang sbrang ma la sogs log [#]par 'dzin byed pa/_/de bzhin du ni gti
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]mug skyon gyi dbang gis mi mkhas pas/_/'dus byas lta [#]zhig sna tshogs blo gros kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/gal te gti mug brten nas las 'byung gti mug med par de/_/mi 'byung zhes byar mi mkhas kho nas rtogs [#]par gor ma chag_/blo bzang nyi mas mun pa stug po rnam
[\[209b.2\]]par bsal ba yi/_/mkhas pa dag ni stong nyid khong du chud cing grol bar 'gyur/_/gal te dngos rnams de nyid du med na/_/tha snyad du yang mo gsham bu ji bzhin/_/de dag med pa nyid 'gyur de yi phyir/_/de dag rang bzhin gyis ni yod pa nyid/_/gang dag rab rib can
[\[209b.3\]]sogs yul 'gyur ba/_/skra shad la sogs de dag ma skyes pas/_/re zhig de dag nyid la brtsad bya ste/_/phyi nas ma rig rab rib rjes 'brel la'o/_/gal te rmi lam dri za'i grong khyer bcas/_/smig rgyu'i chu dang mig 'phrul gzugs brnyan sogs/_/skye med mthong
[\[209b.4\]]na yod nyid min mtshungs kyang /_/khyod la ji ltar der 'gyur de mi rigs/_/de nyid du 'di ji ltar skye med kyang /_/mo gsham bu ltar gang phyir 'jig rten gyi/_/mthong ba'i yul du mi 'gyur ma yin pa/_/de yi phyir na sa [#]'di ma nges pa'o/_/mo gsham bu la rang gi
[\[209b.5\]]bdag nyid kyis/_/skye ba de nyid du med 'jig rten du'ang /_/yod min de bzhin dngos 'di kun ngo bo/_/nyid kyis 'jig rten de nyid du ma skyes/_/de phyir 'di ltar ston pas chos rnams kun/_/gdod nas zhi zhing skye bral rang bzhin gyis/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das pa gsungs
[\[209b.6\]]gyur pa[#]/_/de phyir rtag tu skye bo [#]yod ma yin/_/bum sogs 'di dag de nyid du med cing /_/'jig rten rab tu grags par yod ci bzhin/_/de bzhin dngos po thams cad 'byung [#]bas na/_/mo gsham bu dang mtshungs par thal mi 'gyur/_/gang phyir rgyu [#]med pa dang dbang
[\[209b.7\]]phyug gi_/rgyu la sogs dang bdag gzhan gnyis ka las/_/dngos rnams skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa/_/de phyir brten nas rab tu skye bar 'gyur/_/gang phyir dngos po brten nas rab 'byung bas/_/rtog pa 'di dag brtag par mi nus pa/_/de phyir rten [#]'byung rigs pa 'di yis ni/_/
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]lta ngan dra ba mtha' dag gcod par byed/_/rtag [#]rnams dngos po yod na 'gyur [#]ba ste/_/dngos po ji ltar med par yongs dpyad zin/_/dngos po med par 'di rnams mi 'byung dper/_/bud shing med par me yod min de bzhin/_/so so'i skye bo rnams
[\[210a.2\]]ni rtog pas bcings/_/mi rtog rnal 'byor pa ni grol 'gyur bas/_/rtog rnams log par gyur pa gang yin de/_/rnam par dpyod pa'i 'bras bur mkhas rnams gsung /_/bstan bcos las dpyad rtsod la chags pa'i phyir/_/ma mdzad rnam grol phyir ni de nyid
[\[210a.3\]]bstan/_/gal te de nyid rnam par bshad pa na/_/gzhan gzhung 'jig par 'gyur na nyes pa med/_/rang gi lta la chags dang de bzhin du/_/gzhan gyi lta la 'khrug gang rtog pa nyid/_/de phyir 'dod chags khong khro rnam bsal te/_/rnam dpyod pa ni myur du grol bar
[\[210a.4\]]'gyur/_/nyon mongs skyon rnams ma lus 'jig tshogs la/_/lta las byung bar blo yis mthong gyur zhing [#]/_/bdag ni 'di yi yul du rtogs byas nas/_/rnal 'byor pa yis bdag ni 'gog par byed/_/za po rtag dngos byed po min pa'i bdag_/yon tan bya med mu
[\[210a.5\]]stegs rnams kyis brtags/_/de'i dbye cung zad cung zad la brten nas/_/mu stegs can rnams lugs ni tha dad 'gyur/_/mo gsham bu ltar skye ba dang bral phyir/_/de ltar gyur pa'i bdag ni yod min zhing /_/'di ni ngar 'dzin rten du'ang mi rigs la/_/'di ni kun rdzob
[\[210a.6\]]tu yang yod mi 'dod/_/gang phyir bstan bcos bstan bcos las de'i khyad/_/mu stegs rnams kyis gang bstan de kun la/_/rang grags ma skyes gtan tshigs kyis gnod pa/_/de phyir de khyad [#]kun kyang yod ma yin/_/de phyir phung po las gzhan bdag med de[#]/_/phung
[\[210a.7\]]po ma gtogs de 'dzin ma grub phyir/_/'jig rten ngar 'dzin blo yi rten du yang /_/mi 'dod de rig min pa'ang bdag lta'i phyir/_/gang dag dud 'gro [#]bskal mang brkyal [#]gyur pa/_/des [#]kyang ma skyes rtag 'di ma mthong la/_/ngar 'dzin de dag la yang 'jug mthong ste/_/des na phung po
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]las gzhan bdag 'ga' med/_/phung po las gzhan bdag grub med pa'i phyir/_/bdag lta'i dmigs pa phung po kho na 'o/_/kha cig bdag lta'i rten du phung po ni/_/lnga char yang 'dod kha cig sems gcig 'dod/_/gal te phung po bdag na de phyir de/_/mang bas bdag de dag kyang
[\[210b.2\]]mang bar 'gyur/_/bdag ni rdzas su 'gyur zhing der lta ba/_/rdzas la 'jug pas phyin ci log mi 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das tshe nges par bdag chad 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das sngon skad cig dag la ni/_/skye 'jig byed po med pas de 'bras med/_/gzhan gyis bsags la
[\[210b.3\]]gzhan gyis za bar 'gyur/_/de nyid du rgyud yod na skyon med na/_/sngar rnam dpyad tshe rgyud la nyes bshad zin/_/de phyir phung po dang sems bdag mi rigs/_/'jig rten mtha' ldan la sogs med phyir ro/_/khyod kyi rnal 'byor bdag med mthong ba la/_/de tshe nges par
[\[210b.4\]]dngos rnams med par 'gyur/_/rtag bdag spangs [#]na de tshe de yi phyir/_/khyod kyi sems sam phung po bdag mi 'gyur/_/khyod kyi rnal 'byor bdag med mthong ba yis/_/gzugs sogs de nyid rtogs par mi 'gyur zhing /_/gzugs la dmigs nas 'jug phyir 'dod
[\[210b.5\]]chags sogs/_/skye 'gyur de yi ngo bo rtogs med phyir/_/gang phyir ston pas phung po bdag go zhes/_/gsungs pa de phyir phung po bdag 'dod na/_/de ni phung las gzhan bdag 'gog pa ste/_/gzugs bdag min sogs mdo gzhan gsungs phyir ro/_/gang phyir
[\[210b.6\]]gzugs tshor bdag min 'du shes kyang /_/ma yin 'du byed rnams min rnam shes kyang /_/min par mdo gzhan las gsungs de yi phyir/_/mdor bstan phung po bdag ces bzhed ma yin/_/phung po bdag ces brjod tshe phung rnams kyi/_/tshogs pa yin gyi phung po'i ngo bo min/_/
[\[210b.7\]]mgon min 'dul ba'am dbang po nyid kyang min/_/de med phyir de tshogs pa ma yin no/_/de tshe de yi yan lag tshogs gnas rnams/_/shing rta nyid 'gyur shing rta dang bdag mtshungs/_/mdo las phung po brten nas yin gsungs pa/_/de phyir phung po 'dus tsam bdag ma yin/_/
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]dbyibs she [#]na de gzugs can la yod phyir/_/khyod la de dag nyid bdag ces 'gyur gyi/_/sems sogs tshogs [#]ni bdag nyid 'gyur min te/_/gang phyir de dag la dbyibs yod ma yin/_/len po [#]rang nyer len gcig rigs dngos min/_/de lta na las
[\[211a.2\]]byed po gcig nyid 'gyur/_/byed po med las yod snyam blo yin na/_/ma yin gang phyir byed po med las med/_/gang phyir thub pas bdag de sa chu me/_/rlung dang rnam shes nam mkha' zhes bya ba/_/khams drug dang ni mig sogs reg pa yi/_/rten drug dag la brten
[\[211a.3\]]nas nyer brten [#]zhing /_/sems dang sems byung chos rnams nyer bzung nas/_/des gsungs de phyir de ni de rnams dang /_/de nyid ma yin tshogs tsam nyid min te/_/de phyir ngar 'dzin blo de rnams la min/_/bdag med rtogs tshe rtag pa'i bdag spong zhing /_/'di
[\[211a.4\]]ni ngar 'dzin rten du'ang mi 'dod pa/_/de phyir bdag med shes pas bdag lta ba/_/dpyis kyang 'byin zhes smra ba shin tu mtshar/_/rang khyim rtsig phug sbrul gnas mthong bzhin du/_/'di na glang chen med ces dogs bsal te/_/sbrul gyi [#]'jigs pa'ang spong bar byed
[\[211a.5\]]pa ni/_/kye ma gzhan gyi gnam por 'gyur nyid do/_/phung por bdag yod ma yin bdag la yang /_/phung po de rnams yod min gang phyir 'dir/_/gzhan nyid yod na rtog pa 'dir 'gyur na/_/gzhan nyid de med de phyir 'di rtog pa'o/_/bdag ni gzugs ldan mi
[\[211a.6\]]'dod gang phyir bdag_/yod min de phyir ldan don sbyor ba med/_/gzhan na gnag ldan gzhan min gzugs ldan na/_/bdag ni gzugs las de nyid gzhan nyid med/_/gzugs bdag ma yin bdag ni gzugs ldan min/_/gzugs la bdag med bdag la'ang
[\[211a.7\]]gzugs yod min/_/de ltar rnam bzhir phung kun shes bya ste/_/de dag bdag tu lta ba nyi shur 'dod/_/lta ri bdag med rtogs pa'i rdo rje yis/_/bcom bdag gang dang lhan cig 'jig 'gyur pa/_/'jig tshogs lta ri lhun stug la gnas pa/_/rtse mo mtho bar gyur pa
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]'di dag go/_/kha cig de nyid gzhan nyid rtag mi rtag_/la sogs brjod med gang zag rdzas yod 'dod/_/rnam shes drug gi shes byar de 'dod cing /_/de ni ngar 'dzin gzhir yang 'dod pa yin/_/gang phyir gzugs las sems brjod med mi rtogs/_/dngos yod
[\[211b.2\]]brjod med rtogs pa ma yin nyid/_/gal te bdag 'ga' dngos por grub gyur na/_/sems ltar grub dngos brjod du med mi 'gyur/_/gang phyir khyod bum dngos por ma grub pa'i/_/ngo bo gzugs sogs las brjod med 'gyur bas/_/bdag gang phung po las brjod
[\[211b.3\]]med 'gyur te/_/rang gis yod par grub par rtogs mi bya/_/khyod kyi rnam shes rang bdag las gzhan ni/_/mi 'dod gzugs sogs las gzhan dngos 'dod cing /_/dngos la rnam pa de gnyis mthong 'gyur ba/_/de phyir bdag med dngos chos dang bral phyir/_/
[\[211b.4\]]de phyir ngar 'dzin rten ni dngos po min/_/phung las gzhan min phung po'i ngo bo min/_/phung po rten min 'di ni de ldan min/_/'di ni phung po rnams brten 'grub par 'gyur/_/shing rta rang yan lag las gzhan 'dod min/_/gzhan min ma yin de ldan yang min zhing /_/yan lag
[\[211b.5\]]la min [#]yan lag dag der min/_/'dus pa tsam min dbyibs min ji bzhin no/_/gal te tshogs tsam shing rtar 'gyur na ni/_/sil bur gnas la shing rta nyid yod 'gyur/_/gang phyir yan lag can med yan lag dag_/med pas dbyibs tsam shing rtar rigs pa'ang min/_/
[\[211b.6\]]khyod dbyibs yan lag re re sngar yod gyur/_/ji bzhin shing rtar gtogs la'ang de bzhin na/_/bye bar gyur pa de dag la ji ltar/_/da ltar yang ni shing rta yod ma yin/_/da lta gal te shing rta nyid dus [#]'dir/_/'phang lo sogs la dbyibs tha dad yod na/_/'di gzung 'gyur na de
[\[211b.7\]]yang yod min te/_/de phyir dbyibs tsam shing rtar yod ma yin/_/gang phyir khyod kyi tshogs pa cang med pas/_/dbyibs de yan lag tshogs kyi ma yin na/_/gang zhig ci yang ma yin de brten nas/_/'dir ni dbyibs su lta zhig ji ltar 'gyur/_/khyod kyi 'di ni ji ltar 'dod de
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]ltar/_/mi bden pa yi rgyu la brten byas nas/_/'bras bu'i rnam pa mi bden rang bzhin can/_/thams cad kyang ni skye bar shes par gyis/_/'dis ni gzugs sogs de ltar gnas rnams la/_/bum blo zhes bya'ang rigs pa ma yin nyid/_/skye ba
[\[212a.2\]]med pas gzugs sogs kyang yod min/_/de yi phyir yang de dag dbyibs mi rigs/_/de ni de nyid du 'am [#]'jig rten du/_/rnam pa bdun gyis 'grub 'gyur min mod kyi/_/rnam dpyad med par 'jig rten nyid las 'dir/_/rang gi yan lag brten nas 'dogs pa
[\[212a.3\]]yin/_/de nyid yan lag can de cha shas can/_/shing rta de nyid byed po zhes 'gror bsnyad/_/skye bo rnams la len po nyid du 'grub/_/'jig rten grags pa'i kun rdzob ma brlag cig_/rnam bdun gyis med gang de ji lta bur/_/yod ces rnal 'byor pas 'di'i
[\[212a.4\]]yod mi rnyed/_/des de nyid la'ang bde blag 'jug 'gyur bas/_/'dir de'i grub pa de bzhin 'dod par bya/_/shing rta yod nyid yin [#]na de yi tshe/_/yan lag can med de'i yan lag kyang med/_/shing rta tshig na yan lag med dpe bzhin/_/blo mes yan lag can
[\[212a.5\]]bsregs yan lag go/_/de bzhin 'jig rten grags pas phung po dang /_/khams dang de bzhin skye mched drug brten nas/_/bdag kyang nye bar len pa nyid du 'dod/_/nyer len las yin 'di ni byed po'ang yin/_/dngos yod min phyir 'di ni brtan min [#]zhing /_/mi brtan
[\[212a.6\]]nyid min 'di ni skye 'jig min/_/'di la rtag pa nyid la sogs pa yang /_/yod min de nyid dang ni gzhan nyid min[#]/_/gang phyir [#]rtag tu 'gro rnams ngar 'dzin blo/_/rab tu 'byung zhing de yi gang yin der/_/nga yir 'dzin blo 'byung ba'i bdag de ni/_/ma brtags [#]grags par
[\[212a.7\]]gti mug las yin no/_/gang phyir byed po med can las med pa/_/de phyir bdag gi bdag med par yod min/_/de phyir bdag dang bdag gi stong lta zhing /_/rnal 'byor pa de rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_/bum pa snam bu re lde dmag dang nags tshal phreng ba ljon shing dang /_/
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]khang khyim shing rta phran dang 'gron gnas la sogs dngos rnams gang dag dang /_/de bzhin gang dag sgo nas skye 'dis bsnyad [#]pa de rnams rtogs bya ste/_/gang phyir thub dbang de ni 'jig rten lhan cig rtsod mi mdzad phyir ro/_/yan lag yon tan 'dod chags mtshan nyid dang ni
[\[212b.2\]]bud shing la sogs dang /_/yon tan can yan lag can chags dang mtshan gzhi me la sogs don dag_/de rnams shing rta'i rnam dpyad byas pas rnam bdun yod pa ma yin zhing /_/de las gzhan du gyur par 'jig rten grags pa'i sgo nas yod pa yin/_/gal
[\[212b.3\]]te rgyu yis bskyed par bya skyed [#]de lta na de rgyu yin zhing /_/gal te 'bras bu mi skyed na ni de med rgyu med can du 'gyur/_/'bras bu yang ni rgyu yod gyur na skye bar 'gyur ba de yi phyir/_/gang las gang zhig 'gyur ba gang zhig las sngar gang zhig 'gyur ba smros/_/gal te khyod kyi
[\[212b.4\]]rgyu yis phrad nas 'bras skyed byed na de yi tshe/_/de dag nus pa gcig pas skyed byed 'bras bu tha dad med 'gyur zhing /_/so sor na ni rgyu 'di rgyu min rnams dang khyad par med 'gyur la/_/gnyis po 'di dag spangs nas rtog pa gzhan yang yod par 'gyur ma yin/_/ci ste khyod
[\[212b.5\]]kyi rgyu yis 'bras bu skyed par mi byed de phyir 'bras/_/zhes bya yod min 'bras bral rgyu ni rgyu med can 'gyur yod pa'ang min/_/gang phyir 'di dag gnyis char yang ni sgyu ma dang 'dra de yi phyir/_/bdag la skyon du mi 'gyur 'jig rten pa yi dngos po rnams kyang yod/_/sun 'byin
[\[212b.6\]]'dis sun dbyung bya phrad nas 'byin nam ma phrad par/_/yin zhes nyes pa 'dir ni [#]khyod la'ang 'gyur ba ma yin nam/_/gang tshe de skad smra zhing rang phyogs kho na rnam 'joms pa/_/de tshe khyod kyis sun dbyung sun ni 'byin par nus ma yin/_/gang phyir rang gi tshig la'ang thal ba mtshungs
[\[212b.7\]]pa'i ltag chod kyis/_/rigs pa med par dngos mtha' dag la skur 'debs de yi phyir/_/khyod ni skye bo dam pas bzhed mi 'gyur zhing gang gi [#]phyir/_/khyod la rang phyogs med pas sun ci phyin du rgol ba'ang yin/_/sun 'byin pas sun dbyung bya ma phrad sun ni 'byin byed dam/_/'on te
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]phrad nas yin zhes smras zin nyes pa 'dir gang la/_/nges par phyogs yod de la 'gyur gyi bdag la phyogs 'di ni/_/yod pa min pas thal bar 'gyur ba 'di ni srid ma yin/_/ji ltar khyod kyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yod khyad par rnams/_/gzugs
[\[213a.2\]]brnyan la yang gzas bzung la sogs rnams tshe mthong 'gyur la/_/nyi ma dang ni gzugs brnyan rnam par phrad dang ma phrad par/_/mi rigs mod kyi brten nas tha snyad tsam zhig 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/mi bden bzhin du'ang rang gi byad bzhin mdzes par bsgrub bya'i phyir/_/de ni
[\[213a.3\]]yod pa ji ltar de bzhin 'dir yang shes rab gdod/_/sbyang bar bya la nus pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gtan tshigs ni/_/'thad pa dang bral las kyang bsgrub bya rtogs zhes shes par bya[#]/_/gal te rang gi bsgrub bya go byed gtan tshigs dngos grub dang /_/dngos su go bya nyid
[\[213a.4\]]'gyur bsgrub bya'i ngo bo'ang yod gyur na/_/phrad pa la sogs rigs pa nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur zhig na/_/de yang yod pa min pas khyed kyi yi chad 'ba' zhig yin/_/dngos rnams mtha' dag dngos po [#]med par rtogs su gzhug [#]par ni/_/zhus [#]par ches sla ji la de [#]ltar rang bzhin gzhan
[\[213a.5\]]dag la/_/khong du chud par bde blag tu ni nus pa ma yin no/_/rtog ge ngan pa'i dra bas 'jig rten ci ste 'dir rtsol [#]byed/_/sun 'byin lhag ma gong du bstan pa yang ni shes byas nas/_/phrad pa la sogs phyogs kyi lan gyi ched du 'dir gtad bya/_/sun ci phyin du rgol ba pa
[\[213a.6\]]yang ji ltar yod min pa/_/de skad sngar bshad lhag ma phyogs 'di nyid kyis rtogs [#]par bya/_/bdag med 'di ni 'gro ba rnams [#]dgrol phyir/_/chos dang gang zag dbye ba rnam gnyis gsungs/_/de ltar ston pas slar yang 'di nyid ni/_/gdul bya [#]rnams la phye ste rnam mang [# ]
[\[213a.7\]]gsungs/_/spros dang bcas par stong pa nyid/_/bcu drug bshad nas [#]mdor bsdus te/_/slar yang bzhir [#]bshad de dag ni/_/theg chen du yang bzhed pa yin/_/gang phyir de yi rang bzhin de/_/yin phyir mig ni mig gis stong /_/de bzhin rna ba sna dang lce/_/lus
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]dang yid kyis [#]bsnyad par bya/_/ther zug gnas pa ma yin dang /_/'jig pa ma yin nyid kyi phyir/_/mig la sogs pa drug po yi/_/rang bzhin med nyid gang yin pa/_/de ni nang stong nyid du 'dod/_/gang phyir de yi rang bzhin de/_/yin phyir gzugs ni gzugs kyis
[\[213b.2\]]stong /_/sgra dang dri ro reg bya dang /_/chos rnams nyid kyang de bzhin no/_/gzugs sogs rang bzhin med pa nyid/_/phyi rol stong pa nyid du 'dod/_/gnyis char rang bzhin med nyid ni/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yin no/_/chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid/_/mkhas
[\[213b.3\]]pas stong pa nyid ces bsnyad/_/stong nyid de yang stong nyid kyi/_/ngo bos stong par 'dod pa yin/_/stong nyid ces [#]bya'i stong nyid gang /_/stong nyid stong nyid du 'dod de[#]/_/stong nyid dngos po'i blo can gyi/_/'dzin pa bzlog phyir gsungs pa yin/_/sems can snod kyi
[\[213b.4\]]'jig rten ni/_/ma lus khyab byed nyid phyir dang /_/tshad med dpe [#]yis mu mtha' ni/_/med phyir phyogs rnams chen po nyid/_/'di dag bcu char phyogs rnams kyis/_/stong pa nyid ni gang yin de/_/chen po stong pa nyid yin de/_/chen por 'dzin pa bzlog phyir gsungs/_/
[\[213b.5\]]de ni dgos pa mchog yin pas/_/don dam mya ngan 'das pa yin/_/de ni de yis stong nyid gang /_/de ni don dam stong nyid de/_/myang 'das dngos po'i blo can gyi/_/'dzin pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir/_/don dam mkhyen pas don dam pa/_/stong pa nyid ni bstan par mdzad/_/
[\[213b.6\]]rkyen las byung phyir khams gsum po/_/'dus byas yin par nges par bsnyad/_/de ni de yis [#]stong nyid gang /_/de ni 'dus byas stong nyid gsungs/_/gang la skye gnas mi rtag nyid/_/de dag med pa 'dus ma byas/_/de ni de [#]yis stong nyid gang /_/de ni 'dus ma byas
[\[213b.7\]]stong nyid/_/gang la mtha' ni yod min pa/_/de ni mtha' las 'das par brjod/_/de de kho nas stong pa nyid/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong nyid bsnyad/_/thog ma dang po tha ma mtha'/_/de dag med pas 'khor ba ni/_/thog ma tha ma med par brjod/_/'gro 'ong bral phyir rmi
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]lam lta'i/_/srid 'di de yis dben nyid gang /_/de ni thog ma dang tha ma/_/med pa stong pa nyid do zhes/_/bstan bcos las ni nges par bsnyad/_/dor ba ces [#]bya 'thor ba dang /_/'bor ba la ni nges par brjod/_/dor [#]med gtong pa med pa ste/_/'ga' yang
[\[214a.2\]]dor med gang yin pa'o/_/dor ba med pa de nyid kyis/_/de nyid stong pa nyid gang yin/_/de de'i phyir na dor med pa/_/stong pa nyid ces bya bar brjod/_/'dus byas la sogs ngo bo nyid/_/gang phyir slob ma rang sangs rgyas/_/rgyal sras de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/_/
[\[214a.3\]]ma mdzad de'i phyir 'dus byas la/_/sogs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid/_/rang bzhin nyid du bsnyad pa ste/_/de nyid kyis de stong nyid gang /_/de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid/_/khams bco brgyad dang reg drug dang /_/de las byung ba'i tshor drug dang /_/gzugs can gzugs can
[\[214a.4\]]min de bzhin/_/'dus byas 'dus ma byas chos rnams/_/chos de dag ni thams cad kyi/_/de dag gis dben stong nyid gang /_/gzugs rung la sogs dngos med gang /_/de ni rang mtshan stong pa nyid/_/gzugs ni gzugs rung mtshan nyid can/_/tshor ba myong
[\[214a.5\]]ba'i bdag nyid can/_/'du shes mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste/_/'du byed mngon par 'du byed pa'o/_/yul la so sor rnam rig pa/_/rnam shes rang gi mtshan nyid do/_/phung po sdug bsngal rang mtshan nyid/_/khams kyi bdag nyid sbrul gdug 'dod/_/skye mched rnams
[\[214a.6\]]ni sangs rgyas kyis/_/skye ba'i sgor gyur nyid du gsungs/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang /_/de ni 'du 'phrod mtshan nyid do/_/gtong ba sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/_/tshul khrims gdung med mtshan nyid bzod/_/khro med mtshan nyid brtson 'grus kyi/_/kha na ma tho med
[\[214a.7\]]nyid do/_/bsam gtan sdud pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/shes rab chags med mtshan nyid de/_/pha rol phyin pa drug rnams kyi/_/mtshan nyid 'di dag yin par brjod/_/bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med dang /_/de bzhin gzhan gang gzugs med pa/_/de dag yang dag
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]mkhyen pa yis/_/mi 'khrug [#]mtshan nyid can du gsungs/_/byang chub phyogs chos sum cu bdun/_/nges par 'byung byed rang mtshan nyid/_/stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni/_/dmigs pa med pas rnam dben nyid/_/mtshan ma med pa zhi nyid de/_/gsum pa'i mtshan
[\[214b.2\]]nyid sdug bsngal dang /_/gti mug med rnam thar rnams kyi/_/mtshan nyid rnam par grol byed pa'o/_/stobs rnams shin tu rnam par ni/_/gtan la 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin gsungs/_/skyob pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams ni/_/shin tu brtan pa'i ngo bo yin/_/
[\[214b.3\]]so sor yang dag rig rnams na[#]/_/spobs sogs tshad med mtshan nyid can/_/'gro la phan pa nyer sgrub pa/_/byams pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/sdug bsngal can rnams yongs skyob pa/_/thugs rje chen po'o dga' ba ni/_/rab dga'i mtshan nyid btang snyoms ni/_/ma
[\[214b.4\]]'dres mtshan nyid can zhes [#]bya/_/sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa/_/bcu dang brgyad du gang 'dod dag_/gang phyir sten [#]des mi 'phrogs pa/_/de phyir mi 'phrogs rang mtshan nyid/_/rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes ni/_/mngon sum mtshan nyid can du 'dod/_/gzhan ni nyi tshe
[\[214b.5\]]ba nyid kyis/_/mngon sum zhes byar mi 'dod do/_/gang zhig 'dus byas mtshan nyid dang /_/'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid gang /_/re re [#]kho nas stong pa nyid/_/de ni rang mtshan stong pa nyid/_/da lta ba 'di mi gnas shing /_/'das dang ma 'ongs yod ma yin/_/gang
[\[214b.6\]]du de dag mi dmigs pa/_/de la mi dmigs pa zhes brjod/_/mi dmigs pa de rang ngo bo/_/de yis dben pa nyid gang de/_/ther zug gnas min 'jig min pas[#]/_/mi dmigs zhes bya'i stong nyid do/_/rkyen las byung phyir dngos rnams la/_/'dus pa pa yi ngo bo med/_/
[\[214b.7\]]'dus pa pa ni de nyid kyis/_/stong nyid dngos med stong nyid do/_/dngos po'i sgras ni mdor bsdus na/_/phung po lnga rnams brjod pa yin/_/de rnams de yis stong nyid gang /_/de dngos stong pa nyid du bshad/_/mdor bsdus na ni dngos med pa/_/'dus ma byas chos rnams la brjod/_/de nyid
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]dngos med nges stong nyid/_/dngos po med pa stong nyid do/_/rang bzhin ngo bo nyid med ni/_/rang bzhin zhes bya'i stong nyid de/_/'di ltar rang bzhin ma byas pas/_/rang bzhin zhes ni bya bar bsnyad/_/sangs rgyas
[\[215a.2\]]rnams ni 'byung ba 'am/_/ma byung yang rung dngos su na/_/dngos po kun gyi stong pa nyid/_/gzhan gyi dngos por rab tu bsgrags/_/yang dag mtha' dang de bzhin nyid/_/de bzhin [#]dngos po'i stong nyid do/_/shes rab pha rol phyin tshul las/_/de dag de skad rab tu bsgrags/_/de
[\[215a.3\]]ltar blo gros zer gyis snang ba gsal byas pa/_/rang gi lag na gnas pa'i skyu ru ra bzhin du/_/srid gsum 'di dag ma lus gdod nas skye med par/_/rtogs te tha snyad bden pa'i stobs kyis 'gog par 'gro_/rtag tu 'gog par gtogs pa'i bsam gtan yin mod kyi/_/'gro
[\[215a.4\]]ba mgon med pa la snying rje'ang skyed par byed/_/de gong bde gshegs gsung skyes sangs rgyas 'bring bcas ni/_/ma lus pa rnams blo yis pham par byed pa'ang yin/_/kun rdzob de nyid gshog yangs dkar po rgyas gyur pa/_/ngang pa'i rgyal po de ni skye bo'i ngang pa yis/_/mdun
[\[215a.5\]]du bdar nas dge ba'i rlung gi shugs stobs kyis/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol mchog tu 'gro_/dbu ma la 'jug pa las sems bskyed pa drug pa'o//_//ring du song 'dir 'di ni skad cig dang /_/skad cig la ni 'gog par 'jug 'byung [#]zhing /_/thabs kyi pha rol phyin legs
[\[215a.6\]]'bar ba'ang 'thob/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa las/_sems bskyed pa bdun pa'o//_//yang yang sngar dge las lhag thob bya'i phyir/_/gang du phyir mi ldog pa nyid 'gyur ba/_/mi g.yo de la bdag nyid che de 'jug_/'di yi smon lam shin tu dag 'gyur zhing /_/rgyal ba rnams kyis
[\[215a.7\]]'gog las slong bar mdzad/_/chags pa med pa'i blo ni skyon rnams dag dang lhan cig mi gnas phyir/_/sa brgyad pa la dri ma de dag rtsa bcas nye bar zhi 'gyur zhing /_/nyon mongs zad cing sa gsum bla mar gyur kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/_/'byor pa mkha' ltar mtha' bral ma lus
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]'thob par nus ma yin/_/'khor ba 'gags kyang dbang rnams bcu po thob par 'gyur zhing de dag gis/_/srid pa'i 'gro bar rang gi bdag nyid sna tshogs ston par byed par 'gyur/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa las/_sems bskyed pa brgyad pa'o//_//dgu pa la ni
[\[215b.2\]]de'i stobs lta zhig mtha' dag rdzogs par dag 'gyur zhing /_/de bzhin yang dag rig chos rang gi yon tan yongs su dag pa'ang 'thob/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa las/_sems bskyed pa dgu pa'o//_//bcu pa'i sa la de yis kun nas sangs rgyas rnams las
[\[215b.3\]]dbang bskur ba/_/dam pa 'thob cing ye shes lhag par mchog tu byung bar gyur pa'ang [#]yin/_/char sprin rnams las chu char 'bab pa ji ltar de bzhin 'gro rnams kyi/_/dge ba'i lo tog ched du rgyal sras las kyang lhun grub chos char 'bab/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa
[\[215b.4\]]las/_sems bskyed pa bcu pa'o//_//de tshe 'dis ni sangs rgyas brgya mthong zhing /_/de dag byin gyi [#]brlabs kyang 'di yis rtogs/_/de nyid tshe na bskal pa brgyar gnas shing /_/sngon dang phyi ma'i mthar yang yang dag 'jug_/blo ldan ting 'dzin brgya phrag snyoms
[\[215b.5\]]par 'jug cing gtong byed de/_/'jig rten khams brgya 'di yis kun nas g.yo zhing snang bar nus/_/de bzhin rdzu 'phrul gyis de sems can brgya phrag smin byed cing /_/brgya phrag grangs dang rjes 'brel zhing dag tu yang 'gro bar 'gyur/_/des ni chos kyi sgo rnams yang dag
[\[215b.6\]]'byed byed thub dbang sras/_/rang gi lus la lus rnams kun nas ston par byed pa'ang yin/_/rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas mdzes 'byor lus ni re re zhing /_/rgyal ba'i sras po brgya phrag dag dang rjes su 'brel pa'ang ston/_/blo ldan rab tu dga' bar gnas pas yon tan de dag
[\[215b.7\]]ni/_/thob par gyur nas de bzhin kho nar dri ma med gnas pas/_/de dag stong ni yang dag 'thob par 'gyur te sa lnga po/_/'di dag rnams la byang chub sems dpa' yis ni 'bum phrag dang /_/bye ba phrag brgya 'thob cing de yis bye ba stong 'gyur 'thob/_/de nas bye ba brgya phrag stong
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]'gyur yang 'thob bye ba phrag_/khrag khrig phrag [#]brgyar rdzogs par bsgyur [#]dang slar yang stong phrag tu/_/yang dag par ni bsgyur ba mtha' dag rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/_/mi g.yo'i sar gnas rnam rtog med pa des/_/stong gsum brgya phrag stong bsdoms
[\[216a.2\]]'jig rten na/_/rdul tshad ji snyed yod pa de rnams dang /_/grangs mnyam yon tan dag ni 'thob par 'gyur/_/legs pa'i blo gros sa la gnas pa yi/_/byang chub sems des sngar bstan yon tan dag_/grangs med brgya phrag stong du yang dag par/_/bsdoms pa phrag
[\[216a.3\]]bcu'i rdul tshad thob par 'gyur/_/re zhig bcu pa 'dir de'i yon tan dag_/ngag gi spyod yul las ches 'das 'gyur zhing /_/ngag gi spyod yul ma yin bsdoms rnams na/_/rdul dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed 'gyur/_/ba spu'i khung bur byang chub sems rnams dang /_/
[\[216a.4\]]lhan cig rdzogs sangs rgyas sku bgrang 'das dang /_/de bzhin lha dang lha min mi dag kyang /_/skad cig skad cig la ni ston par nus/_/gang phyir nam mkha' dri ma med la zla snang gsal bar gyur pa'i phyir/_/sngon tshe stobs bcu bskyed pa'i sa la khyod kyis slar yang 'bad gyur
[\[216a.5\]]zhing [#]/_/'og min du ni gang gi don du 'bad gyur go 'phang mchog zhi ba/_/yon tan mtha' dag mthar thug mtshungs pa med de khyod kyis brnyes/_/ji ltar snod kyi dbye bas mkha' la dbye ba med de ltar/_/dngos byas dbye ba 'ga' yang de nyid la med de yi phyir/_/ro mnyam nyid
[\[216a.6\]]du yang dag thugs su chud par [#]mdzad gyur na/_/mkhyen bzang khyod kyis skad cig gis ni shes bya thugs su chud/_/gang tshe zhi ba de nyid yin na de la blo gros 'jug mi 'gyur/_/blo ma zhugs par shes bya'i yul can nges par rigs pa'ang [#]ma yin la/_/kun nas shes med pa
[\[216a.7\]]ni shes par ji ltar 'gyur te 'gal bar 'gyur/_/mkhyen po med par khyed kyis gzhan la 'di lta 'o zhes su zhig ston/_/gang tshe skye med de nyid yin zhing blo yang skye ba dang bral ba/_/de tshe de rnams sten [#]las de yis de nyid rtogs pa lta bu ste/_/ji ltar sems ni gang gi rnam pa can
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]du 'gyur ba de yis yul/_/de yongs shes pa de bzhin tha snyad brten nas rig [#]pa yin/_/de yi longs spyod rdzogs sku bsod nams kyis/_/zin dang sprul pa mkha' gzhan las de'i mthus/_/sgra gang chos kyi de nyid ston 'byung ba/_/de las 'jig rten gyis kyang de nyid rig_/_
[\[216b.2\]]ji ltar rdza mkhan stobs chen ldan pas 'dir/_/yun ring ches 'bad pas bskor 'khor lo ni/_/de'i rtsol da ltar skyes pa med bzhin du'ang /_/'khor zhing bum pa la sogs rgyur mthong ltar/_/de bzhin da lta skyes rtsol med bzhin du/_/chos kyi bdag can sku nyid la bzhugs
[\[216b.3\]]de'i/_/'jug pa skye bo'i dge dang smon lam gyi/_/khyad par gyis 'phangs las ches bsam mi khyab/_/shes bya'i bud shing skam po ma lus pa/_/bsregs pas zhi de rgyal rnams chos sku ste/_/de tshe skye ba med cing 'gag pa med/_/sems 'gags pas
[\[216b.4\]]de sku yis mngon sum mdzad/_/zhi sku dpag bsam shing ltar gsal gyur zhing [#]/_/yid bzhin nor bu ji bzhin rnam mi rtog_/'gro grol bar du 'jig rten 'byor slad rtag_/'di ni spros dang bral la snang bar 'gyur/_/thub dbang dus gcig kho nar de'i rgyu mthun/_/
[\[216b.5\]]gzugs sku gcig la rang gi skye gnas skabs/_/sngar 'gags gsal dang ma 'chol byung tshul ni/_/ma lus kyis bkra mtha' dag ston par mdzad/_/sangs rgyas zhing ji 'drar thub dbang de dang /_/de dag sku spyod mthu stobs ji 'dra dang /_/nyan thos dge 'dun ji snyed
[\[216b.6\]]ji lta dang /_/byang chub sems rnams der gzugs ji 'dra dang /_/ji 'dra'i chos dang der bdag ji 'dra dang /_/chos thos spyod pa gang la spyad pa dang /_/sbyin gang ji tsam de dag la phul ba/_/de ni ma lus sku gcig la ston mdzad/_/de bzhin tshul khrims bzod brtson
[\[216b.7\]]ting 'dzin dang /_/shes rab spyod tshe sngar gyi gnas skabs gang /_/ma tshang med de dag nyid spyod pa kun/_/sku yi ba spu'i khung bu'ang gsal bar ston/_/sangs rgyas gang dag 'das dang 'byung 'gyur gang /_/gang dag da ltar nam mkha'i mthar thug par/_/gdangs
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]mthon chos ston sdug bsngal gyis bzung ba'i/_/'gro dbugs 'byin zhing 'jig rten bzhugs pa dang /_/dang po'i thugs bzung byang chub snying po'i bar/_/de dag spyod kun dngos rnams mig 'phrul gyi/_/rang bzhin mkhyen nas bdag bzhin
[\[217a.2\]]ba spu yi/_/khung bur dus gcig la ni gsal bar ston/_/de bzhin dus gsum byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/rang rgyal 'phags pa nyan thos ma lus kyi/_/spyod dang de lhag skye bo'i gnas skabs ni/_/thams cad ba spu'i khung bur gcig tshe ston/_/dag
[\[217a.3\]]pa 'di ni bzhed pa 'jug pa yis/_/rdul gcig yul [#]la mkha' gtugs 'jig rten dang /_/'jig rten mtha' yas phyogs khyab rdul ston mod/_/rdul rags mi 'gyur 'jig rten phra mi 'gyur/_/rnam rtog mi mnga' khyod kyis srid mtha'i bar/_/skad cig
[\[217a.4\]]de re re la spyod sna tshogs/_/ji snyed ston pa de snyed 'dzam bu gling /_/ma lus rdul gang de snyed la grangs med/_/gnas dang gnas min mkhyen stobs dang /_/de bzhin las rnam [#]smin blo dang /_/mos pa sna tshogs thugs chud dang /_/sna tshogs khams ni mkhyen
[\[217a.5\]]stobs dang /_/de bzhin dbang mchog mchog ma yin/_/mkhyen dang thams cad du 'gro dang /_/bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin dang /_/snyoms par 'jug sogs blo stobs dang /_/sngon gnas dran pa mkhyen pa dang /_/de bzhin 'chi 'pho skye blo dang /_/zag
[\[217a.6\]]rnams zad pa mkhyen stobs te/_/stobs ni bcu po 'di dag go/_/rgyu gang zhig las gang zhig nges par skye 'gyur ba/_/de ni de yi gnas su de mkhyen rnams kyis gsungs/_/bshad pa las bzlog [#]gnas min [#]shes bya mtha' yas pa/_/mkhyen pa thogs pa
[\[217a.7\]]spangs pa de ni stobs su bshad/_/'dod dang mi 'dod de las bzlog dang zad [#]dngos kyi/_/las dang de yi rnam smin shin tu sna tshogs la'ang /_/mkhyen pa nus mthu thogs med so sor 'jug 'gyur ba/_/dus gsum shes bya khyab mdzad de ni stobs su 'dod/_/'dod
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]chags sogs kyis 'byung ba'i stobs kyis 'dod pa ni/_/shin tu sna tshogs dman 'bring gang yang khyad 'phags 'dod/_/de las gzhan rnams kyis g.yogs mos la [#]mkhyen pa ni/_/dus gsum 'gro ba ma lus khyab pa stobs shes [#]bya/_/sangs rgyas
[\[217b.2\]]khams kyi rnam par dbye la mkhas rnams kyis[#]/_/mig sogs rnams kyi rang bzhin gang de khams su gsungs/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen pa mtha' yas shing /_/rnam kun khams kyi khyad par la 'jug stobs su 'dod/_/kun tu rtog [#]sogs
[\[217b.3\]]ches rno nyid ni mchog bzhed la/_/'bring gnas skabs dang rtul nyid mchog min par bshad dang /_/mig la sogs dang phan tshun sgrub nus chub pa la/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa chags med stobs su gsungs/_/lam 'ga' rgyal ba nyid dang 'ga' zhig rang rgyal
[\[217b.4\]]gyi/_/byang chub dang ni nyan thos byang chub yi dgas dang /_/dud 'gro lha mi rnams dang dmyal ba sogs 'gro ba/_/de la mkhyen pa chags med mtha' yas stobs su 'dod/_/'jig rten mtha' yas rnal 'byor bye brag la tha dad/_/bsam gtan rnam thar brgyad gang [#]zhi
[\[217b.5\]]gnas gang dag dang /_/snyoms 'jug khyad par gang dag gcig par [#]brgyad gyur pa/_/de la mkhyen pa thogs med 'di ni stobs su bshad/_/ji srid gti mug de srid srid gnas 'das bdag dang /_/sems can gzhan re re yi srid pa sems can ni/_/ji snyed de snyed
[\[217b.6\]]mtha' yas gzhir [#]bcas yul phyogs dang /_/bcas rnams la blo gang dang gang yin stobs su bshad/_/sems can rnams kyi sems can re re'i 'chi 'pho dang /_/skye gang 'jig rten la gnas nam mkha' [#]mthar thug dang /_/bkra mang de la mkhyen pa dus der 'jug pa
[\[217b.7\]]yis/_/ma chags rnam kun yongs dag mtha' yas stobs su 'dod/_/rnam kun mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis myur du rgyal rnams kyi/_/nyon mongs dag ni bag [#]chags dang bcas 'jig 'gyur dang /_/slob ma la sogs nyon mongs blo yis 'gog pa gang /_/de la mkhyen
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]pa chags med mtha' yas stobs su 'dod/_/nam mkha' med pas 'dab chags ldog par mi 'gyur gyi/_/'di [#]ni rang mthu zad pas ldog par 'gyur de bzhin/_/slob ma dang bcas sangs rgyas sras rnams sangs rgyas kyi/_/
[\[218a.2\]]yon tan mkha' ltar mtha' yas ma brjod ldog par 'gyur/_/de phyir bdag 'dras khyod yon 'di dag ci/_/shes pa dang ni brjod par nus 'gyur ram/_/'on kyang de dag 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis/_/bshad phyir dogs spangs cung zhig tsam zhig smras/_/
[\[218a.3\]]zab mo stong pa nyid yin te/_/yon tan gzhan rnams rgya che ba'o/_/zab dang rgya che'i tshul shes pas/_/yon tan 'di dag 'thob [#]par 'gyur/_/slar yang mi g.yo sku mnga' khyod kyis srid gsum byon nas sprul rnams kyis/_/gshegs pa dang ni
[\[218a.4\]]bltam dang byang chub zhi ba'i 'khor lo'ang ston par mdzad/_/de ltar khyod [#]kyis 'jig rten g.yo bag spyod can re ba'i zhags [#]pa ni/_/mang pos bcings pa ma lus thugs rjes mya ngan 'das par bkri bar mdzad/_/gang phyir 'di na de nyid shes las dri ma mtha'
[\[218a.5\]]dag sel ba ni/_/lhur byed gzhan med chos rnams de nyid rnam 'gyur dbye la'ang bsten min zhing /_/de nyid yul can blo gros 'di yang tha dad 'gyur ba ma yin la[#]/_/de yi phyir na khyod kyis 'gro la theg pa mi mnyam dbyer med bstan/_/gang phyir 'gro la
[\[218a.6\]]nyes pa skyed byed snyigs ma 'di dag yod gyur pa/_/de phyir 'jig rten sangs rgyas spyod yul gting zab la 'jug mi 'gyur zhing /_/bde gshegs gang phyir khyod la mkhyen rab thugs rje thabs dang lhan cig pa/_/mnga' dang gang phyir bdag gis sems can
[\[218a.7\]]dgrol zhes khyod kyis zhal bzhes te/_/de phyir mkhas pa rin po che yi gling du chas pa'i skye tshogs kyi/_/ngal ba nyer sel grong khyer yid 'ong bar du rnam par bkod pa ltar/_/khyod kyis theg pa 'di ni slob ma nye bar zhi ba'i tshul la yid/_/sbyar zhing rnam par
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]dben la'ang blo sbyangs rnams la logs su gsungs/_/bde bar gshegs pa ma lus phyogs shing [#]sangs rgyas yul dag na/_/phra rab rdul gyi rdul rnams bdog par gyur pa ji snyed pa/_/byang chub mchog rab dam par gshegs pa'i skal ba de snyed
[\[218b.2\]]de/_/'on kyang khyod kyi gsang ba 'di ni bsnyad [#]bgyi ma lags so/_/rgyal ba ji srid 'jig rten mtha' dag mchog tu rab zhi bar/_/'gro ba min zhing nam mkha' rnam 'jig 'gyur min de srid du/_/shes rab yum gyis bskyed pa khyod la thugs brtse ma ma yis/_/
[\[218b.3\]]tshul lugs byed pas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba gang la mnga'/_/gti mug skyon gyis 'jig rten kha zas dug bcas za ba yi/_/skye bo nyid kyi nang mi de la khyod brtse ji lta ba/_/de ltar dug zos nyen pa'i bu la ma yi sdug bsngal min/_/des na mgon po
[\[218b.4\]]mchog tu rab zhir gshegs par 'gyur ma lags/_/gang gi phyir na mi mkhas dngos dang dngos med par zhen pa yi blo can gyis/_/skye dang 'jig gnas skabs dang sdug dang mi sdug bral phrad kyis bskyed sdug bsngal dang /_/sdig can 'gro ba 'thob pa de phyir
[\[218b.5\]]'jig rten thugs brtse'i yul du rab dong bas/_/bcom ldan thugs rjes khyod thugs [#]zhi las bzlog pas khyod la mya ngan 'das mi mnga'/_/lugs 'di dge slong zla grags kyis/_/dbu ma'i bstan bcos las btus nas/_/lung ji bzhin dang
[\[218b.6\]]man ngag ni/_/ji lta ba bzhin brjod pa yin/_/'di las gzhan na chos 'di ni/_/ji ltar med pa de bzhin du/_/'dir 'byung lugs kyang gzhan na [#]ni/_/med ces mkhas rnams nges par mdzod/_/klu sgrub blo mtsho shin tu rgya che'i kha dog
[\[218b.7\]]gis 'jigs pas/_/skye bos lugs bzang gang dag rgyang ring spangs pas de yi tshig_/le'ur byas pa'i kha 'bus ku mu ta [#]kha phye ba'i chus/_/da lta zla ba grags pa re rnams rab tu skong bar byed/_/de nyid bshad zin zab mo 'jigs rung 'di ni
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]sngon goms nyid las skye bo yis/_/nges par rtogs 'gyur 'di ni gsan rgya che yang gzhan gyis thugs su chud mi 'gyur/_/de phyir tshul lugs rang blos sbyar ba 'di dag mthong nas bdag tu brjod pa yi/_/gzhung
[\[219a.2\]]lugs rnams ltar gzhan lugs bzhed gzhung 'di las gzhan la dga' blo dor bar bya/_/slob dpon klu sgrub lugs bzang bsnyad las bdag gis bsod nams phyogs kyi mthar/_/khyab cing yid mkha' nyon mongs kyis sngor ston ka'i rgyu
[\[219a.3\]]skar ltar dkar ba'am/_/sems kyi [#]sbrul la gdengs ka'i nor bu dang 'dra gang zhig thob pa des/_/'jig rten ma lus de nyid rtogs nas myur du bde [#]gshegs sar bgrod shog_/dbu ma la 'jug pa zab pa dang rgya che ba'i tshul gsal [#]bar byed pa/_
[\[219a.4\]]slob dpon zla ba grags pa theg pa mchog la thugs gzhol ba/_/mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje mnga' ba/_ri mor bris pa'i ba drus [#]las 'o ma bzhos pas bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba rdzogs so//_//_
[\[219a.5\]]kha che'i yul gyi grong khyer dpe med kyi dbus/_rin chen sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang du/_kha che'i rgyal po dpal 'phags pa lha'i sku ring la/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ti la ka dang /_bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe
[\[219a.6\]]dang mthun par bsgyur/_phyis ra sa ra mo cher rgya gar gyi mkhan po karna ka warma dang /_lo ts+tsha [#]ba de nyid kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs pa'i dpe dang gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//_//'dir 'grel pa'i mdzad byang dang /_'gyur byang
[\[219a.7\]]gi steng nas thun mong ba rnams bkod pa ni/_rtsa ba logs su bsgyur ba dang 'grel pa'i nang gi rtsa ba gnyis sbyar nas zhus dag byas pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no//_//_
[\[219b\]]
[\[220a\]]
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]{D3862}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_mA [#]d+h+yA ma ka a [#]ba tA ra b+hA Shu [#]nA ma/_bod skad du/_dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bshad pa zhes bya ba/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbu ma'i bstan bcos la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_dbu ma la
[\[220b.2\]]'jug pa rtsom par 'dod pas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams pas kyang thog mar/_bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang po/_sems can 'khor ba'i btson rar bsdams pa skyabs med pa dpag tu med pa
[\[220b.3\]]ma lus pa yongs su skyob pa'i mtshan nyid can la bstod par 'os pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir/_nyan thos sangs rgyas 'bring rnams thub dbang skyes/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' las 'khrungs shing /_/snying rje'i sems dang gnyis su med blo dang /_/byang chub sems ni rgyal
[\[220b.4\]]sras rnams kyi rgyu/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis smos so/_/de la gong na med pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa mnga' bas/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams pas kyang dbang phyug dam pa phun sum tshogs pa nyid dang /_nyan
[\[220b.5\]]thos la sogs pa rnams de'i bkas mnga' bsgyur ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la thub dbang zhes bya'o/_/de rnams las nyan thos la sogs pa dag skyes pa ni de dag las bskrun pa'o/_/ji ltar zhe na/_sangs rgyas rnams byung bar gyur pa na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
[\[220b.6\]]phyin ci ma log pa ston pa la 'jug pa'i phyir la/_de nyan pa dang sems pa dang sgom [#]pa'i rim pa las kyang lhag par mos pa ji lta ba bzhin nyan thos la sogs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/gal te yang kha cig gis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nye bar bstan pa
[\[220b.7\]]nyan pa kho na las don dam pa rtogs pa la mkhas su zin kyang mthong ba'i skye ba [#]kho na la mya ngan las 'das pa [#]thob par mi 'gyur mod kyi/_de lta na yang nye bar ston [#]pa'i sgrub pa po dag gis las rnam par smin par [#]nges pa'i 'bras bu ltar tshe rabs gzhan du mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu yongs
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]su smin pa gor ma chag [#]thob par 'gyur ro/_/ji skad du 'phags pa lhas/_de nyid shes pas gal te 'dir/_/mya ngan 'das pa ma thob kyang /_/skye ba gzhan du 'bad med par/_/nges par thob 'gyur las bzhin no/_/zhes bshad do/_/de nyid kyi phyir dbu ma las kyang /_
[\[221a.2\]]rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams ma byung zhing /_/nyan thos rnams kyang zad pa na/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni/_/rten [#]pa med par rab tu 'byung /_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la yang dag pa'i gdams [#]ngag gi 'bras bu thob par byed pas na nyan thos dag ste/_'di ltar bya ba byas so/_/'di
[\[221a.3\]]las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no/_/yang na 'bras bu'i mchog gam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las thos nas de [#]don du gnyer ba rnams la sgrogs par byed pas na nyan thos dag ste/_dam
[\[221a.4\]]pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i mdo las/_mgon po de ring bdag cag nyan thos gyur/_/byang chub dam pa yang dag bsgrags [#]par bgyi/_/byang chub pa yi sgra yang rab tu brjod/_/de bas bdag cag nyan thos mi zad [#]'dra/_/zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams
[\[221a.5\]]kyang de lta [#]yin mod kyi/_de lta na yang sgrogs par byed pa nyid yin gyi rjes su mthun pa tsam yang mi sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag nyan thos yin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la [#]thal bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'di sangs rgyas kyi [#]de nyid nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang bla na
[\[221a.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsum car [#]la yang 'jug ste/_des na sangs rgyas kyi [#]sgras rang sangs rgyas dag bsnyad do/_/de dag ni bsod nams dang ye shes gong du 'phel ba'i khyad par gyis nyan thos rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir dang /_bsod nams dang ye
[\[221a.7\]]shes kyi tshogs dang thugs rje chen po dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa la sogs pa med pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams pas dman pa'i phyir na 'bring ngo /_/de nyid kyi phyir de dag ni nye bar ma bstan par ye shes 'byung zhing bdag nyid gcig pu'i phyir rang nyid sangs
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]rgyas pas rang sangs rgyas so/_/ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa las nges par byung [#]ba nyid kyi [#]phyir thub dbang las skyes so/_/yang thub pa'i dbang po de rnams gang las bltams she [#]na/_sangs rgyas byang chub
[\[221b.2\]]sems dpa' las 'khrungs shing /_/zhes bya ba smos so/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pas nye bar bstan pa las skyes par gyur pas rgyal ba'i sras zhes brjod pa ma yin nam/_de'i phyir ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa'
[\[221b.3\]]las 'khrungs she na/_'di ni bden mod kyi 'on kyang rgyu gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' dag [#]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rgyur 'gyur te/_gnas skabs kyi [#]khyad par dang /_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa las so/_/de la gnas skabs kyi khyad par las ni de bzhin
[\[221b.4\]]gshegs pa'i gnas skabs ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs kyi [#]rgyu can yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa las ni ji ltar 'phags pa 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpar gyur pa nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang /_de las gzhan pa'i de bzhin
[\[221b.5\]]gshegs pa rnams ches thog ma kho nar byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du bcug par 'dod [#]pa yin no/_/de'i phyir de ltar 'bras bu mthar thug pa de'i rgyu gtso bor gyur pa la [#]ltos nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' las 'khrungs par bstan to/_/de nyid kyi
[\[221b.6\]]phyir rgyu phun sum tshogs pa ches brling ba yin pa'i phyir la/_rgyu la mchod pa brjod pas kyang 'bras bu la mchod pa don gyis 'phangs par dgongs te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sman gyi ljon shing chen po 'bras bu nges pa dpag tu med pa ster ba/_myu [#]gu la
[\[221b.7\]]sogs [#]mtho zhing lo ma 'jam pa'i gnas skabs su gyur pa ltar bsgrims te yongs su bskyang bar bya ba nyid du bstan par bya zhing /_dus der nye bar gyur cing [#]theg pa gsum la bkod pa'i sems can gyi phung po theg pa chen po nyid la nges par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]rnams la bsngags pa mdzad pa yin no/_/ji skad du 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las/_'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na zla ba tshes pa la phyag 'tshal ba ltar nya ba la ni ma yin no/_/'od srungs de bzhin du gang dag nga la rab tu dad pa de dag gis byang
[\[222a.2\]]chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag bya'i/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams las ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad byung ngo zhes
[\[222a.3\]]gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de'i phyir de ltar na rigs pa dang lung dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' las 'khrungs pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di bsgrubs pa yin no/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ci'i phyir [#]rgyu can zhig yin zhe na/_snying rje'i sems dang gnyis su med
[\[222a.4\]]blo dang /_/byang chub sems ni rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyu/_/zhes bya ba smos so/_/de la snying rje ni brtse ba ste/_'di nyid du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa dang rang gi ngo bo can no/_/gnyis su med pa'i blo ni/_dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i shes
[\[222a.5\]]rab po/_/byang chub kyi sems ni 'phags pa chos kun bgro ba'i mdo las/_byang chub sems dpas byang chub kyi sems las chos thams cad khong du chud par bgyi'o/_/chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o/_/glo bur du byung ba mi gnas pa chos thams cad ni shes
[\[222a.6\]]par bgyi ba tsam dang /_shes pa pos stong pa'i phyir yongs su shes par bgyi ba tsam du bas na chos nyid 'di lta bu 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du chud par bya'o snyam nas/_byang chub sems dpa' la sems gang skyes pa [#]'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes
[\[222a.7\]]bgyi'o/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems dang /_bla na med pa'i sems dang /_byams pas mnyen pa'i sems dang /_snying rjes mi zlog pa'i sems dang /_dga' bas 'gyod pa ma mchis pa'i sems dang /_btang snyoms kyis [#]dri ma ma mchis pa'i sems dang /_
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]stong pa nyid kyis mi 'gyur ba'i sems dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pas sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i sems dang /_smon pa ma mchis pas mi gnas pa'i sems zhes ji skad bstan pa bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo'i rgyu ni snying rje dang /_gnyis su med pa'i shes rab dang /_byang
[\[222b.2\]]chub kyi sems zhes bya ba chos gsum po 'di dag yin no/_/ji skad du rin po che'i phreng ba las/_de yi rtsa ba byang chub sems/_/ri dbang rgyal po ltar brtan dang /_/phyogs mtha' [#]gtugs pa'i snying rje dang /_/gnyis la mi brten ye shes lags/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang
[\[222b.3\]]chub kyi sems dang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes gnyis kyi rtsa ba yang snying rje yin pa'i phyir na snying rje gtso bo nyid du bstan par 'dod pas/_gang phyir brtse nyid rgyal ba'i lo thog phun tshogs 'di/_/sa bon dang ni spel la chur [#]'dra yun ring du/_/longs spyod gnas la smin pa lta bur 'dod
[\[222b.4\]]gyur pa/_/de phyir bdag gis thog mar snying rje bstod par bgyi/_/zhes bya ba [#]smos so/_/ji ltar phyi rol gyi [#]'bru la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa la/_thog ma dang bar dang tha ma rnams su sa bon dang chu dang smin pa rnams gtso bo nyid du gyur pas nye bar mkho ba nyid yin pa de bzhin du/_
[\[222b.5\]]snying rje kho na dus gsum car [#]du yang rgyal ba'i lo thog phun sum tshogs pa la nye bar mkho ba nyid du ston pa yin no/_/'di ltar snying rje can ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa ma lus pa yongs su bskyab par bya ba'i phyir/_gdon mi za
[\[222b.6\]]bar bdag gis 'jig rten 'di mtha' dag sdug bsngal nas bton te/_sangs rgyas nyid la nges par sbyar bar bya'o snyam du nges par sems skyed [#]par byed do/_/dam bca' ba 'di yang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes spangs pas sgrub par mi nus pas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la yang nges pa kho
[\[222b.7\]]nar 'jug ste/_de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon ni snying rje nyid yin no/_/ji skad du rin po che'i phreng ba las/_theg pa chen po gang zhig las[#]/_/snying rje sngon btang spyod pa kun/_/ye shes dri ma med bshad pa/_/sems yod su zhig de la smod[#]/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang
[\[223a\]]
