[\[301a.6\]]dang chos la dmigs pa'i yid bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba drug dang /_de bzhin du yid mi [#]bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba dang /_de bzhin du btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba ste/_de dag la brten pa dang /_sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams nye bar bzung nas bdag tu gdags [#]so/_/gang gi
[\[301a.7\]]phyir khams la sogs pa de rnams kyi sgo nas bdag tu gdags so zhes bya bar gsungs pa de'i phyir de [#]rnams dang de nyid ma yin te/_gzhan ma yin pa [#]nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de tshogs pa tsam nyid du yang rigs pa ma yin no/_/gang gi phyir ji skad bshad pa'i
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]chos de rnams bdag nyid du mi rung ba de'i phyir na chos de rnams la ngar 'dzin pa'i blo mi rigs so/_/gang gi tshe de ltar phung po rnams ngar 'dzin pa'i yul yang ma yin la/_phung po las tha dad pa yang yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir/_ngar 'dzin pa'i yul nyid yod pa ma yin pas/_rnal
[\[301b.2\]]'byor pas [#]bdag ma dmigs pa las bdag gi ba yang snying po dang ldan pa ma yin pa nyid du yongs su shes shing /_'dus byas mtha' dag bsal nas nye bar len pa med par mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_de'i phyir rnam par dpyod [#]pa 'di ches mdzes so/_/ngar 'dzin pa'i yul
[\[301b.3\]]ni phung po rnams dang sems yin no zhes bya ba gang gi phyogs yin pa de'i ltar na ji srid du phung po rnams 'byung ba de srid du ngar 'dzin pa 'jug par 'gyur te/_bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhi dngos po yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa/_bdag med rtogs tshe [#]rtag pa'i bdag spong zhing /_/
[\[301b.4\]]'di ni ngar 'dzin rten du'ang mi 'dod pa/_/de'i phyir bdag med shes pas bdag lta ba/_/cis kyang 'byin zhes smra ba shin tu mtshar/_/gal te bdag rtag pa dang ngar 'dzin pa'i yul yin na ni/_de med pas ngar 'dzin pa spong bar 'gyur ba zhig na/_ngar 'dzin pa'i yul na
[\[301b.5\]]ni gzhan yin zhing gzhan dngos po med par mthong ba las ngar 'dzin pa ldog go zhes bya ba ni kye ma ma la khyod kyis mdzes so/_/phan tshun 'brel pa med pa'i don 'di nyid dpe'i sgo nas gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bshad pa/_rang khyim rtsig phug sbrul gnas mthong bzhin du/_/'di ni [#]glang
[\[301b.6\]]chen med ces dogs bsal te/_/sbrul gyi 'jigs pa'ang spong bar byed pa ni/_/kye ma gzhan gyi gnas [#]por gyur nyid do/_/gang zhig 'jigs pa'i rkyen nyer zin kyang de la yod pa'i 'jigs pa ma mthong zhing phyir 'chos par mi byed pa spong ba [#]nyid kyis bdag nyid 'jigs pa med pa nyid du
[\[301b.7\]]mngon par byed pa de ni phebs pa rnyed pa nyid kyis na sbrul gyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi phyir glang po che med pas ni de'i sbrul gyi [#]'jigs pa sel bar mi nus so/_/de bzhin du phung po dag dang rnam par shes pa dag tu smra ba 'di'i ltar na yang /_rtag pa'i bdag med pas phung po'i
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]yul can gyi ngar 'dzin pa bsal bar mi nus te/_de'i phyir nges par 'di'i 'khor ba pa [#]nyid nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir de ltar bdag ni phung po'i rang bzhin can ma yin la/_phung po rnams las gzhan pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i phyogs
[\[302a.2\]]gnyis yang dag par bsgrubs nas bdag gi yod pa nyid ni rten dang brten pa nyid du yang med par brjod pa'i phyir bshad pa/_phung po bdag yod ma yin bdag la yang /_/phung po de rnams yod min gang phyir 'dir/_/gzhan nyid yod na rtog pa 'dir 'gyur na/_/gzhan nyid de med de
[\[302a.3\]]phyir 'di rtog [#]pa'o/_/gzhan nyid yod na ni rten dang brten pa'i dngos por rigs par 'gyur te/_dper na 'khar gzhong na zho yod do zhes bya ba lta bu'o/_/'khar gzhong dang zho gnyis ni 'jig rten na gzhan nyid yin pa na rten dang brten pa'i dngos po [#]mthong ngo /_/phung po rnams
[\[302a.4\]]ni de ltar bdag las tha dad pa ma yin la bdag kyang phung po rnams las tha dad pa ma yin pas de gnyis la rten dang brten pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin no/_/phung po dang ldan pa nyid kyang bdag la ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa/_bdag ni gzugs ldan mi
[\[302a.5\]]'dod gang phyir bdag_/yod min de phyir ldan don sbyor ba med/_/gzhan ni [#]gnag ldan gzhan min gzugs ldan na/_/bdag ni gzugs las de nyid gzhan nyid med/_/bdag phung po rnams [#]de nyid dang gzhan nyid yin pa ni sngar bkag zin la/_ldan pa'i skyon [#]yang lha sbyin gzugs
[\[302a.6\]]dang ldan no zhes bya ba de ni tha mi dad pa nyid la dmigs la/_ba lang dang ldan no zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa yin na/_de nyid dang gzhan nyid de dag ni gzugs [#]bdag la yod pa ma yin pas bdag gzugs dang ldan no zhes bya ba 'di yang mi srid do/_/da ni bkag zin pa'i phyogs rnams
[\[302a.7\]]bsdams [#]te bstan pas 'jig [#]tshogs la lta ba dmigs pa dang rnam pa log pa la 'jug par grangs kyi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa/_gzugs bdag ma yin bdag ni gzugs ldan min/_/gzugs la bdag med bdag la'ang gzugs yod min/_/de ltar rnam
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]bzhir phung kun shes bya ste/_/de dag bdag tu lta ba nyi shur 'dod/_/phung po lnga po bdag dang bral ba dag la 'jig tshogs la lta bas rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas bdag nyid du bzung ba na 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i cha nyi shur 'gyur ro/_/gal te rnam par dpyad pa rnam pa lnga la [#]skabs
[\[302b.2\]]su bab la/_bstan bcos las kyang /_phung min phung po las gzhan min/_/de la phung med der de med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phung ldan min/_/[#]de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig yin/_/zhes gsungs pa ma yin nam/_de'i phyir 'dir cha [#]lngar 'gyur na/_cha nyi shu'i ji skad
[\[302b.3\]]brjod ce na/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i cha de dag ni mdo sde las rnam par gzhag la des kyang phung po rnams ma bzung bar bdag tu mngon par zhen par mi nus pas rnam pa [#]bzhi'i sgo nas phung po rnams la dmigs shing 'jug go/_/'di ltar phung po ma gtogs par ni 'ga' la yang
[\[302b.4\]]bdag tu mngon par zhen pa med pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rnam pa lnga pa mi srid do/_/de'i phyir 'jig tshogs la lta ba ni cha nyi shu kho na'o/_/bstan bcos las lnga pa gzhan pa nyid kyi phyogs su [#]gsungs pa ni mu stegs pa'i lugs dgag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar shes par bya'o/_/
[\[302b.5\]]de la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so zhes gang lung las gsungs pa ni/_lta ri bdag med rtogs pa'i rdo rje yis/_/bcom bdag gang dang lhan cig 'jig 'gyur ba/_/'jig
[\[302b.6\]]tshogs lta ri lhun sdug [#]la gnas pa'i/_/rtse mo mtho bar gyur pa 'di dag go/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri bo 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje ma babs pas nyin re bzhin nyon mongs pa'i brag rdo 'phel ba/_'khor ba thog ma med pa nas byung ba/_dpangs khams gsum
[\[302b.7\]]du mtho ba/_phyogs kyi ngos ma lus par khyab pa/_ma rig pa'i gser gyi sa gzhi las 'thon [#]pa/_bdag med pa khong du chud pa'i rdo rjes bshig pa na/_rtse mo ches mtho ba gang dag dang lhan cig 'jig par 'gyur ba de dag ni rtse mo yin par shes par bya'o/_/da ni 'phags pa
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]mang pos bkur ba [#]dag gis brtags pa'i gang zag rdzas su yod par smra ba bsal ba'i phyir bshad pa/_kha cig de nyid gzhan nyid rtag mi rtag_/la sogs brjod med gang zag rdzas yod 'dod/_/rnam shes drug gi shes byar [#]de 'dod cing /_/de ni
[\[303a.2\]]ngar 'dzin gzhir yang 'dod pa yin/_/de la re zhig phung po ma gtogs de 'dzin ma grub phyir/_/gang zag phung po dag las gzhan du ni mi 'gyur ro/_/phung po'i rang bzhin can yang ma yin te/_skye ba dang 'jig pa dang ldan pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i phyir de ltar na
[\[303a.3\]]phung po dag las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod du med do/_/ji ltar de nyid dang gzhan nyid du ma yin pa de bzhin du rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du yang brjod du med do/_/rnam par shes pa drug gis [#]shes pa yang yin no/_/gang zag de ni rdzas su yod pa nyid du yang rigs te/_de la byed
[\[303a.4\]]pa po nyid dang za ba po nyid du brjod pa'i phyir dang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_bcings pa dang thar pa dang 'brel ba can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i yul nyid du yang 'dod do/_/smra ba 'di yang mi rigs pa nyid du bshad pa/_gang phyir gzugs las
[\[303a.5\]]sems brjod med mi rtogs/_/dngos yod brjod med rtogs pa ma yin nyid/_/gal te bdag 'ga' dngos por grub 'gyur na/_/sems ltar grub dngos brjod du med mi 'gyur/_/de'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'dis/_brjod du med pa la rdzas su yod pa nyid mi srid par bstan
[\[303a.6\]]nas/_btags par yod pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa/_gang phyir khyod bum dngos por ma grub pa'i/_/ngo bo gzugs sogs las brjod med 'gyur bas/_/bdag gang phung po las brjod med 'gyur te/_/rang gis yod par grub par rtogs mi bya/_/bum pa gzugs la
[\[303a.7\]]sogs pa dag las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod du med cing btags par yod par 'dod pa de bzhin du/_bdag kyang bum pa ltar btags par yod par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa'o/_/de'i phyir de ltar tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis dgag pa dang sgrub pa nye bar bstan [#]nas/_
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]da ni de nyid dang gzhan nyid dag dngos po'i rten nyid du brjod nas dngos po'i chos kyi rten can ma yin pa nyid kyis bdag 'gog par rtsom pa/_khyod kyi rnam shes rang bdag las gzhan ni/_/mi [#]'dod gzugs sogs las gzhan dngos 'dod cing /_/dngos la rnam pa de gnyis
[\[303b.2\]]mthong gyur pa/_/de phyir bdag med dngos chos dang bral phyir/_/gal te khyod kyi ltar bdag rdzas su yod par gyur na ni de gdon mi za bar rnam par shes pa ltar rang gi bdag nyid las gzhan ma yin par 'gyur zhing gzugs la sogs pa dag las tha dad pa'i ngo bo zhig tu 'gyur na/_
[\[303b.3\]]'di ni yod pa yang ma yin no/_/de'i phyir dngos po'i chos dag gi rten can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir bum pa ltar bdag yod pa ma yin no/_/gang gi phyir de ltar rnam par dpyad pa na gang zag rdzas su yod pa nyid du mi rigs pa/_de phyir ngar 'dzin rten ni dngos pos [#]min/_/phung las
[\[303b.4\]]gzhan min phung po'i ngo bo min/_/phung po rten min 'di ni de ldan min/_/ngar 'dzin pa'i yul ni nges par gzhig [#]pa na rdzas su yod par mi rigs shing /_phung po las tha dad par yang mi rung la/_phung po'i rang bzhin can yang ma yin zhing /_phung po rnams kyi rten yang ma
[\[303b.5\]]yin no/_/yang na 'di la rten phung po yod pas na phung po la rten [#]zhes bya ba [#]ste/_rten dang brten [#]pa'i phyogs gnyi ga gsal bar bya ba'i phyir tshig bsdu ba gnyi ga la brten to/_/bdag ni phung po dang ldan par [#]yang mi rigs so/_/de'i phyir bdag btags [#]pa'am/_ma dmigs
[\[303b.6\]]par 'dod pas kyang rung ste/_ji skad smras pa'i rnam pa dag gis bdag khas blang bar mi bya'o zhes bshad pa ni/_'di ni phung po rnams rten [#]grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba'o/_/ji ltar 'di la brten [#]nas 'di 'byung zhes bya ba 'di tsam zhig kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rnam par gzhag
[\[303b.7\]]pa ma chad par bya ba'i phyir khas len gyi rgyu med la sogs pa dag las skye ba ma yin pa de bzhin du/_'dir yang brten [#]nas gdags pa la yang dag par brten pa na ji skad bshad pa'i skyon dang ldan pa'i rnam pa bsal nas phung po rnams la brten nas gdags pa zhes bya [#]'di tsam zhig
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]'jig rten gyi tha snyad rnam par gnas par bya ba'i phyir khas blang bar bya ste/_bdag tu tha snyad btags pa mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/bdag btags pa tsam du grub par bya ba'i don du ji skad bshad pa'i don nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir phyi rol gyi dpe ston zhing bshad pa/_
[\[304a.2\]]shing rta rang yan lag las gzhan 'dod min/_/gzhan min ma yin de ldan yang min zhing /_/yan lag la min yan lag dag der min/_/'dus pa tsam min dbyibs min ji bzhin no/_/de'i phyir [#]'dir de nyid kyi phyogs dang gzhan nyid kyi phyogs dang /_rten [#]gyi phyogs dang brten
[\[304a.3\]]pa'i phyogs dang /_de dang ldan pa'i phyogs te phyogs lnga po dag ni sngar bstan zin pa nyid do/_/tshogs pa'i phyogs dang dbyibs kyi phyogs gnyis ni bsgrub par bya dgos pas de dag ston pa brtsam par bya ste/_gal te tshogs tsam shing rtar 'gyur na ni/_/sil bur gnas la shing
[\[304a.4\]]rta nyid yod gyur/_/'di ni sngar bshad du zin kyang slar yang nye bar bkod de skyon gzhan brjod pa'i sgo nas gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de nyid kyi phyir/_gang phyir yan lag can med yan lag dag_/med pas dbyibs tsam shing rtar rigs pa'ang min/_/zhes bya ba smos so/_/
[\[304a.5\]]gang gi [#]phyir yan lag can med na yan lag dag yod pa ma yin pa'i [#]phyir yan lag dag med pa nyid do/_/de'i phyir gang dag gi tshogs pa zhig shing rtar gyur[#]/_'ang gi sgra ni bsdu ba'i don te/_dbyibs tsam yang shing rtar mi rigs la tshogs pa tsam po'ang mi rigs so zhes
[\[304a.6\]]shes par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/ga las she na/_gang gi phyir yan lag can med na yan lag dag med pas so/_/de'i phyir dbyibs tsam zhig shing rtar mi rung ngo /_/yan lag can med pa nyid du ni de dag gi rang nyid kyis khas blangs pa yin no/_/gzhan yang gal te dbyibs tsam
[\[304a.7\]]zhig shing rtar 'dod na dbyibs de yan lag dag gi'am/_tshogs pa'i yin par rtog grang /_de la yan lag gi dbyibs kyi khyad par yin par 'dod na yang sngar gyi dbyibs kyi khyad par ma btang ba dag gi'am/_sngar gyi dbyibs kyi khyad par btang ba dag gi yin par 'gyur grang na/_
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]de la gal te gong ma shos [#]'dod na ni de mi rigs so/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod dbyibs yan lag re re sngar yod gyur/_/ji bzhin shing rtar rtogs la'ang de bzhin na/_/bye bar gyur pa de dag la ji ltar/_/da lta yang ni shing rta yod ma yin/_/gal te shing rta'i gnas skabs kyi gong rol
[\[304b.2\]]na 'phang [#]lo la sogs pa'i dbyibs kyi khyad par ji ltar yod par gyur pa de kho na ltar shing rta nyid kyi dus su'ang 'phang [#]lo la sogs pa rnams kyi dbyibs kyi khyad par yin na ni de'i tshe yan lag bye [#]bar gyur pa dag la med pa ltar shing rta nyid kyi dus na'ang shing rta yod pa ma yin par nges par bya ste/_
[\[304b.3\]]de'i yan lag gi dbyibs tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro/_/ci ste phyogs gnyis pa ste dbyibs gzhan kho na shing rta zhes bya bar 'gyur na/_de lta na yang /_da lta gal te shing rta nyid [#]dus 'dir/_/'phang lo sogs la [#]dbyibs tha dad yod na/_/'di gzung [#]'gyur na de yang yod min te/_/de phyir
[\[304b.4\]]dbyibs tsam shing rtar yod ma yin/_/gal te 'phang lo dang srog shing dang gzer bu la sogs pa shing rta'i yan lag rnams kyi dbyibs kyi khyad par [#]so sor lham pa dang /_ring ba dang zlum po la sogs pa gang zhig sngar yod par gyur pa de las de dag gi dbyibs kyi khyad par gzhan zhig kho na shing
[\[304b.5\]]rta nyid kyi dus su skye bar 'gyur na ni/_de bzung du yod par 'gyur na bzung ba yang ma yin no/_/ji [#]ltar rtsibs dang mu khyud dang lte ba la sogs pa'i khyad par du gyur pa'i dbyibs can 'phang lo la ni shing rta'i gnas skabs na rang gi dbyibs gzhan du gyur pa nyid ma mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du
[\[304b.6\]]srog shing la sogs pa de dag gi lham pa nyid la sogs pa yang gzhan nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/de [#]phyir yan lag rnams kyi dbyibs shing rta'o zhes bya ba mi rigs so/_/ci ste 'phang lo la sogs pa tshogs pa rnams kyi dbyibs kyi khyad par shing rta yin no snyam na/_de yang mi rigs
[\[304b.7\]]so zhes bshad pa/_gang phyir khyod kyi tshogs pa cang med pas/_/dbyibs de yan lag tshogs kyi ma yin na/_/gang zhig ci yang ma yin de brten nas/_/'dir ni dbyibs su lta zhig ci ltar 'gyur/_/gal te tshogs pa zhes bya ba dngos po cung zad cig yod na ni de'i rten [#]can dbyibs
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]su gdags par 'gyur na/_yan lag tshogs la [#]zhes bya ba ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no/_/gang zhig cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pa de'i rten can gyi dbyibs su gdags par yang ji ltar 'gyur te btags pa ni rdzas kyi rten can kho nar khas blangs pa'i phyir
[\[305a.2\]]ro/_/ci ste mi bden du zin kyang tshogs pa la brten nas mi bden pa'i dbyibs su 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'dod na de lta yin dang /_khyod kyi 'di ni ji ltar 'dod de ltar/_/mi bden pa yi rgyu la brten byas nas/_/'bras bu'i rnam pa mi bden rang bzhin can/_/thams cad kyang ni skye bar shes par
[\[305a.3\]]gyis/_/ma rig pa mi bden pa la brten nas 'du byed mi bden pa'i rang bzhin can kho na skye la/_mi bden pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sa bon la brten nas myu gu mi bden pa'i rang bzhin can skye ba de [#]bzhin du rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo mi bden pa'i rang bzhin can ma lus pa yang rtogs par bya ste/_
[\[305a.4\]]'bad rtsol brgya phrag dag gis kyang gang gis sha dag za bar mi nus pa'i dngos po grib ma'i ri dwags lta bu la mngon par zhen pa don med pa 'dis [#]ci zhig bya ste[#]/_'dis ni gzugs sogs de ltar gnas rnams la/_/bum blo zhes bya'ang rigs [#]pa ma yin nyid/_/de la kha cig na re/_
[\[305a.5\]]gzugs la sogs pa de ltar gnas pa rnams la bum pa la sogs pa'i blor 'gyur ro zhes smra ba de yang shing rta'i dpe 'dis bsal ba yin no/_/gzhan yang /_skye ba med pas gzugs sogs kyang yod min/_/de yi phyir yang de dag dbyibs mi rigs/_/ji ltar gzugs la sogs
[\[305a.6\]]pa rnams la skye ba yod pa ma yin pa de ltar ni sngar bshad zin to/_/de'i phyir skye ba med pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa dag yod pa ma yin no/_/ji [#]ltar yod pa ma yin pa rnams bum pa la sogs pa dag gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid du rigs par 'gyur/_de'i phyir rdzas kyi nye bar len
[\[305a.7\]]pa can du 'dod pa bum pa la sogs pa dag mi rigs pas/_bum pa la sogs pa dag gzugs la sogs pa'i dbyibs kyi khyad par gyi bdag nyid can ma yin no/_/'dir smras pa/_gal te 'o na shing rta 'di ji skad bshad pa'i tshul du rnam pa bdun gyis btsal ba na yod pa ma yin
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]pa de'i tshe shing rta med pas gang zhig shing rtas 'jig rten na tha snyad 'dogs pa de rgyun chad par 'gyur na/_shing rta 'on cig_/shing rta nyos shig_/shing rta chos shig ces bya ba la sogs pa mthong ba yang yin no/_/de'i phyir 'jig rten la grags pa'i phyir na/_shing rta la sogs pa dag
[\[305b.2\]]ni yod pa nyid do/_/brjod par bya ste/_nyes pa 'di ni khyod kho na la 'gyur te/_'di ltar sngar bshad pa'i tshul du rnam pa bdun gyis btsal ba na shing rta mi 'thad cing /_khyod kyis kyang rnam par dpyad nas dngos po grub par rnam par 'jog par byed la/_grub pa'i thabs gzhan yang
[\[305b.3\]]khas ma blangs pa de'i phyir na shing rta 'on cig ces bya ba de lta bu [#]la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad khyod la ci ltar grub par 'gyur/_kho bo cag la ni nyes pa 'di med de/_gang gi phyir/_de ni de nyid du'am 'jig rten du/_/rnam pa bdun gyis 'grub 'gyur min mod kyi/_/rnam
[\[305b.4\]]dpyad med par 'jig rten nyid las 'dis[#]/_/rang gi yan lag brten nas 'dogs pa yin/_/shing rta rang [#]yan lag las gzhan 'dod min/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul 'di [#]de rnam pa bdun du btsal ba na/_don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu shing rta 'grub par mi 'gyur mod kyi/_
[\[305b.5\]]de lta na yang 'di ni rnam par dpyad pa spangs te/_sngon po la sogs pa dang tshor ba la sogs pa ltar 'jig rten nyid las 'phang lo la sogs pa yan lag rnams la brten nas 'dogs pa yin no/_/de'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rkyen nyid 'di pa tsam khas blangs pa ltar brten
[\[305b.6\]]nas brtags pa khas blangs pa'i phyir kho bo cag gi phyogs la 'jig rten gyi tha snyad chad par thal bar mi 'gyur la/_pha rol pos kyang 'di nyid khas blang bar 'os pa yin no/_/phyogs 'dir 'jig rten la grags pa'i sgo nas shing rtas tha snyad 'dogs pa ches gsal bar
[\[305b.7\]]grub pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/_'di'i ming gi khyad par gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rnam par dpyad pa med par 'jig rten la grags pa'i sgo nas khas blang bar bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_de nyid yan lag can te cha shas can/_/shing rta de nyid byed po zhes 'gror bsnyad/_/skye bo
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]rnams la len po nyid du'ang grub/_/de la shing rta ni 'phang lo la sogs pa rang gi yan lag la ltos nas yan lag can nyid du 'gyur ro/_/'phang lo la sogs pa cha shas la ltos nas ni cha shas can nyid do/_/'phang lo la sogs pa nye bar blang ba nye bar len pa'i bya
[\[306a.2\]]ba la ltos nas ni byed pa po nyid do/_/rang gi nye bar len pa la ltos nas ni nye bar len pa po nyid do/_/gang 'ga' zhig gsung rab kyi don phyin ci log tu rtogs pas yan lag tshogs pa tsam zhig yod kyi yan lag can ni rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin te/_de las tha dad par ma dmigs
[\[306a.3\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du cha shas tsam zhig yod kyi cha shas can ni med do/_/las 'ba' zhig kho na yod kyi byed pa po ni med do/_/nye bar len pa las tha dad par ma dmigs pa'i phyir nye bar len pa kho na yod kyi nye bar len pa po ni med do zhes de lta bur rnam par gnas pa ni [#]'jig rten gyi kun
[\[306a.4\]]rdzob phyin ci log tu smra ba de'i ltar na gtan tshigs de nyid kyis yan lag la sogs pa tsam yang med par thal bar 'gyur bas/_'jig rten grags pa'i kun rdzob ma brlag cig_/ces 'di ni bzlog par bya ba kho na'o/_/gang gi phyir 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob 'di de ltar rnam par dpyad pa
[\[306a.5\]]na yod par mi 'gyur zhing [#]ma brtags par grags pas yod pa de nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor pas rim pa 'di nyid kyis 'di la rnam par dpyod pa na ches myur ba kho nar de kho na nyid kyi gting dpogs par 'gyur ro/_/ci ltar zhe na/_rnam bdun gyis med gang de ji lta bur/_/yod ces rnal
[\[306a.6\]]'byor pas 'di'i yod mi rnyed/_/des de nyid la'ang bde blag 'jug 'gyur bas/_/'dir de'i grub pa de bzhin 'dod par bya/_/nye bar rtogs [#]pa'i rnal 'byor pa la gal te shing rta zhes bya ba'i dngos po rang bzhin gyis grub pa 'ga' zhig yod par 'gyur na ni the tshom med par de
[\[306a.7\]]rnam pa bdun las rnam pa gang yang rung ba zhig gi [#]bdag nyid yod pa rnyed par 'gyur ba zhig na/_rnyed pa yang ma yin no/_/de'i phyir shing rta zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i ling thog gis nyams par byas pa dag kho nas brtags pa yin gyi/_rang bzhin gyis [#]grub pa ni yod pa ma yin no snyam du de
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]ltar nges pa skye bar 'gyur zhing de kho na nyid la yang rnal 'byor pa bde blag tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/'ang gi sgras ni kun rdzob nyams par [#]yang mi 'gyur ba ste/_de'i phyir 'di ni ma brtags par grags par [#]grub par 'dod par bya'o/_/mkhas pa dag gis phyogs 'di ni skyon med cing phan yon dang
[\[306b.2\]]bcas pa'o snyam du bsams te gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya'o/_/'dir smras pa rnal 'byor pas shing rta mi [#]dmigs la rags mod de'i yan lag tshogs pa tsam zhig dmigs pa ni yod pa ma yin no/_/bshad par bya ste/_gang zhig snam bu tshig na thal ba la snal ma tshol ba khyod ni
[\[306b.3\]]bzhad gad du bya ba zhig ste/_shing rta yod nyid min na de yi tshe/_/yan lag can med de'i yan lag kyang med/_/gal te shing rta zhig na de'i [#]'phang lo la sogs pa tshogs pa [#]dmigs pa nyid ma yin nam/_de'i phyir yan lag can med par yan lag dag kyang med do zhes ci ste brjod ce
[\[306b.4\]]na/_de ni de ltar ma yin te/_rtog [#]pa po shing rta dang 'brel par rig pa kho nas 'phang lo la sogs pa 'di dag ni shing rta yin no snyam du rtogs kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin te/_des ni rang gi cha shas la ltos nas 'phang lo la sogs pa dag kho na yan lag can nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[306b.5\]]'phang lo la sogs pa rnams shing rta dang 'brel pa yang rgyang ring du spangs pa kho na yin pas de'i tshe de dag shing rta'i yan lag tu mi rtogs so/_/gzhan yang don 'di ni dpe 'di las shes par bya ste/_shing rta tshig na yan lag med dpe bzhin/_/blo mes yan lag can sreg [#]yan
[\[306b.6\]]lag go/_/dper na shing rta yan lag can mes tshig na de'i yan lag dag [#]kyang nges par tshig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par dpyod pa'i gtsub [#]shing gtsubs pa las byung ba blo'i me mi dmigs pa'i sreg par byed pa can gyis shing rta lus pa med par bsregs pas [#]na shes rab kyi me'i bud shing
[\[306b.7\]]du gyur pa yan lag dag gis kyang bdag nyid zug tshugs par mi byed de nges par bsregs pa'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa mi gcad [#]par bya ba'i phyir dang /_rnal 'byor pa rnams de kho na nyid la bde blag tu 'jug par bya ba'i phyir shing rta rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul la bsams [# ]
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]te brten nas gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa/_de bzhin 'jig rten grags pas phung po dang /_/khams dang de bzhin skye mched drug brten nas/_/bdag kyang nye bar len po nyid du 'dod/_/ji ltar 'phang lo la sogs pa dag la brten nas shing rtar 'dogs shing
[\[307a.2\]]der 'phang lo la sogs pa dag nye bar len pa yin la shing rta nye bar len pa po yin pa de bzhin du/_bdag kyang kun rdzob kyi bden par 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kun tu mi gcad [#]par bya ba'i phyir shing rta ltar nye bar len pa por 'dod pa yin no/_/phung po lnga [#]dang khams drug dang skye mched drug ni bdag
[\[307a.3\]]de'i nye bar len pa ste/_phung po la sogs pa rnams la brten nas bdag tu btags [#]pa'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar 'phang lo la sogs pa dag shing rta'i nye bar len pa yin pa de bzhin du phung po la sogs pa rnams kyang bdag gi nye bar len pa'o zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar nye bar len pa dang nye bar
[\[307a.4\]]len pa po'i rnam par gzhag pa 'di 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du 'di'i las dang byed pa po'i rnam par gzhag pa yang shing rta ltar khas blang bar [#]bya'o zhes bshad pa/_nyer len las yin 'di ni byed pa po yang yin/_/nye bar len pa zhes bya ba phung po la sogs pa dag
[\[307a.5\]]ni las nyid dang bdag ni byed pa po [#]zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag go/_/brten nas gdags pa la yang dag par brten pa na bdag rnam pa thams cad du brtan pa dang mi brtan pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa'i rten [#]ma yin pa nyid pas rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa zlog pa sla bar
[\[307a.6\]]'gyur ro zhes bshad pa/_dngos yod min phyir 'di ni brtan min zhing /_/mi brtan nyid min 'di ni skye 'jig min/_/'di la rtag pa nyid la sogs pa yang /_/yod min de nyid dang ni gzhan nyid med/_/phung po dag la brten nas gdags pa'i bdag 'di ni brten pa nyid kyang ma yin zhing mi brtan
[\[307a.7\]]pa nyid kyang ma yin no/_/de la gal te bdag mi brtan pa yin na ni de'i tshe/_nye bar len nyid bdag ma yin/_/de dag 'byung dang 'jig pa yin/_/nye bar blangs pa [#]ci lta bur/_/nye bar len po yin par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin du/_ma byung ba las 'byung min te/_/'di la skyon du
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]thal bar 'gyur/_/bdag ni byas par 'gyur ba 'am[#]/_/'byung ba'ang rgyu med can du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba'ang [#]bstan bcos dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/_/de nyid kyi phyir/_gal te phung po bdag yin na/_/skye dang 'jig pa can du 'gyur na skye zhing 'jig pa can du 'dod pa'ang ma yin te/_
[\[307b.2\]]de'i phyir phung po bdag ma yin no zhes bya ba'i thal bar 'gyur ba 'di yang 'thad par 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir 'di ni mi brtan pa nyid du yang mi 'thad do/_/de bzhin du brtan par yang mi 'thad de/_ji skad du/_'das pa'i dus ni [#]byung gyur zhes/_/bya ba 'di ni mi 'thad do/_/sngon
[\[307b.3\]]tshe rnams su gang byung ba/_/de nyid de ni ma yin no/_/de nyid bdag tu 'gyur snyam na/_/nye bar len pa tha dad 'gyur/_/nye bar len las ma gtogs par/_/khyod kyi bdag ni gang zhig yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/skye dang 'jig pa can du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba'i thal bar
[\[307b.4\]]'gyur ba 'di nyid las na 'di ni skye 'jig min zhes bya ba'i khyad par gnyis slob dpon gyi [#]bzhed pa yin no/_/'di la rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'ang yod pa min te/_ji [#]skad du slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa brtags [#]pa'i thabs kyis bdag yongs su rtogs par mdzad
[\[307b.5\]]pa na/_rtag dang mi rtag la sogs bzhi/_/zhi ba 'di la ga la yod/_/mtha' dang mtha' med la sogs bzhi/_/zhi ba 'di la ga la yod/_/gang gis de bzhin gshegs yod ces/_/'dzin pa stug po bzung gyur pa/_/de ni mya ngan 'das pa la/_/med ces rnam rtog rtog par byed/_/
[\[307b.6\]]rang bzhin gyis ni stong de la/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das nas ni/_/yod do zhe 'am med do zhes/_/bsam pa 'thad pa nyid mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/'di ni phung po dag las de nyid dang /_gzhan nyid du yod pa yang ma yin te/_ji skad du/_gal te phung po bdag yin na/_/
[\[307b.7\]]skye dang 'jig pa can du 'gyur/_/gal te phung po rnams las gzhan/_/phung po'i mtshan nyid med par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du/_shing nyid me ni ma yin te/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/yang ci'i phyir mi brtan pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa 'di rnams
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]bdag la mi rung zhe na/_dngos yod min phyir zhes bya ba smos te/_gal te bdag dngos po'i rang bzhin can [#]'ga' zhig yod na ni de la mi brtan pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa rnams yod par 'gyur ba zhig na/_bdag ni 'ga' yang med de/_de
[\[308a.2\]]med pa kho na'i phyir ro/_/ji skad du mdo las/_mi bzad pa yi chos bzhi ni/_/'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste/_/sems can nam mkha' byang chub sems/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams so/_/gal te de dag rdzas yod na/_/de dag yongs su zad 'gyur grang /_/
[\[308a.3\]]med pa de dag mi zad de/_/de phyir de dag zad med gsungs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/gang zhig rnam pa bdun gyis btsal na/_rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du mi srid cing gang zhig gi med pa nyid ma mthong zhing ma rig pa'i dbang gis yod pa nyid du zhen par byas nas 'jig tshogs
[\[308a.4\]]la lta bas 'di ni bdag go snyam du mngon par zhen pa rnams 'khor bar 'gyur la/_gang la rtag tu 'gro rnams ngar [#]'dzin blo/_/rab tu 'byung zhing de yi gang yin der/_/nga yi 'dzin blo 'byung ba'i bdag de ni/_/ma brtags [#]grags par gti mug las yin no/_/gang
[\[308a.5\]]zhig yongs su tshol ba ni [#]mu stegs pa de'i rigs pas mi 'thad pas de'i rang bzhin la phyin ci log tu gyur pa thams cad phung po las tha dad par zhen zhing /_rang gi sde pa rnams kyis kyang phung po las tha dad par bdag med do snyam du 'khrul pas phung po tsam nyid bdag tu khas
[\[308a.6\]]blangs pa[#]/_de bzhin gshegs pas nye bar bstan pa phyin ci ma log par khong du chud pa rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid do snyam du rig par byas nas lan brgyar yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba de ni bdag yin zhing /_'gro ba mi dang yi dwags dang dud 'gro la sogs pa'i
[\[308a.7\]]'gro bar gnas pa mi shes pa dang rjes su 'brel ba mtha' dag la rtag tu gang zhig la ngar 'dzin pa'i blo 'byung ba de dag [#]yin par rig [#]par bya la/_gang du 'di dbang byed pa nyid dam 'brel pa 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur ba [#]'di gdags pa'i rkyen [#]mig la sogs pa nang gi bdag
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]nyid can dang /_phyi rol gang yin pa der bdag gir 'dzin pa'i blo 'byung ba bdag de ni [#]shes pa las grub pa yin gyi rang gi ngo bos grub pa ni ma yin no/_/gang gi phyir 'di yod pa ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang gti mug las tha snyad 'dogs pa de nyid kyi phyir/_rnal 'byor pa dag gis
[\[308b.2\]]rnam pa thams cad du mi [#]dmigs la/_de ma dmigs na yang mig la sogs pa de'i nye bar len pa rnams mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar rnal 'byor pas ni dngos po 'ga' la yang rang gi ngo bo dmigs pa med de/_de'i phyir 'khor ba las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/ji skad du/_
[\[308b.3\]]nang dang phyi rol nyid dag la/_/bdag dang bdag gi snyam zad na/_/nye bar len pa 'gag 'gyur zhing /_/de zad pas na skye ba zad/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang ji ltar na [#]bdag med na bdag gi ba [#]yang med ce na/_bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa/_gang phyir byed po med can las med pa/_/de
[\[308b.4\]]phyir bdag gi bdag med par yod min/_/de phyir bdag dang bdag gi stong lta zhing /_/rnal 'byor pa de rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar rdza mkhan med par bum pa yang [#]mi srid pa de bzhin du bdag med par bdag gi ba yang ma yin no/_/de'i phyir bdag dang bdag gi nye bar ma
[\[308b.5\]]dmigs pas 'khor ba ma gzigs pa na rnal 'byor pa grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs la sogs pa ma dmigs na ni de la der gtogs pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams mi 'byung bas/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams len pa med par mya ngan las 'da' bar rnam par
[\[308b.6\]]gzhag la/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag med par mthong du zin kyang snying rje'i gzhan gyi dbang gis byang chub kyi bar du sred pa'i rgyun 'dzin par byed pas mkhas pas ji skad bshad pa'i bdag med pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o/_/ji ltar bdag dang de'i nye bar len pa
[\[308b.7\]]gdags pa shing rta'i rnam par dpyad pa dang mtshungs pa de bzhin du/_dngos po gzhan rnams kyi'ang yin no zhes bsgre ba'i phyir/_bum pa snam bu re lde dmag dang nags tshal phreng ba ljon shing dang /_/khang khyim shing rta phran dang 'gron gnas la [#]sogs dngos rnams gang dag dang /_/
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]zhes bya ba smos te/_de rnams shing rta'i rnam dpyad byas pas rnam bdun yod min [#]zhing /_/de las gzhan du gyur par 'jig rten grags pa'i sgo nas yod pa yin/_/zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro/_/gang yang de lta bu'i rigs can gyi dngos po gzhan/_de bzhin
[\[309a.2\]]gang dag sgo nas skye 'dis bsnyad pa de rnams rtogs bya ste/_ma brtags par grags pa kho nar ro/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang phyir thub dbang de ni 'jig rten lhan cig rtsod mi mdzad phyir ro/_/'jig rten [#]nga dang lhan cig rtsod kyi nga ni 'jig rten dang mi rtsod do zhes bya ba'i lung las na 'jig rten
[\[309a.3\]]gyi grags pa la gnod par mi bya'o/_/yang 'jig rten dngos po gang dag gis ji ltar tha snyad 'dogs she na/_de bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa/_yon tan yan lag 'dod chags mtshan nyid dang ni bud shing la sogs dang /_/yon tan can yan lag can chags dang mtshan
[\[309a.4\]]gzhi me la sogs don dag_/de rnams shing rta'i rnam dpyad byas pas rnam bdun yod pa ma yin zhing /_/de las gzhan du gyur par 'jig rten grags pa'i sgo nas yod pa yin/_/ji ltar bum pa yan lag can yin la gyo mo la sogs pa de [#]dag de'i yan lag yin zhing /_bum pa yon tan
[\[309a.5\]]can yin la me ris sngo bsangs la sogs pa dag 'di'i yon tan yin zhing /_bum pa mtshan gzhi yin la lto smad ldir ba dang mchu 'phyang ba dang mgrin pa ring ba nyid la sogs pa dag de'i mtshan nyid yin pa de bzhin du/_snam bu la sogs pa rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/'dod chags
[\[309a.6\]]ni lhag par zhen pa'o/_/chags pa ni 'dod chags kyi rten [#]no/_/me ni sreg par byed pa'o/_/bud shing ni bsreg bya'o/_/de la yan lag rgyur byas nas yan lag can du gdags [#]la yan lag can la ltos nas yan lag dag [#]'dogs pas shing rta'i dpe dang mtshungs te/_bud
[\[309a.7\]]shing la ltos nas me yin la de la ltos nas bud shing yin pa'i bar du'o/_/'di ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad yin gyi 'di la dpyad na [#]mi gzhug go/_/yan lag la sogs pa rnams phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa yin pa [#]'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/_rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis kyang phan tshun
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]ltos pa yin no zhes bshad pa/_gang gi phyir/_gal te rgyu yis bskyed par bya bskyed de lta na de rgyu yin zhing /_/gal te 'bras bu mi bskyed na ni de med rgyu med can du 'gyur/_/'bras bu yang ni rgyu yod gyur na skye bar 'gyur ba de yi phyir/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu 'di gnyis kyang de las gzhan yod na
[\[309b.2\]]cig shos yod pa nyid yin no zhes shes par bya'o/_/[#]rgyu dang 'bras bu dag rang bzhin gyis yod pa nyid ni ma yin no/_/ci ste khyed [#]de gnyis rang gi ngo bos grub par sems na kye/_/gang las gang zhig 'gyur ba gang zhig las sngar gang zhig 'gyur de smos/_/ci rgyu'am 'bras bu sngar
[\[309b.3\]]grub pa gang las rgyu'am 'bras bu skye bar [#]'gyur ba de gnyis las dang po rgyu'am 'on te 'bras bu zhig tu [#]'gyur/_de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bur gdags pa yang shing rta ltar rgyur byas nas yin par rig par bya'i rang bzhin las gyur pa ni ma yin no/_/gzhan yang gal
[\[309b.4\]]te rgyus 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis skyed par byed na phrad nas sam ma phrad par skyed par byed grang /_de la re zhig_/gal te khyod kyi rgyu yis phrad nas 'bras skyed byed na de yi tshe/_/de dag nus pa gcig pas skyed byed 'bras bu tha dad med gyur [#]zhing /_/so sor na ni rgyu 'di rgyu min rnams
[\[309b.5\]]dang khyad par med 'gyur la/_/gnyis po 'di dag spangs nas rtog pa gzhan yang yod par 'gyur ma yin/_/de la gal te rgyus 'bras bu phrad nas skyed par byed na de'i tshe/_/phrad pa yin dang klung dang rgya mtsho'i chu phrad pa tha dad med pa ltar gcig [#]yin pas 'di ni rgyu'o/_/'di ni 'bras bu'o
[\[309b.6\]]zhes khyad par med pa'i phyir/_gang zhig gang gis bskyed par 'gyur[#]/_/ci ste ma phrad par skyed par byed na ni/_/de'i tshe ji ltar ma phrad par 'bras bu ma yin pa gzhan mi skyed [#]pa de bzhin du ma phrad par 'bras bu yang bskyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/'on te ma phrad bzhin du skyed par byed na ni ril
[\[309b.7\]]bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu rang bzhin du smra ba la bskyed bya skyed par byed pa [#]la phrad pa dang ma phrad pa dag [#]las ma gtogs pa'i rtogs [#]gsum pa gzhan yang srid pa ma yin pas/_rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i rgyus 'bras bu skyed par mi byed pa kho na'o/_/de'i phyir/_ci ste khyod
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]kyi rgyu yis 'bras bu skyed par mi byed de phyir 'bras/_shes bya yod min/_/gang gi tshe rgyus 'bras bu mi skyed pa de'i tshe 'bras bu med pas/_'bras bral rgyu ni rgyu med can 'gyur yod pa'ang min/_/rgyu rgyu nyid du bya ba la ni 'bras bu 'byung ba rgyu yin na/_/gal te 'bras bu
[\[310a.2\]]med par yang [#]rgyu nyid du 'gyur na ni/_de'i tshe rgyu'i rgyu nyid rgyu med pa can du 'gyur na 'di ni 'dod pa yang ma yin te/_de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin no/_/khyod kyi ci ltar zhe na/_gang phyir 'di dag gnyis char yang ni sgyu ma dang 'dra de yi phyir/_/bdag la skyon du
[\[310a.3\]]mi 'gyur 'jig rten pa yi dngos po rnams kyang yod/_/gang gi ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid bskyed par bya ba nyid dang skyed par byed pa nyid yin pa de la rnam par dpyad pa 'dir 'gyur gyi/_gang gi ltar na dngos po rnams log par kun brtags pas bskyed pa nyid kyis sgyu ma ltar ma skyes pa'i
[\[310a.4\]]rang bzhin yin zhing rang bzhin med kyang rab rib can gyi dmigs pa'i skra shad la sogs pa ltar rnam par rtog pa'i yul du 'gyur ba de la ni bsam du med pa nyid de/_de'i phyir bdag la ji skad bshad pa'i skyon gyi skabs yod pa ma yin zhing /_'jig rten pa'i dngos po ma brtags [#]par grub
[\[310a.5\]]pa rnams kyang yod pa yin pas thams cad 'grub po/_/'dir kha cig lan du 'di skad du ci rgyus 'bras bu phrad nas skyed par byed dam/_'on te ma phrad par yin zhes gang smras pas [#]'dir khyod la yang brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs so/_/ci ltar zhe na/_sun 'byin 'dis sun dbyung bya
[\[310a.6\]]phrad nas 'byin nam ma phrad par/_/yin zhes nyes pa 'di ni [#]khyod la'ang 'gyur ba ma yin nam/_/gal te sun 'byin pas sun dbyung bya phrad nas sun 'byin par byed na ni de'i tshe nyes pa de nyid du 'gyur ro/_/'on te ma phrad par yin na de lta na yang de nyid du 'gyur ro/_/gnyis po 'di dag
[\[310a.7\]]spangs nas rtogs [#]pa gzhan yang yod par 'gyur ba [#]ma yin/_gang gi tshe de ltar byed kyi sun 'byin pa la sun dbyung bya sun 'byin pa'i nus pa ma yin pa de'i tshe khyod kyi sun 'byin pa [#]nyid sun phyung pa yin pas shugs kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yang grub pa nyid do zhes bstan pa'i
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]phyir smras pa/_gang tshe de skad smra zhing rang phyogs kho na rnams [#]'joms pa/_/de tshe khyod kyi sun dbyung sun ni 'byin par nus ma yin/_/gzhan yang /_gang phyir rang gi tshig la'ang thal ba mtshungs pa'i ltag chod kyi/_/rigs pa med par dngos mtha' dag la skur 'debs de yi phyir/_/
[\[310b.2\]]khyod ni skye bo dam pas bzhed mi 'gyur zhing gang gi phyir/_/khyod la rang phyogs med pas sun ci phyin du rgol ba'ang yin/_de la rang gi tshig la'ang thal bar 'gyur bar mtshungs pa nyid ni smras zin to/_/rigs pa med par dngos mtha' dag la skur 'debs zhes bya ba 'di bshad par
[\[310b.3\]]bya'o/_/gang ma phrad par mtshungs pas skyed par [#]byed pa ma yin pa nyid do/_/zhes bya ba 'di la rigs pa ci zhig yod/_'di ltar khab len gyis ma phrad pa nyid du rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i lcags 'dren par byed kyi thams cad ni ma yin no/_/de bzhin du mig gis ma phrad pa kho nar
[\[310b.4\]]rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i gzugs mthong gi_/ril ni ma yin pa de bzhin du rgyus kyang ma phrad par bskyed du zin kyang ma phrad pa thams cad skyed [#]par mi 'gyur gyi/_'bras bu rung ba kho na skyed par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi phyir de ltar rigs pa med par dngos po'o cog la skur pa 'debs
[\[310b.5\]]pa de'i phyir khyod skye bo dam pas bzhed par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang khyod ni sun ci phyin du rgol ba pa nyid du yang 'gyur te/_rang gi phyogs bzhag pa dang bral zhing gzhan gyi phyogs sel ba tsam la zhugs pa'i rgol ba ni sun ci phyin du rgol ba pa zhes bya ba'o/_/khyod la ni rang gi
[\[310b.6\]]phyogs 'ga' zhig yod pa yang ma yin te/_khyod kyi rnam par dpyad pa ni gzhan gyi phyogs sel ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes smras so[#]/_/'di la brjod par bya ste/_sun 'byin pas sun dbyung bya ma phrad gsum [#]ni 'byin byed dam/_/'on te phrad nas yin zhes smras zin nyes pa 'dir gang
[\[310b.7\]]la/_/nges par phyogs yod de la 'gyur gyi bdag la phyogs 'di ni/_/yod pa min pas thal bar 'gyur ba 'di ni srid ma yin/_/de la rang gi tshig la'ang thal ba mtshungs pa'i ltag chod kyis/_/zhes gang smras pa ni kho bo cag gi phyogs la mtshungs par thal bar mi 'gyur te/_gang gi
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]phyir kho bo cag gi phyogs la ni sun 'byin pas sun dbyung bar bya ba phrad nas kyang sun 'byin par mi byed pa nyid la sun 'byin [#]pas sun dbyung bar bya ba ma phrad par yang sun 'byin par mi byed de/_sun 'byin pa dang sun dbyung bya gnyi ga rang bzhin gyis ma grub pa'i phyir
[\[311a.2\]]ro/_/de'i phyir phrad pa dang ma phrad pa'i bsam pa mi byed do/_/ji skad du/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci skyes pa'i chos kyis ma skyes pa'i thob pa 'thob par 'gyur ram/_'on te ma skyes pa'i chos kyis ma skyes pa'i thob pa 'thob par 'gyur/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA
[\[311a.3\]]ri'i bu kho bo ni skyes pa'i chos kyis [#]ma skyes pa'i thob pa 'thob par mi 'dod la/_ma skyes pas kyang ma skyes pa'i thob pa 'thob par mi 'dod do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA
[\[311a.4\]]ri'i bu thob pa yang yod mngon par rtogs pa yang yod mod kyi/_gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du [#]yin la/_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra
[\[311a.5\]]bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yin gyi don dam par ni thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med do zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/'dir ji ltar gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir skyes pa'am ma skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa
[\[311a.6\]]'thob pa bkag cing gnyis kyang dngos po med pa la mi rigs pa'i phyir/_ma brtags par 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du thob par khas blangs pa de bzhin du/_sun dbyung bar bya ba dang sun 'byin pa dag kyang phrad pa'am ma phrad par ma yin mod kyi/_'on kyang tha snyad du sun 'byin pas sun dbyung ba sun 'byin
[\[311a.7\]]par byed do zhes shes par bya'o/_/gzhan yang /_ji ltar khyod kyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yod khyad par rnams/_/gzugs brnyan la yang gzas gzung la sogs rnam 'tshe mthong 'gyur la/_/nyi ma dang ni gzugs brnyan rnam pa phrad dang ma phrad par/_/mi rigs mod kyi brten [# ]
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]nas tha snyad tsam zhig 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/mi bden bzhin du'ang rang gi byad bzhin mdzes par bsgrub [#]bya'i phyir/_/de ni yod pa ji ltar [#]de bzhin 'dir yang shes rab gdong /_/sbyang [#]bar bya la nus pa mthong bar gyur pa'i gtan tshigs ni/_/'thad pa dang bral las kyang bsgrub bya rtogs zhes shes
[\[311b.2\]]par bya/_/ji ltar gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang phrad pa'am ma phrad par skye zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa rnam pa [#]thams cad du mi srid mod kyi/_'on kyang rkyen gzugs nye ba las gzugs brnyan du dmigs pa na rtogs par 'dod pa'i
[\[311b.3\]]don nges par byed pa de bzhin du/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i sun 'byin pas sun dbyung bya sun 'byin pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis stong zhing 'thad pa dang bral ba'i gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub par bya ba bsgrub [#]pa yin la/_gnyis su thal bar yang mi 'gyur bas rang gi tshig la'ang thal bar [# ]
[\[311b.4\]]mtshungs par mi rigs so zhes shes par bya'o/_/shes rab nyid gdong yin pas shes rab gdong ngo /_/de sbyang ba ni ma rig pa spangs pas yongs su dag pa nyid do/_/de la nus pa mthong bar gyur pa'i zhes bya ba ni der nus mthu can du mthong ba zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gang gi phyir btags par yod
[\[311b.5\]]pa rnams la gnyis su smra ba 'di mi rigs pa de nyid kyi phyir/_gnyis la brten nas sun 'byin pa dang lan smra bas dbu ma pa la rnam pa thams cad du glags mi rnyed do/_/ji skad du 'phags pa'i [#]lhas/_yod dang med dang yod med ces/_/gang la phyogs ni yod min pa/_/de la yun ni ring po
[\[311b.6\]]la'ang /_/klan ka brjod par nus ma yin/_/zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin du/_stong pa nyid kyis brtsad byas te[#]/_/gang zhig lan 'debs smra byed pa/_/de yis [#]thams cad lan btab min/_/bsgrub par bya dang mtshungs par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba gsungs so/_/'dis ni skyed par byed pa'i rgyu yang
[\[311b.7\]]rnam par bshad par bya'o/_/de la kha cig dbu ma pa'i [#]bstan bcos 'dir skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'i skabs su bab pa yin gyi gsal bar byed pa ni ma yin la/_phrad pa dang ma phrad pa'i brgal ba yang gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu la yin gyi skyed par byed pa la ni ma yin pas kho bo cag gi tshig rnams la
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]ltag chod kyi skabs med pa nyid [#]do zhes gang smra bar byed pa de'i 'di ni lan ma yin te/_gang gi phyir glags dang bcas pa'i dngos po brjod na pha rol po mi bzod pa nyid yin la/_skyed par byed pa ltar gsal bar byed pa la yang glags yod pa yin pas de'i lan mi rigs
[\[312a.2\]]pa nyid do/_/gzhan yang 'dis bstan bcos su dam bcas pa'i don sgrub pa'i phyir yongs su bzung ba'i sgrub byed kyi sun 'byin pa rnams la ltag chod 'god par byed pa'i lan smra bar byed pa de'i phyir/_'di ni gzhan gyis sun dbyung bar bya ba kho na yin pas kho bo cag gis btab pa'i lan kho na
[\[312a.3\]]ches mdzes so/_/gzhan yang /_gal te rang gi bsgrub bya go byed gtan tshigs dngos grub dang /_/dngos su go bya nyid 'gyur bsgrub bya'i ngo bo'ang [#]yod 'gyur na/_/phrad pa la sogs rigs pa nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur zhig na/_/de yang yod pa min pas khyod kyi yi chad 'ba' zhig yin/_/
[\[312a.4\]]yongs su [#]dag pa'i phyogs kyi skyon yongs su ma [#]dag pa'i phyogs kyi steng du 'god [#]pa khyod ni kho bo cag la don med par yid 'byung [#]ba kho na yin par rtogs te/_dper na rab rib can gyis dmigs pa'i skra shad la sogs pa rnams kyi gcig nyid dang /_mang po nyid dang /_
[\[312a.5\]]ring po nyid dang /_zlum po nyid dang /_nag po la sogs pa'i phyogs sun 'byin pas/_rab rib med pa rnams la mi gnod pa de bzhin du/_rang bzhin med pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par dpyod pa na/_khyod kyis gnyis yongs su bzung nas sun 'byin pa bkod pas kyang mi gnod do/_/de nyid kyi phyir gang
[\[312a.6\]]dag mig dang khab len la sogs pa ma phrad par rang gi bya ba byed par rnam par gzhag pa dpe de dag kyang bkag par rig par bya ste/_de dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zhig khyod rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi lam drang po btang nas rtog ge ngan pa'i lam shin
[\[312a.7\]]tu 'khyog pa/_rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i bzo bo ngan pas sbyar ba/_yang dag pa'i lam 'gegs par byed par spro ba/_te por tshegs che ba 'dis khyod la ci zhig bya/_gzhan yang /_dngos [#]rnams mtha' dag dngos po med par rtogs su gzhug par ni/_/nus pa ches sla ji lta
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]de ltar rang bzhin gzhan dag la/_khong du chud par bde blag tu ni nus pa ma yin no/_/rtog ge ngan pa'i dra bas 'jig rten ci ste 'dir gcol byed/_/ji ltar rmi lam dang sgyu ma la sogs pa rang gi phyogs la grub pa'i dpe rnams kho nas/_'jig rten gyi dngos po rang bzhin med pa nyid du rtogs
[\[312b.2\]]su gzhug par nus pa de ltar/_'ga' zhig dngos po rnams rang bzhin dang bcas par 'dzin du gzhug par nus par sla ba ma yin te/_gnyi ga la grags pa'i dpe med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar yin dang /_kho bos rtsod pa thams cad bzlog pa yin la lan yang sus kyang brjod par nus pa
[\[312b.3\]]ma yin no/_/de'i phyir 'jig rten la don ma yin pa bya ba'i phyir/_su zhig gis sbed [#]cing khyod 'jig rten nyon mongs dar gyi srin bu ltar rang gi rtog pa'i sbubs kyis gtums [#]pa'i steng du rtog ge ngan pa'i srad bus bres pa'i rgya shin tu bsran [#]te ma kun nas 'dzugs par ci ste byed/_
[\[312b.4\]]rtsod pa 'di ni dor bar bya dgos te/_dngos po gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bas [#]de dag thams cad la rang gi mtshan nyid med cing spyi'i mtshan nyid kyang med la mngon sum mam rjes su dpag pa'ang ci zhig yod/_'di [#]ni mngon sum gcig nyid kho nar zad de gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so/_/gzhan
[\[312b.5\]]yang /_sun 'byin lhag ma gong du bstan pa yang ni shes byas nas/_/phrad pa la sogs phyogs kyi lan gyi ched du 'di gtang [#]bya/_/sun ci phyin du rgol ba pa yang ji ltar yod min pa/_/de skad sngar bshad lhag ma phyogs 'di nyid kyis rtogs par bya/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
[\[312b.6\]]rnam par gzhag pa dang brten nas gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa gzhan gyi phyogs la sun 'byin pa gang bshad pa de nyid las sun 'byin pa lhag ma shes par byas nas/_ci rgyus 'bras bu phrad nas skyed par byed [#]dam/_'on te ma phrad par zhes bya ba'i sun 'byin pa'i lan gyi don du gang
[\[312b.7\]]gis smras pa de la sun 'byin gtang bar bya'o/_/bstan bcos las ni rtog pa ldog pa nyid brjod par 'dod pa yin la/_de yang kho bo cag gis bstan zin pa'i phyir bstan bcos las sun ci phyin du rgol ba nyid ga la yod/_'dir bdag gis gzhan gyi phyogs bsal [#]bar
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]byas pa yang ma yin te/_bsal bar bya ba'i dngos po med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/de'i phyir sun ci phyin du rgol ba pa nyid ga la yod/_gang gis na mtshan nyid byas pa 'di yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba sus rang gi phyogs gzhag cing gzhan gyi phyogs bzlog pa [# ]
[\[313a.2\]]ste/_de'i phyir sun ci phyin du rgol ba'i mtshan nyid 'di ni rnam pa thams cad du mi rigs so/_/de lta bu la sogs pa sun 'byin lhag ma ni phyogs 'di nyid kyis rtogs par bya'o/_/de la de nyid de las 'byung min zhes bya ba nas brtsams te/_rnam dpyod pa na myur du grol bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya
[\[313a.3\]]ba'i bar 'dis ni chos kyi bdag med pa mngon par gsal bar byas so/_/nyon mongs skyon rnams ma lus 'jig tshogs la/_/lta las 'byung [#]bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas 'di yan chad [#]kyis ni gang zag gi bdag med pa gsal bar byas so/_/de'i phyir 'di ston zhing stong pa nyid kyi rab tu dbye
[\[313a.4\]]ba brjod par 'dod nas bshad[#]/_bdag med 'di ni 'gro ba rnam dgrol phyir/_/chos dang gang zag dbye bas rnam gnyis gsungs/_/bdag med pa 'di ni mdor bsdus nas rnam pa gnyis su gsungs te/_chos kyi bdag med pa dang gang zag gi bdag med pa'o/_/yang ci'i phyir bdag
[\[313a.5\]]med pa rnam pa gnyis nye bar bstan zhe na/_bshad pa/_'gro ba rnam dgrol phyir te/_bdag med pa rnam pa gnyis po 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba rnam par dgrol bar bya ba'i don du nye bar bstan to/_/de la gang zag gi bdag med pa ni rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos
[\[313a.6\]]rnams rnam par dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir bstan la byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pas rnam par dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir ni gnyi ga bstan to/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rkyen nyid 'di pa tsam mthong mod
[\[313a.7\]]kyi/_de lta na yang de dag la chos kyi bdag med pa yongs su rdzogs par sgom [#]pa med de/_khams gsum na spyod [#]pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba'i thabs tsam zhig ni yod do/_/de dag la gang zag gi bdag med pa ma lus par sgom pa ni yod par rnam par gzhag go/_de ltar ston pas slar
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]yang 'di nyid ni/_/gdul bya rnams la phye ste rnam mang gsungs/_/bdag med pa rnam pa gnyis po 'di ni slar bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul ba'i bsam pa sna tshogs pa nyid kyis mang por bstan to/_/de la/_spros dang bcas par stong pa nyid/_/bcu drug bshad nas mdor bsdus te/_/
[\[313b.2\]]slar yang bzhir bshad de dag ni/_/theg chen du yang bzhed pa [#]yin/_/ji skad du/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[313b.3\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi
[\[313b.4\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de skad du stong pa nyid bcu drug bstan nas/_rab 'byor gzhan yang dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo /_/dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo /_/rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/
[\[313b.5\]]gzhan gyi dngos po ni gzhan gyi dngos pos stong ngo zhes slar yang stong pa nyid bzhi bstan te/_stong pa nyid 'di rnams ni theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/stong pa nyid dam stong pa nyid ma yin pa ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te/_rnam pa de lta bus gdul bya'i [# ]
[\[313b.6\]]skye bo'i dbang gis gzugs la sogs pa ltar kun rdzob tu bsnyad par zad do/_/ji skad du bstan bcos las/_gal te stong min cung zad yod/_/stong pa cung zad yod par 'gyur/_/mi stong cung zad yod min na/_/stong pa'ang yod par ga la 'gyur/_/stong ngo zhes kyang mi brjod de/_/mi
[\[313b.7\]]stong zhes kyang mi bya zhing /_/gnyis dang gnyis min mi bya ste/_/gdags pa'i don du brjod par bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la nang stong pa nyid kyi dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_gang phyir de yi rang bzhin de/_/yin phyir mig ni mig gis stong /_/de bzhin rna ba sna dang lce/_/lus dang
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]yid kyang bsnyad par bya/_/ther zug gnas pa ma yin dang /_/'jig pa ma yin nyid kyi phyir/_/mig la sogs pa drug po yi/_/rang bzhin med nyid gang yin pa/_/de ni nang stong nyid du 'dod/_/ji skad du/_de la gang dag nang stong pa nyid du 'gyur ba na [#]nang gi chos
[\[314a.2\]]rnams gang dag yin zhe na/_nang gi chos rnams zhes bya ba ni/_mig dang rna ba dang sna dang [#]lce dang lus dang yid de/_de la ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa dang /_'jig pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir/_mig ni mig gis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro zhes rgya cher
[\[314a.3\]]gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de la ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa nyid ni rang bzhin mi 'dor ba la bya'o/_/de yang dus cung zad cig gnas nas ldog par yang 'gyur bas 'jig pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes gsungs so/_/'di skad bstan par 'gyur te/_dngos po gang zhig rang bzhin dang bcas
[\[314a.4\]]pa nyid de ni gor ma chag par ther zug pa [#]ma yin pa dang mi ldog pa zhig tu 'gyur dgos so/_/ji skad du/_rang bzhin rgyu dang rkyen dag las/_/'byung bar rigs pa ma yin no/_/rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba yin[#]/_/rang bzhin byas pa can du gyur[#]/_/rang bzhin byas pa yin no zhes/_/ji
[\[314a.5\]]lta bur na rung bar 'gyur/_/rang bzhin nyid ni bcos min dang /_/gzhan la ltos pa med pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang ci gang zhig slob dpon gyis bstan bcos las khyad par du mdzad pa rnam pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin slob dpon gyis [#]zhal gyis bzhes pa zhig yod dam zhe na/_
[\[314a.6\]]gang gi dbang du mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_ma byung yang rung chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni gnas pa nyid do zhes rgyas par gsungs pa chos nyid ces bya ba ni yod do/_/chos nyid ces bya ba 'di yang ci zhig_/mig la sogs pa 'di [#]dag gi rang
[\[314a.7\]]bzhin no/_/de dag gi rang bzhin yang gang zhig ce na/_'di dag ni bcos ma ma yin pa dang gzhan la ltos pa med pa gang yin pa ste/_ma rig pa'i rab rib dang bral ba'i shes pas rtogs par bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo'o/_/ci de yod dam med do zhes de skad du [#]smra/_gal te de med na ni
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]ci'i don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam sgom [#]par 'gyur te/_gang gi phyir chos nyid de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ltar dka' ba brgya phrag rtsom pa yin no/_/ji skad du/_rigs kyi bu don dam pa ni skye ba med pa dang /_'gag [# ]
[\[314b.2\]]pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa dang /_yi ge rnams kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin pa dang /_yi ge rnams kyis rab tu [#]bsnyad du med cing spros pas rtogs pa ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu don dam pa ni brjod du med cing zhi ba 'phags pa rnams
[\[314b.3\]]kyis so so rang gis rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu don dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/_gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams skra dang kha spu dag bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/_yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par
[\[314b.4\]]rab tu byung zhing /_rab tu byung nas kyang chos de nyid [#]thob par bya ba'i phyir/_skra'am gos la me shor ba ltar brtson 'grus rtsom zhing gnas pa rnam par 'jig pa med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gal te don dam pa yod par ma gyur na ni tshangs par spyod pa [#]med par 'gyur zhing de bzhin
[\[314b.5\]]gshegs pa rnams byung ba don med par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi phyir don dam par [#]de yod pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams la don dam pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/'dir smras pa/_kye ma ma la gang zhig dngos po cung zad kyang mi 'dod cing /_
[\[314b.6\]]glo bur du bcos ma ma yin pa dang /_gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i rang bzhin yang 'dod pa khyod ni phan tshun 'gal ba'i don brjod pa zhig go/_/brjod par bya ste/_khyod kyis bstan bcos kyi dgongs pa ma rig pa zhig ste/_'di'i dgongs pa ni/_gal te mig la sogs pa
[\[314b.7\]]rnams kyis [#]rang gi ngo bo rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba byis pa'i skye bos gzung [#]bar bya ba gang yin pa de [#]nyid de rnams kyi rang bzhin yin na ni/_/rang bzhin de phyin ci log tu gyur pas kyang rtogs pa'i phyir/_tshangs par spyod pa don med par 'gyur na/_gang gi phyir 'di nyid rang bzhin ma
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]yin pa de'i phyir/_de'i [#]lta ba'i don du tshangs par spyod pa don dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/de yang bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa la ltos nas bcos ma ma yin pa nyid dang /_gzhan la mi ltos pa nyid du brjod do/_/gang zhig byis pa'i skye bos blta bar bya ba ma yin pa de nyid
[\[315a.2\]]ni rang bzhin du rigs la/_de tsam gyis don dam pa dngos po ma yin zhing dngos po med pa yang ma yin te/_de ni rang bzhin gyis zhi ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di yin no/_/rang bzhin 'di ni slob dpon gyis [#]zhal gyis bzhes pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/_gzhan yang don 'di khas len du
[\[315a.3\]]gzhug [#]par nus pas rang bzhin 'di ni gnyi ga la grub pa nyid du yang rnam par gzhag go/_/gang dag me la sogs pa'i rang bzhin tsha [#]ba la sogs pa yin par smra ba de dag gi ltar na ni/_rnam pa thams cad du mi rung ste/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid kyis bcos ma nyid yin pa'i phyir
[\[315a.4\]]dang /_ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro/_/yod pa nyid kyi phyir de la bcos ma nyid med pa dang /_gzhan la [#]ltos pa nyid med pa yod do zhes bya bar brjod par yang mi rigs te/_de la zhes bya ba 'dis mchog tu 'dzin pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir la/_kun rdzob tu rnam pa de lta bu'i don
[\[315a.5\]]bstan pa'i phyir te/_rgya chen pos chog [#]go/_/dkyus ma nyid rnam par bshad par bya'o/_/de la mig la sogs pa rnams mig la sogs pa rnams nyid kyis stong pa nyid du smras pas ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su gsal bar byas pa yin gyi/_mig ni nang gi byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir
[\[315a.6\]]stong zhing gzung [#]ba dang 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyis stong ngo zhes gcig la gcig med pa'i stong pa nyid ni ma yin no/_/de la phyi stong pa nyid ni/_gang [#]phyir de yi rang bzhin de/_/yin phyir gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /_/sgra dang dri ro reg bya dang /_/chos rnams nyid kyang de bzhin no/_/
[\[315a.7\]]gzugs sogs rang bzhin [#]med pa nyid/_/phyi rol stong pa nyid du 'dod/_/ji skad du/_de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_phyi'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'o/_/de la ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa dang 'jig pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir/_gzugs ni gzugs kyis
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]stong ste/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs te snga ma bzhin no/_/gnyis char rang bzhin med nyid ni/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yin no/_/ji skad du/_phyi dang nang gi chos rnams phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin med pa nyid ni phyi dang nang gi [#]stong pa nyid do zhes gsungs te snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[315b.2\]]chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid/_/mkhas pas stong pa nyid ces bsnyad/_/stong nyid de yang stong nyid kyi/_/ngo bos stong par 'dod pa yin/_/stong nyid ces bya'i [#]stong nyid gang /_/stong nyid stong nyid du 'dod de/_/stong nyid dngos po'i blo can gyi/_/'dzin pa zlog phyir gsungs pa yin/_/ji skad du/_
[\[315b.3\]]de la [#]stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid des stong pa nyid stong pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/gang dag stong pa nyid la yang dngos por mngon par zhen pa de dag gi stong pa nyid la dngos por 'dzin pa bzlog pa'i don du nye bar
[\[315b.4\]]bstan te/_ji skad du/_kun rtog [#]thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir/_/stong nyid bdud rtsi bstan par [#]mdzad/_/gang la de la'ang 'dzin yod pa/_/de ni khyod kyis smad par mdzad/_/ces gsungs so/_/sems can snod kyi 'jig rten ni/_/ma lus khyab byed nyid phyir dang /_/tshad med dpe
[\[315b.5\]]yi [#]mu mtha' ni/_/med phyir phyogs rnams chen po nyid/_/phyogs las logs shig tu sems can gyi 'jig rten med cing snod kyi 'jig rten med pas 'gro ba ma lus pa la khyab par byed pa nyid kyis phyogs rnams chen po nyid do/_/gang gi phyir byams pa la sogs pa sgom pa ni phyogs
[\[315b.6\]]yongs su bcad nas sgom pas na/_phyogs rnams tshad med pa'i dpe can du gnas pa de'i phyir mu med pas kyang chen po nyid do/_/'di dag bcu char [#]phyogs rnams kyis/_/stong pa nyid ni gang yin te/_/chen po stong pa nyid yin te/_/chen por 'dzin pa bzlog phyir gsungs/_/ji skad
[\[315b.7\]]du/_chen po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_shar phyogs ni shar phyogs kyis stong ngo zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/chen po stong pa nyid de ni gang dag phyogs tshad med do snyam du phyogs rnams la chen por 'dzin pa de dag gi 'dzin pa de bzlog pa'i phyir bstan te/_'di ltar bye brag pa
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]dag gis phyogs rnams rdzas nyid du rtogs so/_/de ni dgos pa mchog yin pas/_/don dam mya ngan 'das pa yin/_/de ni de yis stong nyid gang /_/de ni don dam stong nyid de/_/mya ngan 'das dngos blo can gyi/_/'dzin pa bzlog par [#]bya ba'i phyir/_/don dam mkhyen pas
[\[316a.2\]]don dam pa/_/stong pa nyid ni bstan pa mdzad/_/ji skad du/_de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_don dam pa zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa dang /_'jig pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir/_mya ngan las 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pas stong ste/_
[\[316a.3\]]zhes rgya cher 'byung ngo /_/de yang mya ngan las 'das pa la dngos por mngon par zhen pa rnams kyi dngos por 'dzin pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir gsungs so/_/don gyi sgra ni dgos pa'i tshig gam shes bya'i tshig go/_/rkyen las byung phyir khams gsum po/_/'dus byas yin par nges par
[\[316a.4\]]bsnyad/_/de ni de yis stong nyid gang /_/de ni 'dus byas stong nyid gsungs/_/ji skad du/_de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_'dus byas zhes bya ba ni khams gsum mo/_/de la 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong ste zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/gang
[\[316a.5\]]la skye gnas mi rtag nyid/_/de dag med pa 'dus ma byas/_/de ni de yis [#]stong nyid gang /_/de ni 'dus ma byas stong nyid/_/de yis zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas kyis zhes bya ba'i don to/_/ji skad du/_de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni/_gang la [# ]
[\[316a.6\]]skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa dang /_gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid med pa'o/_de la 'dus ma byas ni [#]'dus ma byas kyis stong ste zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste snga ma bzhin no/_/gang la mtha' ni yod min pa/_/de ni mtha' las 'das par brjod/_/
[\[316a.7\]]de de kho nas stong pa nyid/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong nyid bsnyad/_/ji skad du/_de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_mtha' zhes bya ba ni rtag pa'i mtha' dang chad pa'i mtha' ste/_gang la mtha' yod pa ma yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa ni
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]mtha' [#]las 'das pas stong ste [#]zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/thog ma dang po tha ma mtha'/_/de dag med pas 'khor ba ni/_/thog ma tha ma med par brjod/_/'gro 'ong bral zhing [#]rmi lam lta'i/_/srid 'di de yis dben nyid gang /_/de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do zhes bstan bcos
[\[316b.2\]]las ni nges par bsnyad/_/ji skad du/_de la [#]thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa [#]nyid gang zhe na/_gang la thog ma dang tha ma mi dmigs pa de la dbus med cing /_gang la thog ma dang tha ma [#]dbus ma dmigs pa de la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med do/_/de la ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa dang /_
[\[316b.3\]]'jig pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir/_thog ma dang tha ma [#]dang dbus rnams ni thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus rnams kyis stong ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/thog ma zhes bya ba ni dang po la bya'o/_/tha ma zhes bya ba ni mtha'o/_/dor ba zhes bya 'thor ba dang /_/'bor ba la [#]ni nges
[\[316b.4\]]par brjod/_/dor med stong pa med pa ste/_/'ga' yang 'bor med gang yin pa'o/_/dor ba med pa de nyid kyis/_/de nyid stong pa nyid gang yin/_/de de'i phyir na dor med pa/_/stong pa nyid ces bya bar brjod/_/ji skad du/_de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_dor ba ni 'thor ba
[\[316b.5\]]dang 'bor ba dang gtong ba'o/_/de la dor ba med pa ni dor ba med pas stong ste zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/dor ba ni gtong ba yin la dor ba med pa ni gang la 'ga' yang gtong ba med pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'dus byas la sogs ngo bo nyid/_/gang phyir slob ma rang
[\[316b.6\]]sangs rgyas/_/rgyal sras de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/_/ma mdzad de phyir 'dus byas la[#]/_/sogs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid/_/rang bzhin nyid du bsnyad pa ste/_/de nyid kyis de stong nyid gang /_/de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid/_/ji skad du/_de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_
[\[316b.7\]]gang chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ma byas shing mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/_de ni nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/khams bco brgyad dang reg drug dang /_/de las byung ba'i tshor ba drug_/gzugs can gzugs can [#]min de bzhin/_/'dus byas 'dus
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]ma byas chos rnams/_/chos de dag ni thams cad kyi/_/de dag gis dben stong nyid gang /_/yin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/_/ji skad du/_de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_chos thams cad ces bya ba ni 'dus byas rnams dang /_'dus ma
[\[317a.2\]]byas rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de la khams bco brgyad ni/_nang gi skye mched drug dang /_phyi'i [#]drug dang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug go/_/reg pa drug ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid kyi [#]'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/reg pa'i
[\[317a.3\]]rgyu can gyi tshor ba yang drug go/_/de la chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis [#]stong ngo /_/gzugs rung la sogs [#]dngos med gang /_/de ni rang mtshan stong pa nyid/_/yang gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ci yin zhe na/_rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa/_
[\[317a.4\]]gzugs ni gzugs rung mtshan nyid can/_/tshor ba myong ba'i bdag nyid can/_/'du shes mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste/_/'du byed mngon par 'du byed pa'o/_/yul la so sor rnam rig pa/_/rnam shes rang gi mtshan nyid de/_/phung po sdug bsngal rang mtshan nyid/_/khams
[\[317a.5\]]kyi bdag nyid sbrul gdug 'dod/_/'dzin par chos mthun pa'i sgo nas khams rnams ni sbrul gdug pa'i mtshan nyid can no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/skye mched rnams ni sangs rgyas kyis/_/skye ba'i sgor gyur nyid du gsungs te sdug bsngal 'byung zhing skye ba'i sgor gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/
[\[317a.6\]]rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang /_/de ni 'du 'phrod mtshan nyid do/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid can[#]/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'du 'phrod kyis [#]rab tu phye ba nyid kyi phyir ro/_/gtong ba sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/_/tshul khrims gdung med mtshan nyid
[\[317a.7\]]bzod/_/khro med mtshan nyid brtson 'grus kyi/_/kha na ma tho med nyid do/_/brtson 'grus ni dge ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro/_/bsam gtan sdud pa'i mtshan nyid can te/_dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/shes rab
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]chags med mtshan nyid do/_/mya ngan las 'das par bgrod pa'i phyir 'ga' la yang chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/pha rol phyin pa drug rnams kyi/_/mtshan nyid 'di dag yin par brjod/_/bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med dang /_/de bzhin gzhan gang gzugs med pa/_/de dag
[\[317b.2\]]yang dag mkhyen pa yis/_/mi 'khrugs [#]mtshan nyid can du gsungs/_/de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis khro ba med pa'i mtshan nyid can du gsungs te/_de dag khong khro ba spangs pas 'thob pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun/_/nges par 'byung byed rang mtshan nyid/_/
[\[317b.3\]]nges par 'byung ba ni nges par 'byung ba ste thar pa'o [#]zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'khor ba las 'da' ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir nges par 'byung bar byed par nus pas nges par 'byung bar byed pa ste/_thar pa thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/bsam gtan la sogs pa
[\[317b.4\]]dag ni sngar bshad zin to/_/stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni/_/dmigs pa med pas rnam dben nyid/_/dngos po ma dmigs pas rnam par rtog pa'i dri mas nye bar ma sbags pa'i phyir na/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid can no/_/mtshan ma med
[\[317b.5\]]pa zhi nyid de/_/gsum pa'i mtshan nyid sdug bsngal dang gti mug med/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni/_mtshan ma ma [#]dmigs pa'i sgo nas zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can no/_/gsum pa'i zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/rnam par
[\[317b.6\]]thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa 'di ni sdug bsngal dang gti mug med pa'i mtshan nyid can te/_'du byed sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid can rnams la yang dag par rjes su lta zhing shes rab kyis 'du byed kyi rang bzhin la lta ba na smon par mi byed pa'i phyir na/_rnam par thar
[\[317b.7\]]pa'i sgo gsum pa ni sdug bsngal dang gti mug med pa'i mtshan nyid can no/_/rnam thar rnams kyis [#]mtshan nyid rnam par grol byed pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad ni 'di lta ste/_gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs su [#]'du shes pas phyi rol gyi
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o/_/sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bdag nyid can ni gsum pa'o/_/gzugs med pa bzhi ni ji skad bshad pa bzhin no/_/'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa ni brgyad pa ste/_rnam
[\[318a.2\]]par thar pa 'di dag ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las grol bar byed pa'i phyir/_rnam par grol bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid can no/_/stobs rnams shin tu rnam par ni/_/gtan la 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin gsungs/_/'chad par 'gyur ba'i stobs bcu ni shin tu gtan la
[\[318a.3\]]'bebs pa'i mtshan nyid can du rig par bya ste/_shin tu rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nyid kyis thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir na stobs rnams zhes bya'o/_/skyob pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams ni/_/shin tu brtan pa'i ngo bo yin/_/mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi yin te/_/'di
[\[318a.4\]]lta ste/_nga [#]yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/_kye ma de la chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma [#]rgyas so zhes dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang mthun par
[\[318a.5\]]bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste zhes rgyas par 'byung zhing /_kye ma nga zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/_kye ma de la zag pa de [#]rnams zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo /_/ngas gang bar du
[\[318a.6\]]gcod pa'i chos su bstan pa de dag bsten na bar du gcod pa'i chos su mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med do [#]zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/gang yang ngas lam 'phags pa'i nges par 'byin pa de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar nges par 'byung ba bstan pa de
[\[318a.7\]]dag la nan tan byas na/_sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar nges par mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu'i gnas med de zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo /_/'di dag ni shin tu brtan [#]pa'i mtshan nyid can te sus kyang gzhan du 'gyur bar bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/so so
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]yang dag rig rnams [#]ni/_/spobs sogs chad med mtshan nyid can/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/_'chad par 'gyur ba rnams te de dag ni chad pa med pa'i mtshan nyid can no/_/'gro la phan pa nyer sgrub pa/_/byams pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/byams pa chen po ni phan pa nye
[\[318b.2\]]bar sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid can no/_/sdug bsngal can rnams yongs skyob pa'i[#]/_/thugs rje chen po'o/_/[#]thugs rje chen po ni/_sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa yongs su skyob pa'i mtshan nyid can no/_/dga' ba ni rab dga'i mtshan nyid dga' ba chen po ni/_rab tu dga' ba
[\[318b.3\]]nyid kyi [#]mtshan nyid can no/_/btang snyoms ni/_ma 'dres mtshan nyid can zhes bya ba[#]/_btang snyoms chen po ni/_rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid can no/_/sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa/_/bcu dang brgyad du gang 'dod
[\[318b.4\]]dag_/gang phyir ston des mi 'phrogs pa/_/de phyir mi 'phrogs rang mtshan nyid/_/de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni bco brgyad de/_'di lta ste/_rab 'byor gang gi nam la de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
[\[318b.5\]]rgyas pa dag [#]dang /_gang gi nam la len pa mi mnga' bar mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o/_/ca co mi mnga'o/_/bsnyel ba mi mnga'o/_/thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o/_/de bzhin du tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang /_so sor
[\[318b.6\]]ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms dang /_'dun pa nyams pa dang /_brtson 'grus nyams pa dang /_dran pa nyams pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin nyams pa dang /_shes rab nyams pa dang /_rnam par grol ba nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes
[\[318b.7\]]kyi rjes su 'brang /_ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang /_yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang /_'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug_/ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]byung ba la yang de ltar brjod par bya'o/_/de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang dag yin pa de dag ni mi 'phrogs pa'i mtshan nyid can te/_'khrul pa la sogs pa mi mnga' bas glags med pa nyid kyis thub par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/'di dag
[\[319a.2\]]gis [#]bshad pa ni 'phags pa gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos zhus pa las rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang gi phyir de'i lus 'khrul pas byis pa'am mkhas pas kyang rung ste/_chos dang mthun par rtsod par 'gyur ba'i 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/_/de ci'i
[\[319a.3\]]phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lus kyi las 'khrul pa med pa dang ldan pa ste/_kun tu lta ba dang rnam par lta ba dang bskum pa dang myong ba [#]dang /_chos gos sbyar ma dang /_thang pa dang /_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs pas/_spyod lam mdzes par spyod lam bzhi yod
[\[319a.4\]]pa dang /_grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal du 'jug pa dang 'byung ba na rkang mthil sa la mi reg ste/_'khor lo rtsibs stong pa sa las 'byung zhing dri yid du 'ong ba'i pad+ma mngon par 'byung ste/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rkang pa [#]'jog go/_/de la gang byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems
[\[319a.5\]]can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i rkang pa [#]la reg pa de dag zhag bdun rab tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas kyang lha dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la chos gos [#]sor bzhi tsam gyis mi reg mod kyi[#]/_rdzi rlung yug pa'i rlung gis
[\[319a.6\]]kyang bzlog [#]par mi nus so/_/lus kyi 'od kyis mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can bde bar byed de/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus [#]la 'khrul pa med ces bya'o/_/byis pa'am mkhas pa dag kyang rung ste/_chos dang mthun par rtsod par 'gyur ba'i ngag gi 'khrul pa
[\[319a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus su smra ba/_tshig tu [#]smra ba/_yang dag par smra ba/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa'o/_/shin tu nges pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'o/_/sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]tshig dang ldan pa'o/_/mi zlos pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'o/_/don dang tshig 'brus brgyan pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'o/_/skad cig brjod pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag [#]'khrul pa med ces bya'o/_/gang gi phyir de'i sems [# ]
[\[319b.2\]]'khrul pas byis pa'am mkhas pas kyang rung ste/_chos dang mthun par rtsod par 'gyur ba'i sems 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas mi 'dor zhing sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byed kyang sems der mi gtong zhing chos
[\[319b.3\]]thams cad la chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems la [#]'khrul pa med ces bya'o/_/ji ltar de'i sems [#]'khrul pa med pa de bzhin du 'khrul pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs
[\[319b.4\]]pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las bco lnga pa'o/_/'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni dang po'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de'i ca co gang las bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'am gzhan mu stegs can dag gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba'i ca co de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/_/de
[\[319b.5\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co'am rjes su ca co med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba/_sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti byas kyang mtho bar mi sems/_sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti ma byas kyang
[\[319b.6\]]sro shi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gi phyir de 'gyod pas rjes su ca co 'byung bar 'gyur bar [#]bya dka' ba'i bya ba'am/_mthar ma phyin pa cung zad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten gang dang yang rtsod pa ma yin te/_de'i phyir de bzhin
[\[319b.7\]]gshegs pa la ca co med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa ste/_nga'i ba med pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/_len pa med pa mdud pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med do/_/ji ltar de la ca co med pa de bzhin
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]du sems can thams cad kyi ca co thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las bcu drug pa'o/_/'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni gnyis pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsnyel ba gang gis chos gang la yang
[\[320a.2\]]rmongs par 'gyur ba'i bsnyel ba de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la bsnyel ba med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems
[\[320a.3\]]kyi spyod pa dang g.yo ba la rnam par lta zhing so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la bsnyel ba med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsnyel ba med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar
[\[320a.4\]]byung ba la chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba la bsnyel ba med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar bdag la bsnyel ba med pa de ltar sems can thams cad brjed par mi 'gyur bar chos ston te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las bcu bdun pa'o/_/'di [#]sangs rgyas
[\[320a.5\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni gsum pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa la sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med do/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'chag gam zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste/_rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin zab mo'i mchog thob pa sgrib pa med pa'i bsam
[\[320a.6\]]gtan la bsam gtan byed pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs [#]ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris [#]na sems can gang mnyam par bzhag kyang rung mnyam par ma bzhag kyang rung ste/_su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems la blta [#]bar nus pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar rtag tu
[\[320a.7\]]mnyam par bzhag pa de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las bco brgyad pa'o/_/'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni bzhi pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang tha dad pa'i 'du shes gang gis sems mi mnyam par gnas
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]par 'gyur ba'i tha dad pa'i 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nam mkha' bzhin du [#]zhing mi zad pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhing rnams la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do/_/rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la'ang [#]tha dad
[\[320b.2\]]pa'i 'du shes pa [#]med do/_/chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med cing mnyam pa nyid du shes pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas rnams la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos rnams la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do/_/
[\[320b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la rjes su chags pa med/_ngang tshul ngan pa can rnams la khong khro ba med/_phan btags pa rnams la lan du phan 'dogs pa med/_gnod pa byas pa rnams la lan du gnod pa byed pa med/_gdul bar 'os pa rnams la ri
[\[320b.4\]]mor ma yin/_log par nges pa rnams la smod pa ma yin gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste/_'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni lnga pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin
[\[320b.5\]]gshegs pa la so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni lam bsgoms pa yin gyi/_lam ma bsgoms pa ma yin te/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni shes rab bsgoms pa yin gyi ma bsgoms pa
[\[320b.6\]]yang [#]ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni ye shes dang ldan pa yin pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa yin gyi 'jig rten par ltung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni btang snyoms chen po de lta bu phun sum tshogs pa/_sems can rnams
[\[320b.7\]]la btang snyoms de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las nyi shu pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ste/_'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni drug pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dun pa nyams pa med pa'o[#]/_/
[\[321a\]]
