[\[321a.1\]]de la 'dun pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'o/_/de yang gang zhe na/_byams pa chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dun pa nyams pa med do/_/de bzhin du snying rje chen po dang /_chos ston pa dang /_sems can 'dul ba dang /_sems can
[\[321a.2\]]yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_rab tu dben pa dang /_sems can byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug [#]pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/_/de bzhin
[\[321a.3\]]gshegs pa ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dun pa ni ye shes sngon du 'gro ba nyid de de'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste/_'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni bdun pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus nyams pa med do/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus ni
[\[321a.4\]]'di yin te/_'di lta ste/_'dul ba'i sems can rnams yal bar mi 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /_chos nyan pa rnams la brnyas pa med pa'i brtson 'grus so/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi snod chos nyan pa gang bskal par yang chos nyan pas skyo bar mi 'gyur
[\[321a.5\]]ba rnyed na de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos ston zhing kha zas dang bral ba'i rgyud du gyur kyang bskal par yang mi ldang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can la lta bas tha na gang na sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gcig gi phyir yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
[\[321a.6\]]snyed 'da' zhing 'gro ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la lus ngal ba'am/_ngag ngal ba'am sems ngal ba med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems shin tu sbyangs pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa brtson 'grus kyi bsngags pa smra ba ste/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus
[\[321a.7\]]gang gis sems can rnams 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus de sems can rnams la bsngags pa byed de zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste/_'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni brgyad pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]gshegs pa'i dran pa ni yong ye nyams pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub [#]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs
[\[321b.2\]]pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam par bltas kyang [#]de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel ba shin tu med do/_/sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pas ye shes gtong ba [#]yang med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pas
[\[321b.3\]]ni phung po gsum du rnam par dgod pa dang /_sems can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi bsam pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa la rnam par lta bas dran pa nyams pa med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni dran par byas sam bsams sam rnam par brtags te/_
[\[321b.4\]]sems can rnams la chos ston pa med do/_/ston kyang nyams pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni ji ltar yang nyams pa med do/_/de ji ltar bdag ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste/_'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni dgu pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu
[\[321b.5\]]gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang mi mnyam pa ma yin pa dang /_ji lta ba bzhin no/_/ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams par mi 'gyur zhe na/_
[\[321b.6\]]de bzhin nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang ting nge 'dzin mnyam mo/_/ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa de dang de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa [#]ste/_de'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa zhes [#]bya ba nas/_khams gsum char la yang mi gnas pa'i phyir nyams pa med de/_de'i phyir de bzhin
[\[321b.7\]]gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med ces bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bar du 'byung ste/_'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni bcu pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med do/_/shes rab gang zhe na/_gang chos thams cad rab tu shes pa ste gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes pa'o/_/sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams la chos yang dag par ston pa'i shes pa'o/_/so so yang dag par [# ]
[\[322a.2\]]rig pa la mkhas pas tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa'o/_/tshig gcig la 'jug pas bskal pa brgya stong du gnas shing ston pa shes pa'o/_/ji ltar dris pa bzhin du the tshom gcod pa'i shes pa'o/_/thams cad du chags pa med pa'i shes pa'o/_/theg pa gsum rnam par dgod par [# ]
[\[322a.3\]]bstan pa shes pa'o/_/sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du [#]yongs su shes pa'i shes pa'o/_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong so so ci rigs par ston pa shes pa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab mtha' yas pa thug pa med pa
[\[322a.4\]]zad [#]pa med pa tshad med pa bstan pa'o/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la nyams pa med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyang shes rab mi zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o/_/'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
[\[322a.5\]]'dres pa ni bcu gcig pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba nyams pa med do/_/de la rnam par grol ba ste/_nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'o/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni rkyen khong du chud
[\[322a.6\]]pa'o/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni chags pa dang 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral bas [#]rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/_sngon gyi mtha' [#]yang ma bcings/_phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho/_de [#]ltar byung ba la yang mi gnas so/_/mig dang gzugs la gnyis su
[\[322a.7\]]'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'o/_/rna ba la sogs pa yid dang chos la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba ste/_'dzin par mngon par zhen pa'i gnas las rnam par grol ba'o/_/sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de bzhin du shes pa ste/_de'i phyir sems kyi skad
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya'o zhes bya ba nas chos ston to zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ste/_'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni bcu gnyis pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lus kyi las
[\[322b.2\]]thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las de dang ldan pas lta bas kyang sems can rnams 'dul/_smra ba dang cang mi smra ba dang za ba dang spyod lam dang mtshan dag gis kyang sems can rnams 'dul zhes rgyas par 'byung zhing /_
[\[322b.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod lam gang sems can 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba de gang yang med do zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste/_'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni bcu gsum pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes [#]sngon du
[\[322b.4\]]'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa'o/_/chad par lung ston pa'o/_/shin tu nges pa'i tshig smra ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag de yang kun shes par byed pa'o/_/rnam par shes par byed
[\[322b.5\]]pa'o[#]/_/mi mtho ba'o/_/mi dma' ba'o/_/mi g.yo ba'o/_/ldab ldib can ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas nam mkha'i tshad ni [#]rjes su 'gro ba'o/_/rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar yan lag drug cu dang ldan par brjod par bya zhing /_rigs kyi bu
[\[322b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag ni de lta bu ste/_de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste/_'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni bcu bzhi pa'o/_/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/de ci'i
[\[322b.7\]]phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems kyis [#]brjod par bya ba ma yin/_yid kyis [#]ma yin/_rnam par shes pas ma yin gyi/_ye shes kyis [#]rab tu phye ba ste/_ye shes kyi bdag por gyur pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su song
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]ba'o zhes bya ba nas chos thams cad la nges par bsams [#]pa'o/_/lam gyi yan lag shin tu bsgoms [#]pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o/_/dmigs pa las shin tu 'das pa'o/_/rkyen las skye ba dang bral ba'o/_/srid pa
[\[323a.2\]]gsum bsal ba'o/_/bdud kyi las thams cad las rnam par grol ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ni de lta bu'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las nyi
[\[323a.3\]]shu rtsa dgu pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ste/_'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni bco lnga pa'o/_/gzhan yang 'das pa'i dus la ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug go/_/'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing byung ba dang zhig pa ji snyed pa de dag
[\[323a.4\]]thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis [#]rab tu shes so/_/de dag na rtswa [#]dang shing gel ba dang /_sman dang nags tshal du gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu shes so/_/de dag na sems can gyi tshogs sems can du btags par gyur pa ji snyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji snyed pa
[\[323a.5\]]dang /_sangs rgyas re res chos bstan zhing brjod pa ji snyed pa dang /_ji snyed cig nyan thos kyi theg pa la btul ba dang /_ji snyed cig theg pa chen po la btul ba de dag thams cad rab tu shes so zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung zhing sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes so/_/sems gang gi
[\[323a.6\]]'og tu sems gang byung ba de thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes te/_de yang mngon sum gyi [#]shes pa dang rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pas so/_/de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems kyi rgyud 'das pa btang ba rnams kyang dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes de lta bu
[\[323a.7\]]dang ldan pas sems can rnams la phyad [#]par chos ston to zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste/_'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni bcu drug pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]go/_/sems can nam chos sam zhing gang dag cig ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am 'jig par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung zhing /_ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyi rgyud bskal par 'gyur ba ma yin par ma 'ongs pa
[\[323b.2\]]la lta bas sems can rnams la chos ston to zhes bya ba 'byung ste[#]/_'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni bcu bdun pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang da ltar byung ba'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug go/_/de bzhin
[\[323b.3\]]gshegs pas phyogs bcu dag na da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis [#]rab tu shes so/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
[\[323b.4\]]thams cad nas dngos po thams cad dang /_sa'i khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi char brlags [#]pa thams cad kyi bar du bgrang ba'i tshul gyis [#]rab tu shes shing [#]/_de bzhin du chu'i khams skra'i rtse mos blangs pa [#]bgrang ba'i tshul dang /_me'i khams kyi skye ba dang 'gag [#]pa bgrang ba'i
[\[323b.5\]]tshul dang /_rlung gi khams thams cad gzugs su gyur pa la bab pa'i tshul dang /_nam mkha'i khams thams cad skra'i rtse mos rgyas par dgang ba'i tshul gyi bar gyis [#]rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro bar skyes pa'i sems can
[\[323b.6\]]gyi [#]khams dang /_de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i lha'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu shes so zhes rgya cher sbyar bar bya zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ni gnyis kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med cing gnyis su med pa la gzud pa'i [#]phyir sems can rnams la chos
[\[323b.7\]]kyang ston te[#]/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o zhes bya ba 'byung ste/_'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni bco brgyad pa'o/_/rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes ni/_/mngon sum mtshan nyid can du 'dod/_/gzhan
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]ni nyi tshe ba nyid kyis/_/mngon sum zhes byar mi 'dod do/_/gang zhig 'dus byas mtshan nyid dang /_/'dus ma byas kyi [#]mtshan nyid gang /_/de de kho nas stong pa nyid/_/de ni rang mtshan stong pa nyid/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bshad zin to/_/da ltar ba
[\[324a.2\]]'di mi gnas shing /_/'das dang ma 'ongs yod ma yin/_/gang du de dag mi dmigs pa/_/de la mi dmigs pa zhes brjod/_/mi dmigs pa de rang ngo bo/_/de yis dben pa nyid gang de/_/ther zug gnas min 'jig min pas/_/mi dmigs zhes bya'i stong nyid do/_/'das pa [# ]
[\[324a.3\]]dang ma 'ongs pa gnyis [#]zhig pa dang ma skyes pa'i phyir la/_da ltar ba mi gnas pa'i phyir dus gsum char yang med do/_/de la mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni gang du dus gsum mi dmigs pa'o/_/ji skad du/_de la ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa dang /_'jig pa ma yin pa nyid kyi
[\[324a.4\]]phyir mi dmigs pa ni mi dmigs pas stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/rkyen las byung phyir dngos rnams la/_/'dus pa pa yi ngo bo med/_/'dus pa pa ni de nyid kyis/_/stong
[\[324a.5\]]nyid dngos med stong nyid do/_/'dus pa pa ni 'dus pa las byung ba'o/_/rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir na 'dus pa pa yod pa [#]ma yin no/_/ngo bo nyid ni dngos po med pa nyid yin la/_de'i stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid bcu drug po de dag spros pa
[\[324a.6\]]dang bcas par [#]bshad do/_/gang gzhan bzhi po de dag brjod par bya ste/_dngos po'i sgras ni mdor bsdus na/_/phung po lnga rnams brjod pa yin/_/de rnams de yis stong nyid gang /_/de dngos stong pa nyid du bshad/_/dngos po zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'o/_/dngos po ni dngos pos
[\[324a.7\]]stong zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin te 'di ni dngos po stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/mdor bsdus na ni dngos med pa/_/'dus ma byas chos rnams la brjod/_/de ni dngos med des stong nyid/_/dngos po med pa stong [#]nyid do/_/dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]te nam mkha' dang mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa dag go/_/de la dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ste/_'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rang bzhin ngo bo nyid med ni/_/rang bzhin zhes bya'i stong nyid de[#]/_/'di ltar rang bzhin ma byas pas/_/rang
[\[324b.2\]]bzhin zhes ni bya bar bsnyad/_/rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin la bya ste/_nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyis [#]ma byas pa'i phyir ro/_/rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis [#]stong ste/_'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni byung ba 'am/_/ma byung yang rung
[\[324b.3\]]dngos su ni[#]/_/dngos po kun gyi stong pa nyid/_/gzhan gyi dngos por rab tu bsgrags/_/yang dag mtha' dang de bzhin nyid/_/de gzhan [#]dngos po'i stong nyid do/_/gzhan gyi dngos po ni mchog tu byung ba'i de kho na nyid do/_/de'i mchog tu byung ba nyid ni rtag tu yod pa
[\[324b.4\]]nyid do/_/rnam pa gcig tu na gzhan gyi dngos po ni ye shes phul du byung bas rtogs [#]par bya ba'i dngos po ste/_de ni de nyid kyis stong ngo /_/yang na pha rol na yod pa ni gzhan gyi dngos po'o/_/'khor ba las 'das pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dngos po zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i
[\[324b.5\]]mtha' ste/_rnam par 'gyur ba med pas don de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi stong pa nyid ni gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab pha rol phyin tshul las/_/de dag de skad rab tu bsgrags/_/da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lhag par mos pa'i
[\[324b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan phul du byung ba brjod pa'i sgo nas shes rab kyi skabs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa/_de ltar blo gros zer gyis [#]snang ba gsal byas pa/_/rang gi lag na gnas pa'i skyu ru ra bzhin du/_/srid
[\[324b.7\]]gsum 'di dag ma lus gdod nas skye med par/_/rtogs [#]de tha snyad bden pa'i stobs kyis 'gog par 'gro/_/de ltar gyi sgra ni ji skad bshad pa'i rnam par dpyad pa nye bar ston [#]pa'i don du'o/_/ji skad bshad pa'i rnam par dpyad pa las byung ba'i blo gros kyi 'od zer
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]gyis [#]de kho na nyid mthong ba la gegs [#]byed pa'i mun pa 'joms pa'i snang ba gsal bar byas pa [#]gang la yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la de skad ces bya'o/_/de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i stobs kyis 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[325a.2\]]'gog pa'i ngo bos 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'i bsam pa yongs su 'dor ba yang ma yin no zhes bshad pa/_rtag tu 'gog par rtogs [#]pa'i bsam ldan [#]yin mod kyi[#]/_/'gro ba mgon med pa la snying rje'ang skyed par byed/_/'di'i sbyor ba ni 'khor bar gtogs [#]pa yin
[\[325a.3\]]la[#]/_lhag pa'i bsam pa ni mya ngan las 'das par gtogs [#]pa yin pas 'gro ba mgon med pa la 'di'i snying rje ches shin tu rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de gong bde gshegs gsung skyes sangs rgyas 'bring bcas ni/_/ma lus pa rnams blo yis pham par byed pa'ang
[\[325a.4\]]yin/_/sangs rgyas bar ma rnams dang lhan cig tu gyur pa ni sangs rgyas 'bring bcas so/_/de dag su yin zhe [#]na/_bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung las skyes pa rnams te nyan thos rnams so zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de dag thams cad kyang [#]byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa de'i
[\[325a.5\]]gong rol bdun pa la sogs par shes rab kyis [#]pham par byed do/_/kun rdzob de nyid gshog yangs dkar po rgyas gyur pa/_/ngang pa'i rgyal po de ni skye bo'i ngang pa yis/_/mdun du bdar nas dge ba'i rlung gi [#]shugs stobs kyis/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol
[\[325a.6\]]mchog tu 'gro/_/de'i kun rdzob kyi yon tan rnams kyang ches lhag par rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gis [#]na 'di skye bo'i ngang pa phul du byung ba bskyed [#]pa rnams dang lhan cig rgyal ba'i yon tan gyi rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'gyur ba bden pa gnyis po de ni 'di'i
[\[325a.7\]]gshog pa yangs pa gnyis yin no/_/sems bskyed pa drug pa bshad zin to/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bshad pa las sems bskyed pa drug pa'o//_//da ni sems bskyed pa bdun pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_ring du song ba 'dir ni skad cig dang /_/skad
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]cig la ni 'gog [#]par 'jug 'gyur zhing /_/thabs kyi pha rol phyin legs 'bar ba 'thob/_/'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la snyoms par 'jug pa yin pas/_de bzhin nyid la 'gog pa zhes brjod de 'dir spros pa thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ba'i phyir
[\[325b.2\]]ro/_/sa bdun pa ring du [#]song ba 'dir ni sa drug pa thob pa'i 'gog pa de la byang chub sems dpa' skad cig dang skad cig la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur te/_ji skad du/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i [#]'gog pa la
[\[325b.3\]]snyoms par 'jug ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems kyi skad cig dang sems kyi skad cig la yang 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ste/_'gog pa mngon sum du byas zhes [#]ni mi bya'o zhes rgyas par gsungs
[\[325b.4\]]so/_/'di'i [#]thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ches yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro/_/shes rab nyid rnam pa khyad par [#]du zhugs pa la thabs dang smon lam dang stobs dang ye shes zhes shes par [#]bya ste/_rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i gnas skabs kho nar shes rab la [#]shes rab
[\[325b.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bshad pa las sems bskyed pa bdun pa'o//_//da ni sems bskyed pa brgyad pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_yang yang sngar dge las lhag thob bya'i phyir/_/gang du phyir mi ldog pa nyid
[\[325b.6\]]'gyur ba/_/mi g.yo de la bdag nyid che de 'jug_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni yang dang yang du sngar gyi dge ba las lhag pa thob par bya ba'i ched du gang du de phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi g.yo ba la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de la yang dang [# ]
[\[325b.7\]]yang du sngar gyi dge ba las lhag pa thob pa ni/_ji skad du/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i gru bo che ni rgya mtsho chen po la ma thug gi bar du ched du bskyod cing 'gro bar bya ba yin te/_gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen po la phyin ma thag tu rlung
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]gi dkyil 'khor gyis bskyod nas ched du 'bad [#]mi dgos par 'gro ste/_des rgya mtsho chen po la nyin gcig gis ci chod pa de ni sngon chad du bskyod cing 'gro bas lo brgyar yang de srid du tshad med par phyin par mi nus so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du/_
[\[326a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs shin tu bsags pa theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrubs pa yang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgya mtshor phyin nas lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis [#]yud tsam cig la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ci tsam gnon pa de ni sngon gyi
[\[326a.3\]]ched du bya ba'i las kyis bskal pa 'bum du yang de snyed du dpag tu med pa gnon par mi nus so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/'di yi smon lam shin tu dag 'gyur zhing /_/rgyal ba rnams kyis [#]'gog las slong bar mdzad/_/'dis sems dang po bskyed par gyur pa na smon lam
[\[326a.4\]]chen po bcu la sogs pa smon lam 'bum phrag grangs med pa phrag bcu gang dag mngon par btab pa de dag 'di la yongs su dag par 'gyur bas 'di'i [#]smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ches lhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa mi g.yo ba 'di ni gzhon nu'i sar
[\[326a.5\]]rnam par gzhag ste/_dgu par ni rgyal tshab thob la/_bcu par ni 'khor los sgyur ba ltar rgyal ba rnams kyis [#]dbang bskur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sa mi g.yo bar 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs par gyur pa [#]na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis [#]'gog pa las
[\[326a.6\]]slong bar yang mdzad do/_/ji skad du/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa dang /_chos kyi sgo'i rgyun de la gnas pa de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin
[\[326a.7\]]gshegs pa'i ye shes nye bar bsgrub [#]par mdzad do[#]/_/de la 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal te[#]/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su rtogs [#]par bya ba la 'di ni don dam pa'i bzod pa yang yin na/_'on kyang rigs kyi bu gang nged kyi [#]stobs bcu dang mi
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa phun sum tshogs pa de khyod la med kyi[#]/_sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de yongs su btsal ba'i phyir sbyor ba byos shig_/brtson 'grus rtsoms shig_/bzod pa'i sgo 'di nyid kyang ma dor [#]zhig_/rigs kyi bu khyod
[\[326b.2\]]kyis [#]de ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa la gnas pa thob kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo ma zhi ba rab tu ma zhi ba nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kun tu 'byung bar gyur pa [#]rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis [#]yid g.yen spyo ba 'di dag la soms shig_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sngon gyi smon lam dang
[\[326b.3\]]zhes rgya cher 'byung ba nas/_gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i sgo rnams su gzhug pa mdzad du zin na/_de de nyid kyi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar [#]'gyur te zhes bya ba la
[\[326b.4\]]sogs pa'i bar du gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/gang gi phyir 'di de ltar 'gog pa las slong ba de [#]nyid kyi phyir 'di'i/_chags pa med pa'i blo ni skyon rnams dag dang lhan cig mi gnas phyir/_/sa brgyad pa la dri ma de dag rtsar [#]bcas nye bar zhi 'gyur zhing /_/nyon mongs zad cing khams
[\[326b.5\]]gsum bla mar gyur kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/_/'byor pa mkha' ltar mtha' bral ma lus thob par nus ma yin/_/rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi nyi ma shar bas mun pa ltar nyon mongs pa sngar byung ba 'khor bar skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa khams gsum na spyod pa gang yin pa de dag
[\[326b.6\]]thams cad kyang rtsa ba dang bcas par zhi ba kho nar 'gyur [#]la/_de [#]de spangs pas sa [#]gsum gyi bla ma nyid du gyur du zin kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'dis gnas skabs der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'byor pa thob par mi nus te/_de thob par bya ba'i phyir 'dis bsgrim par bya
[\[326b.7\]]dgos so/_/de de nyid kyi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar [#]'gyur te zhes 'byung ba'i phyir/_'di khams gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid srid pa yin te/_'dod chags dang ma bral ba la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa srid pa med pa'i phyir[#]/_gal te 'dis der
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]khams gsum las 'dod chags dang [#]bral bar gyur [#]na/_de'i tshe 'khor ba 'gags pas ji ltar 'di [#]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lus pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/_bshad pa/_'khor ba 'gags [#]kyang dbang rnams bcu po thob par gyur zhing de dag gis/_/
[\[327a.2\]]srid pa'i 'gro bar rang gi bdag nyid sna tshogs ston par byed par 'gyur/_/'dir [#]'khor ba ni 'gags [#]mod kyi de lta na yang 'di la dbang bcu po de [#]dag nye bar skye la/_de dag gis 'dis [#]yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyi sgo nas bdag nyid kyi dngos po sna tshogs pa ston par byed
[\[327a.3\]]do/_/de'i phyir 'di'i tshogs ma lus par yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gal lo/_/de la dbang bcu ni/_ji skad du/_bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshe tshad byin gyis rlob pas tshe la dbang ba 'thob bo/_/ting nge 'dzin nges par sems pa [#]dpag tu med pa'i ye shes kyis [#]'jug
[\[327a.4\]]pas sems la dbang ba 'thob bo/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyan bkod pa [#]du mas rab tu brgyan pa'i byin gyi rlabs [#]kun tu ston pas yo byad la dbang ba 'thob [#]bo/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyi rlabs kyis [#]dus ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas las la dbang ba 'thob
[\[327a.5\]]bo/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba kun tu ston pas skye ba la dbang ba 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_dus gang du [#]ci dga' bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa [#]kun tu ston pas smon lam la dbang ba [#]'thob bo/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
[\[327a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyis [#]rab tu gang ba [#]kun tu ston pas mos pa la dbang ba 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang po [#]'thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi
[\[327a.7\]]chos ma 'dres pa dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa kun tu ston pas ye shes la dbang ba 'thob bo/_/mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba kun tu ston pas chos la dbang ba 'thob bo zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/sems
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]bskyed pa brgyad pa bshad zin to/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bshad pa las sems bskyed pa brgyad pa'o//_//da ni sems bskyed pa dgu pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_dgu pa la ni de'i stobs lta zhig mtha' dag rdzogs par dag 'gyur zhing /_/de bzhin yang dag rig chos [#]rang
[\[327b.2\]]gi yon tan yongs su dag pa'ang 'thob/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu par ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing so so yang dag par rig pa rang gi yon tan yongs su dag pa bzhi yang 'thob ste/_chos so so yang dag par rig pa
[\[327b.3\]]dang /_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/[#]de la chos so so yang dag par rig pas ni chos thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rab tu shes so/_/don so so yang dag par rig pas ni
[\[327b.4\]]chos thams cad kyi rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes so/_/nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas ni chos rnams ma 'dres par ston pa [#]rab tu shes so/_/spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas ni chos rnams kyi mthun pa'i rgyu rgyun chad pa med pa nyid du rab tu shes so/_/sems
[\[327b.5\]]bskyed pa dgu pa bshad zin to/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bshad pa las sems bskyed pa dgu pa'o//_//da ni sems bskyed pa bcu pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_bcu pa'i sa la de yis kun nas sangs rgyas rnams las dbang bskur ba/_/dam pa thob cing ye shes
[\[327b.6\]]lhag par mchog tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang yin/_/char sprin rnams las chu char 'bab pa ji ltar de bzhin 'gro rnams kyi/_/dge ba'i lo thog ched du rgyal sras las kyang lhun grub chos char 'bab/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[327b.7\]]la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dbang bskur te/_ji skad du/_de la ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu ji snyed pa'i tha ma la byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang khyad par med par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba mngon
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]du 'gyur te/_mngon du gyur ma thag tu stong gsum 'bum phrag bcu'i gtos dang mnyam pa'i rin po che chen po'i pad+ma rin po che rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pas spras pa zhes bya ba nas rgyas par stong gsum 'bum phrag bcur tshang ba'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
[\[328a.2\]]snyed kyi pad+ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyang de dang 'tsham zhing de'i rkyen du 'bab par gnas so/_/de [#]ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu pad+ma [#]de la 'dug par kun tu snang ngo /_/de de la 'dug pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
[\[328a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas gdan [#]'dzom pa rnams kyi [#]mdzod spu nas 'od zer dag phyung nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de la dbang bskur bar mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/'di'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ches yongs su dag par yang 'gyur la/_sprin chen
[\[328a.4\]]po ltar 'jig rten gyi dge ba'i lo thog [#]mngon par spel ba'i phyir/_lhun gyis [#]grub par dam pa'i chos kyi char yang mngon par 'bebs so/_/sems bskyed pa bcu pa bshad zin to/_/dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bshad pa las sems bskyed pa bcu pa'o//_//[#]da ni sems
[\[328a.5\]]bskyed pa dang po nas brtsams te de dag gis [#]yon tan gyi grangs thob pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_de'i [#]tshe 'dis ni sangs rgyas brgya mthong zhing /_/de dag byin gyi rlabs [#]kyang 'di yis rtogs/_/de nyid tshe na bskal pa brgyar gnas shing /_/sngon dang phyi ma'i
[\[328a.6\]]mthar yang yang dag 'jug_/blo ldan ting 'dzin brgya phrag snyoms par 'jug cing gtong byed de/_/'jig rten khams brgya 'di yis kun nas g.yo zhing snang bar nus/_/de bzhin rdzu 'phrul gyis [#]de sems can brgya phrag smin byed cing /_/brgya phrag grangs dang rjes
[\[328a.7\]]'brel zhing dag tu yang 'gro bar 'gyur/_/des [#]ni chos kyi sgo rnams yang dag 'byed byed thub dbang sras/_/rang gi lus la lus rnams kun nas ston par byed pa'ang yin/_/rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas mdzes 'byor lus ni re re zhing /_/rgyal ba'i sras po brgya phrag dag
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]dang rjes su 'brel ba'ang ston/_/ji skad du/_rab tu byung nas kyang skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la ting nge 'dzin brgya rab tu 'thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa yang 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas brgya mthong ba dang /_de dag gi byin gyi rlabs [#]kyang yang dag par shes
[\[328b.2\]]pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams brgya g.yo bar byed pa dang /_zhing brgyar yang 'gro ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams brgya snang bar byed pa dang /_sems can brgya yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_bskal pa brgyar yang [#]gnas par byed pa dang /_bskal pa brgya la sngon dang phyi
[\[328b.3\]]ma'i mthar 'jug [#]pa dang /_chos kyi sgo brgya rnam par 'byed pa dang /_lus brgya kun tu ston pa dang /_lus re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' brgya brgya dang ldan par kun tu ston pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/blo ldan rab tu dga' bar gnas pas yon tan de dag
[\[328b.4\]]ni/_/thob par gyur nas de bzhin kho nar dri ma med gnas pas/_/de dag stong ni yang dag thob [#]par 'gyur ba ste[#]/_/sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dis yon tan grangs brgya dang rjes su 'brel ba gang dag [#]thob pa de dag kho na sems gnyis pa bskyed pa'i byang
[\[328b.5\]]chub sems dpas stong 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes rgya cher bgrang bar bya'o/_/yon tan de dag nyid sems bskyed pa gsum pa la sogs pas lnga pa'o[#]/_/'di dag rnams la byang chub sems dpa' yis ni 'bum phrag dang /_/bye ba phrag brgya 'thob cing de yis bye ba stong
[\[328b.6\]]'gyur 'thob/_/de nas bye ba brgya phrag stong 'gyur yang 'thob bye ba phrag_/khrag khrig phrag brgyar [#]rdzogs par sgyur [#]dang slar yang stong phrag tu/_/yang dag par ni sgyur [#]ba mtha' dag rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/_/de la sems gsum pa bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni ji
[\[328b.7\]]skad bshad pa'i yon tan rnams 'bum 'thob bo/_/sems bzhi pa bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni bye ba phrag brgya 'thob bo/_/sems lnga pa bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni bye ba phrag stong 'thob bo/_/sems drug pa bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni bye ba
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]'bum 'thob bo/_/sems bdun pa bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni yon tan de dag nyid bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum [#]'thob par shes par bya'o/_/de yan chad ni yon tan dag la grangs kyis yongs su bgrang bar mi srid pas/_rdul phra rab rnams
[\[329a.2\]]kyis yongs su bgrang bar bshad pa/_mi g.yo'i sar gnas rnam rtog med pa des/_/stong gsum brgya phrag stong bsdoms [#]'jig rten na/_/rdul tshad ji snyed yod pa de rnams dang /_/grangs mnyam yon tan dag ni 'thob par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems brgyad pa [# ]
[\[329a.3\]]bskyed pas ni ji skad du bstan pa'i yon tan dag stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 'thob bo/_/legs pa'i blo gros sa la gnas pa yi/_/byang chub sems des sngar bstan yon tan dag_/grangs med brgya phrag stong du yang dag
[\[329a.4\]]par/_/bsdoms pa phrag bcu'i rdul tshad thob par 'gyur/_/sems dgu pa bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni sngar bstan pa'i yon tan dag stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi [#]rdul dang mnyam pa 'thob bo/_/re
[\[329a.5\]]zhig bcu pa 'dir de'i yon tan dag_/ngag gi spyod yul las ches 'das gyur zhing /_/ngag gi spyod yul ma yin bsdoms rnams na/_/rdul dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems bcu pa bskyed pas ni yon tan ji skad du bstan pa dag sangs
[\[329a.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med [#]pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/re zhig bcu pa 'dir de'i zhes bya ba'i re zhig gi [#]sgra 'dis ni de tsam kho nar zad pa ni ma yin no zhes yon tan brjod par bya ba la go rims ston par byed do/_/gzhan
[\[329a.7\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni/_ba spu'i khung bur byang chub sems rnams [#]dang /_/lhan cig rdzogs sangs rgyas sku bgrang 'das dang /_/de bzhin lha dang lha min mi dag kyang /_/skad cig skad cig la ni ston par nus/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems bcu pa
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]bskyed pa 'dis ni rtog pa kun nas rgyu ba med par rang gis [#]lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga re rer [#]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba las 'das pa re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' gzhal gyis mi lang ba'i 'khor mnga' ba dag skad cig skad cig la rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du'ang ston par
[\[329b.2\]]nus la/_de dag las gzhan 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba mi la sogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad pas [#]yang ma 'dres par ba spu'i khung bu re rer skad cig re re la ston par nus so/_/kyang gi sgra ni ma smos pa bsdu ba'i don du ste/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_
[\[329b.3\]]mi'i rgyal po dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gdul ba'i sems can rnams la brgya byin la sogs pa'i gzugs bzung nas lhun gyis grub par chos ston par nus so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bar gyi don sdud pa'o/_/yon tan
[\[329b.4\]]gyi khyad par rnams rgyas par ni mdo nyid las btsal [#]bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i yon tan bstan pa bshad zin to/_/de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi sa'i yon tan cung zad tsam cig [#]brjod par 'dod pas bstod pa sgrub pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
[\[329b.5\]]dbang du byas te bshad pa/_gang phyir nam mkha' dri ma med la zla snang gsal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/_/sngon tshe stobs bcu bskyed pa'i sa la khyod kyis slar yang 'bad gyur zhing /_/'og min du ni gang gi don du 'bad gyur go 'phang mchog zhi ba/_/yon tan mtha' dag mthar
[\[329b.6\]]thug mtshungs pa med de khyod kyis brnyes/_/dper na zla bas nam mkha' dri ma med pa kho na la 'gro ba ma lus pa gsal bar nus pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob pa [#]la gegs byed pa'i mun pa sbyong ba nyid du mdzad pa/_thugs bskyed pa bcu pa
[\[329b.7\]]brnyes pas rang nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos brnyes nus par mkhyen nas dus phyis sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'bad pa brtsams par gyur la/_gang gi don du 'bad pa 'di brtsams pa bla na med pa'i [#]ye shes de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]'og min gyi gnas kho nar brnyes par gyur to/_/de ni yon tan mtha' dag
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]gi mthar thug pa ste yon tan mtha' dag 'dir mthar thug cing phul [#]du byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de ni mtshungs pa med pa [#]yang yin te/_de dang 'dra ba med pa'i phyir dang gong na med pa'i phyir ro/_/der mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba na bcom ldan 'das kyis skad cig gcig [# ]
[\[330a.2\]]kho na la thams cad mkhyen pa'i [#]ye shes brnyes so zhes bya ba 'di bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa/_ji ltar snod kyi [#]dbye bas mkha' la dbye ba med de ltar/_/dngos byas dbye ba 'ga' yang de nyid la med de yi phyir/_/ro mnyam nyid du yang dag thugs su chud par mdzad gyur nas/_/
[\[330a.3\]]mkhyen bzangs [#]khyod kyis skad cig gis ni shes bya thugs su chud/_/dper na bum pa dang 'khar [#]gzhong la sogs pa tha dad kyang sgrib pa med pa nyid du mtshungs pa'i phyir der rtogs [#]pa'i nam mkha' la tha dad pa med pa de bzhin du/_gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa'i dngos po
[\[330a.4\]]tha dad kyang der gtogs [#]pa'i de kho na nyid skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid can la tha dad pa med pas de kho na nyid ni ro gcig pa [#]kho nar shes par bya'o/_/de yang mkhyen pa'i skad cig gcig kho nas thugs su chud pas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa'i skad cig gcig kho nas [# ]
[\[330a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes so/_/'dir [#]smras pa/_gang tshe zhi ba de nyid yin na de la blo gros 'jug mi 'gyur/_/blo ma zhugs par shes bya'i yul can nges par rigs [#]pa'ang ma yin la/_/kun nas shes med pa ni shes par ji ltar 'gyur te 'gal bar 'gyur/_/mkhyen
[\[330a.6\]]po med par khyed kyis gzhan la 'di lta'o zhes su zhig ston/_/skye ba med pa ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid do zhes rnam par 'jog cing de yang shes pa yin no zhes 'jog pa [#]na/_gang gi tshe zhi ba de kho na nyid yin no zhes rnam par gzhag pa de nyid kyi tshe de la rnam pa thams
[\[330a.7\]]cad [#]blo mi 'jug par khas blang dgos te/_'di ltar de kho na nyid skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin can la blo 'jug pa na ci'i rnam pa can zhig tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i phyir rnam pa med pas de kho na nyid la blo mi 'jug pa nyid do/_/blo mi 'jug na ni/_'o na shes bya'i yul can gyi
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]nges pa yang mi rigs [#]pas de'i phyir 'di yongs su shes par 'gyur bar ji ltar 'os/_yongs su shes pa med pa nyid de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa'o zhes bya bar yang mi rigs so/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_smras pa/_kun nas shes pa [#]med pa ni shes par ji ltar 'gyur te 'gal bar
[\[330b.2\]]'gyur/_kun nas mi shes pa nyid shes pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni phan tshun 'gal ba zhig ste/_gal te kun nas mi shes pa yin na ji ltar shes pa yin/_sems skye ba med na yang mkhyen pa po med par 'di lta bu'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid ngas thugs su chud do zhes
[\[330b.3\]]khyed cag gi gzhan dag la su zhig gis rtogs [#]par byed/_de'i phyir 'di mi rigs so/_/'di la brjod par bya ste/_gang tshe skye med de nyid yin zhing blo yang skye ba dang bral ba/_/de tshe de rnams bsten [#]las de yis de nyid rtogs [#]pa lta bu ste/_/ji ltar sems ni gang gi rnam pa can
[\[330b.4\]]du 'gyur ba de yis yul/_/de yongs shes pa de bzhin tha snyad nye bar bsten [#]nas rig pa yin/_/'di na de'i rnam pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid 'dzin pa na rnam par shes pas yul rig go zhes brjod do[#]/_/dper na rnam par shes pa sngon po'i rnam par [#]bsrel ba nye bar skye ba na sngon po shes so
[\[330b.5\]]zhes brjod pa de bzhin du/_shes pa de kho na nyid kyi rnam pa'i rjes su byed pa skye ba na de kho na nyid shes so zhes nye bar gdags so/_/shes pa de'i rnam pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir/_gang tshe skye med de nyid yin zhing blo yang skye ba dang bral ba/_/de tshe de rnams bsten [#]las
[\[330b.6\]]de yis de nyid rtogs [#]pa lta bu ste/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_de'i rnam pa bsten [#]pa'i sgo nas rnam par gzhag go/_/ji ltar sems ni gang gi rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rab tu grags par gyur pa'i dpe smos te de yang rnam par bshad zin to/_/de'i phyir btags [#]pa las
[\[330b.7\]]de kho na nyid rtogs so zhes rnam par gzhag gi/_dngos su na 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig gis [#]shes pa ni ma yin te/_shes pa dang shes bya gnyi ga yang ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/gang yang mkhyen po med par khyed kyis [#]gzhan la 'di lta bu'o zhes su zhig ston zhes
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]smras pa de la yang brjod par bya ste/_shes pa 'di skye ba med pa de [#]kho na yin [#]pa bden mod kyi 'jig rten na de nyid ston pa mi srid pa yang ma yin no/_/ji ltar zhe na/_brjod par bya ste/_de yi longs spyod rdzogs sku bsod nams kyis/_/zin dang sprul pa mkha'
[\[331a.2\]]gzhan las de'i mthus/_/sgra gang chos kyi de nyid ston 'byung ba/_/de las 'jig rten gyis kyang [#]de nyid rig_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gzugs kyi sku gang la bzhugs nas chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du mdzad pa'i sku bsod nams brgyas zin pa/_bsam gyis [#]mi
[\[331a.3\]]khyab cing sna tshogs pa'i sku mnga' ba de ni ngo bo de dang der byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi longs spyod kyi rgyu [#]nyid du yongs su 'gyur ba yin te/_gang las da dung du yang 'jam dpal skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig bla dwags
[\[331a.4\]]so [#]zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsung rab kyi tha snyad sna tshogs pa dag rtogs [#]par 'gyur ba/_bsod nams brgya las bskrun pa [#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi [#]sgra gang zhig 'byung ba de las 'jig rten rnam pa [#]de lta bu'i chos nye bar ston pa'i snod du gyur pas de
[\[331a.5\]]kho na nyid phyin ci ma log par nges par 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyis [#]'dus byas pa'i sku las 'byung ba lta zhog gi de'i byin gyi rlabs [#]kyis sprul pa dag las chos [#]kyi de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa'i sgra gang zhig 'byung ba de las kyang 'jig rten gyis [#]de kho na nyid nges
[\[331a.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/sprul pa dag las 'byung ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gzhan yang de'i mthus sems dang sems las byung ba 'jug pa med du zin kyang /_nam mkha' dang [#]gzhan rtswa [#]dang shing dang rtsig pa dang brag la sogs pa las de'i mthus sgra gang zhig 'byung ba de [#]las kyang
[\[331a.7\]]'jig rten gyis [#]de nyid rig pa yin no/_/yang ji ltar sems dang sems las byung ba med pa'i rang bzhin can rnam par rtog pa med pa ni bya ba da lta ba [#]mi srid kyang ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid du 'gyur zhe na/_de bstan pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi dpe nye bar bkod pa/_ji
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]ltar rdza mkhan stobs chen ldan pas 'dir/_/yun rings 'bad pas ches bskor 'khor lo ni/_/de rtsol da lta skyes pa med bzhin du'ang /_/'khor zhing bum pa la sogs rgyur mthong ltar/_/de bzhin da lta skyes rtsol med bzhin du/_/chos kyi bdag can sku nyid la
[\[331b.2\]]bzhugs [#]de'i/_/'jug pa skye bo'i dge dang smon lam gyi/_/khyad par gyis 'phangs las ches bsam mi khyab/_/de la gang gis na [#]rtog pa med par gyur du zin kyang gdul ba'i bya ba ji ltar 'tsham [#]pa ltar 'jug pas sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i don byed par 'gyur
[\[331b.3\]]ba/_ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag da ltar [#]rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang dpag bsam gyi shing dang 'dra bar ji ltar 'tsham par sems can gyi don sgrub pa lhur mdzad cing chos kyi dbyings las skad cig kyang mi bskyod la/_sems can
[\[331b.4\]]'dul ba'i dus las kyang mi 'da' ba de bzhin du bdag kyang gyur cig ces byang chub sems dpa' [#]sngar smon lam gang btab pa'i smon lam de'i shugs dang /_gdul ba rnams kyi rnam pa de lta bu'i chos nyan par 'gyur ba'i las yongs su smin pa las bya ba'i khyad par [#]de 'dra ba
[\[331b.5\]]dag mngon pa yin no/_/de ltar na da ltar skyes pa'i 'bad rtsol med par de kho na nyid nye bar ston pa dang /_sems can gyi don bya ba yang 'grub bo zhes bya ba [#]shes par bya'o/_/da ni chos kyi sku'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_shes bya'i bud shing skam po ma lus pa/_/bsregs
[\[331b.6\]]pas zhi ste rgyal rnams chos sku ste/_/de'i [#]tshe skye ba med cing 'gag pa med/_/sems 'gag pa [#]de sku yis mngon sum mdzad/_/ye shes kyi rang bzhin can gyi sku shes bya'i bud shing skam po ma lus pa bsregs pa la shes bya [#]skye ba med pas skye ba med pa dang ldan par gyur pa [#]gang
[\[331b.7\]]yin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi sku'o/_/'di nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas/_sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid lta/_/'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku/_/chos nyid shes bya'ang ma yin te/_/de ni shes par nus ma yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/chos kyi sku 'di ni/_de'i [#]tshe
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa ste/_'di nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas 'jam dpal skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig bla dwags so zhes gsungs so/_de ltar [#]na ye shes kyi yul de kho na nyid la rnam pa thams cad
[\[332a.2\]]du de'i yul can [#]sems dang sems las byung ba rnams mi 'jug pas sku kho nas mngon sum du mdzad par kun rdzob tu rnam par gzhag go/_/'di ni/_zhi sku dpag bsam shing ltar gsal gyur cing [#]/_/yid bzhin nor bu ji bzhin rnam mi rtog_/'gro grol bar du 'jig rten
[\[332a.3\]]'byor slad rtag_/'di ni spros dang bral la snang bar 'gyur[#]/_/sku gang gis de kho na nyid 'di mngon sum du mdzad par bshad pa de ni zhi ba'i rang bzhin can du 'dod de/_sems dang sems las byung ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/zhi ba'i rang bzhin can yin yang sems can gyi
[\[332a.4\]]don mdzad par spyod pa gsal bar byed pa ni/_dpag bsam shing ltar gsal gyur cing [#]/_/yid bzhin nor bu ji bzhin rnam [#]mi rtog_/ces bya ba ste/_'di rnam par mi rtog pa nyid yin du zin kyang dpag bsam gyi shing dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar ji ltar mngon par
[\[332a.5\]]'dod pa'i don 'grub pa'i rgyu nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sku 'di ni 'khor ba ji srid par 'jig rten gyi 'byor pa'i slad du gnas pa yang yin no/_/rtag ces bya ba 'dis ni yun ring por gnas pa nyid du mtshon to[#]/_/de'i phyir 'jig rten ji srid pa dang nam mkha' ji srid
[\[332a.6\]]pa de srid du sangs rgyas rnams tshul 'dis sems can gyi don kho na mdzad cing rnam par bzhugs [#]so zhes bya bar shes par bya'o/_/bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spros pa dang bral ba rang gi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs las
[\[332a.7\]]shes rab dri ma med pa'i me long thob pa rnams kho nal yod pa nyid du snang gi spros pa dang bcas pa rnams la ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi sku las byung ba'am gzugs kyi sku'i mthu las byung ba yin yang rung ste/_ji skad bshad pa'i sku las gzhan du gyur pa rgyu mthun pa'i sku gang dag
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]sems can 'dul ba'i rgyus byung ba de dag la yang mthu'i khyad par bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' bar brjod pa'i phyir bshad pa/_thub dbang dus gcig kho nar de'i rgyu mthun/_/gzugs sku gcig la rang gi skye gnas skabs/_/sngar 'gags gsal [#]dang ma 'chol byung
[\[332b.2\]]tshul ni/_/ma lus kyis bkra mtha' dag ston par mdzad/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gnas skabs kyi snga rol 'khor ba thog ma med pa [#]rang nyid kyi skye ba'i gnas skabs 'gags zin pa byung mtha' dag [#]ma lus par bstan pa'i phyir gsal ba dang ma 'chol
[\[332b.3\]]bar de phan tshun ma 'dres par byung tshul du mas bkra bar gyur pa de dag thams cad cig car kho nar me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu yongs su dag pa la bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan ltar rgyu mthun pa'i sku gcig nyid la lhun gyis grub par ston par mdzad do/_/'di byang
[\[332b.4\]]chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i byung tshul gang dang gang du ji ltar gang gi don du byung ba de dag thams cad [#]lhun gyis grub par sku gcig kho na la ston par spyod par brjod pa'i phyir bshad pa/_sangs rgyas zhing ci 'dra der thub dbang dang /_/de dag sku spyod mthu stobs ci
[\[332b.5\]]'dra dang /_/nyan thos dge 'dun ji snyed ji [#]lta dang /_/byang chub sems rnams der gzugs ci 'dra dang /_/ci 'dra'i chos dang de bdag ci 'dra dang /_/chos thos spyod pa gang la spyad pa dang /_/sbyin gang ji tsam de dag la phul ba/_/de ni ma lus sku gcig la ston mdzad/_/
[\[332b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi [#]sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang rnams la bsnyen bkur mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing baiDUr+ya dang /_pad+ma rA ga dang /_an+da rnyil dang /_shel la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can/_rin po che'i
[\[332b.7\]]ljon shing la sogs pas mdzes par byas pa chu [#]dang zheng dang kun nas zlum pa dang bcas pa de la brtan [#]pa'i sems can gyi khyad par gyis nye bar mdzes pa ci 'dra ba zhig na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bltams pa la sogs pa ston par mdzad pa de ma lus par sku gcig
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]la ston par mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku dang spyod pa dag gi mthu phul du byung ba gang yin pa dang /_de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'dus par gyur pa ji snyed pa'am ji lta dang ste/_chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi nan tan rnam pa gang
[\[333a.2\]]gis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun der gyur pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan dang dpe byad kyis lus spras pa/_dbyibs dang ldan pa chos gos dang zas dang gnas la sogs pa yongs su longs spyod pa
[\[333a.3\]]nye bar longs spyod pa dang ldan pa ci 'dra ba de dag yod par gyur pa dang /_ci 'dra ba'i chos dang ste theg pa gcig dang gsum gyi rten [#]can bstan pa de dag thams cad sku gcig la ston par mdzad do/_/de bdag ci 'dra dang ste bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs su skyes pa gzugs dang blo dang ldan pa/_khyim pa dang rab tu byung bar
[\[333a.4\]]gyur pa dang /_chos thos nas lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa'i bslab pa khas blangs te spyod pa gang la spyad pa dang /_sbyin pa gang ci tsam de dag la phul ba ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag la bza' ba
[\[333a.5\]]la sogs pa dang /_chos gos dang rin po che'i rgyan la sogs pa gang phul ba dang /_ji tsam ste dus ji tsam dang tshad ji tsam phul ba de ma lus par sku gcig la ston par mdzad do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byung mtha' 'di ji ltar ston pa/_de bzhin tshul khrims bzod
[\[333a.6\]]brtson ting 'dzin dang /_/shes rab spyod tshe sngar gyi gnas skabs gang /_/ma tshang med de dag_/ma lus sku gcig la ston mdzad ces gong ma dang sbyar ro/_/sku gcig la cig car gnas skabs thams cad ston pa lta zhog gi 'on kyang /_nyid spyod pa kun/_sku yi ba spu'i khung
[\[333a.7\]]bu'ang gsal bar ston/_/bdag nyid kyi spyod pa kho na ston par mdzad pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/_gzhan yang /_sangs rgyas gang dag 'das dang 'byung 'gyur gang /_/gang dag da ltar nam mkha'i mthar thug par/_/gdangs mthon chos ston sdug bsngal gyis bzung ba'i/_/
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]'gro dbugs 'byin zhing [#]'jig rten bzhugs pa dang /_/dang po'i thugs bzung byang chub snying po'i bar/_/de dag spyod kun dngos rnams mig 'phrul gyis[#]/_/rang bzhin mkhyen nas bdag bzhin ba spu yi/_/khung bur dus gcig la ni gsal bar ston/_/re zhig mig 'phrul gyi
[\[333b.2\]]tshul shes pa tha mal pa dag kyang sngags kyi mthu rnam pa de lta bu tsam zhig gis rang gi lus la dngos po'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa gnas par ston nus na/_ci 'gro ba'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dngos po'i rang
[\[333b.3\]]bzhin mig 'phrul gyi rang bzhin rnam pa de lta bu dang tha mi dad pa mkhyen nas mi spyod par 'gyur ram/_de'i phyir/_mkhas pa gang zhig ma rtogs pa'am som nyi za bar 'gyur/_/de'i phyir mkhas pas dpe 'di'i sgo nas gsal bar 'di la lhag par mos par bya'o/_/ji ltar nyid kyi
[\[333b.4\]]spyod pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyi spyod pa dag dus gcig tu rang nyid kyi ba spu'i khung bur ston par mdzad pa/_de bzhin dus gsum byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/rang rgyal 'phags pa nyan thos ma lus kyi/_/spyod dang de lhag skye bo'i gnas skabs ni/_/thams
[\[333b.5\]]cad ba spu'i khung bur gcig tshe ston/_/sku phun sum tshogs pa brjod nas rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' bar [#]zin kyang bzhed pa la mnga' bsgyur ba nyid phun sum tshogs par bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa/_dag pa 'di ni bzhed par 'jug pa yis/_/rdul gcig yul la mkha' gtugs 'jig rten dang /_/
[\[333b.6\]]'jig rten mtha' yas phyogs khyab rdul ston mod/_/rdul rags mi 'gyur 'jig rten phra mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni bzhed pa'i sgo nas nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig rten rdul phra rab gcig gi yul la ston par byed de/_'jig rten phra bar yang mi
[\[333b.7\]]'gyur zhing rdul phra rab rags par yang mi 'gyur la/_bzhed pa nyid kyis rang gi ngo bo ji ltar gnas pa yang de ltar yang dag par ston to/_/'jig rten mtha' yas phyogs khyab rdul yang ston te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzhed pa tsam gyis mtha' yas phyogs te 'jig rten ma lus pa'i
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]'jig [#]rten rdul phra rab gcig gis khyab par yang ston par mdzad do/_/de bzhin du/_rnam rtog mi mnga' khyod kyis srid mtha'i bar/_/skad cig de [#]re re la spyod sna tshogs/_/ji snyed ston pa de snyed 'dzam bu'i gling /_/ma lus rdul gang de dag la grangs med/_/rnam par rtog
[\[334a.2\]]pa mi mnga' ba khyod 'khor ba'i bar du skad cig dang skad cig la spyod pa sna tshogs ston pa'i tshad gang yin pa'i tshad de'i grangs ni 'dzam bu'i gling ma lus pa na rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de dag la yod pa ma yin no zhes 'di ni thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan phul du byung bar brjod pa'i sgo nas bcom ldan
[\[334a.3\]]'das la bstod pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi sa ni stobs bcus rab tu phye ba yin pa'i phyir de'i rnam par dbye ba cha tsam zhig bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa/_gnas dang gnas min mkhyen stobs dang /_/de bzhin las rnam smin blo dang /_/mos pa sna tshogs thugs chud dang /_/sna tshogs
[\[334a.4\]]khams ni mkhyen stobs dang /_/de bzhin dbang mchog mchog ma yin/_/mkhyen dang thams cad du 'gro dang /_/bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin dang /_/snyoms par 'jug sogs mkhyen stobs dang /_/sngon gnas dran pa mkhyen pa dang /_/de bzhin 'chi 'pho skye blo dang /_/
[\[334a.5\]]zag rnams zad pa mkhyen stobs te/_/stobs ni bcu po 'di dag go/_/de la gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_rgyu gang zhig las gang zhig nges par skye 'gyur ba/_/de ni de yi gnas su de mkhyen rnams kyis gsungs/_/bshad pa
[\[334a.6\]]las bzlog gnas min shes bya mtha' yas pa/_/mkhyen pa thogs pa spangs pa de ni stobs su bshad/_/rgyu gang zhig las gang zhig ces bya ba 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa ste/_de'i phyir rgyu gang las gang zhig skye ba 'di lta ste/_mi dge ba dag las rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_gang
[\[334a.7\]]las gang zhig 'thob pa 'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i lam las mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa sdud pa 'thad par 'gyur ro/_/rgyu gang las gang zhig nges par [#]skye ba can de'i gnas te 'dir gnas pa [#]na zhes bya bas gnas kyi sgras [#]btags pa'i tshul gyis rgyu
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]brjod do/_/bshad zin pa dang 'gal ba ni gnas ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig las gang mi 'byung ba de ni de'i gnas [#]ma yin te/_dper na dge ba dag las 'bras bu yid du mi 'ong ba mi 'byung ba dang /_mthong ba'i lam thob pa la srid pa brgyad pa mngon par 'grub pa mi 'byung
[\[334b.2\]]ba bzhin no/_/de'i phyir mkhyen pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang bral ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi stobs su rnam par gzhag ste/_ji skad du 'phags pa gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos zhus pa'i mdo las/_rigs kyi bu 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs
[\[334b.3\]]pa'i ye shes bla na med pas gnas pa [#]la yang gnas su [#]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rigs kyi bu de la gnas ni gang gnas ma yin pa ni gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni
[\[334b.4\]]gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang lus kyis nyes par [#]spyad pa dang /_ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang /_yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang sdug pa dang dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod pa
[\[334b.5\]]ste/_gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang /_ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang /_yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba 'di na [#]gnas yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing
[\[334b.6\]]go skabs med de/_gang ser snas longs spyod chen po mngon par 'grub pa dang /_ngang tshul ngan pas lha dang mir skye ba dang /_gnod sems kyis mdzes par 'gyur ba dang /_le los mngon par rtogs pa 'thob pa dang /_sems g.yengs pas skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang /_'chal
[\[334b.7\]]ba'i shes rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kun tu [#]'joms par 'gyur ba dang /_mtshams med pa byed pas sems gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_dmigs pa can gyis rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /_'gyod pa la rab tu gnas pa'i sems shin
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]tu sbyang bar [#]'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do[#]/_/gang bud med kyi lus de nyid kyis 'khor los sgyur [#]ba'i rgyal po'am/_brgya byin nam tshangs pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /_'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod pa ste/_sbyin
[\[335a.2\]]pas longs spyod chen po mngon par 'grub pa dang zhes thams cad bzlog nas sbyar bar bya zhing /_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las dang po'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/da ni las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi [#]dbang du byas te bshad pa/_
[\[335a.3\]]'dod dang mi 'dod de las bzlog dang zad dngos kyi[#]/_/las dang de yi rnam smin shin tu sna tshogs la'ang /_/mkhyen pa nus mthu thogs med so sor 'jug [#]'gyur la/_/dus gsum shes bya khyab mdzad de ni stobs su 'dod/_/las yid du 'ong ba dang /_las yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_
[\[335a.4\]]yid du 'ong ba [#]dang /_yid du mi 'ong [#]ba'i las dang /_zad pa'i rgyu zag pa med pa dang rnam pa gsum po de'i rnam par smin pa las ltar shin tu sna tshogs pa dus gsum gyis bsdus pa 'jig rten ma lus pa [#]khyab pa la yang rang gi ngo bo dang rab tu dbye ba la sogs pa thams cad
[\[335a.5\]]yongs su mkhyen pas shes bya ma lus pa khyab par mdzad pa'i mkhyen pa shes bya 'gar yang thogs pa mi mnga' ba gang yin pa de ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyis las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs su rnam par gzhag ste/_ji skad du/_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas
[\[335a.6\]]'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las rnams dang las yang dag par blangs pa rnams gnas dang rgyu dang /_dngos po dang /_rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/ji ltar rab tu shes she [#]na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la 'das
[\[335a.7\]]pa'i las yang dag par blangs pa gang dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba mi dge ba dang bral ba gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_dge ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de [#]de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/las yang dag par blangs pa gang mi dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dge ba dang bral ba gang ma 'ongs pa'i
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]dus na mi dge ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du las yang dag par blangs pa gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nyams pa'i cha dang mthun par 'gyur ba dang /_gang khyad par gyi cha dang mthun par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin
[\[335b.2\]]du da ltar byung ba'i dus na nyams pa'i cha dang mthun la/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyad par gyi cha dang mthun par 'gyur ba dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus na khyad par gyi cha dang mthun [#]la/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nyams pa'i cha dang mthun par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du
[\[335b.3\]]re re zhing phyogs mthun pa la yang rab tu shes par bya'o/_/de bzhin du las yang dag par blangs pa gang 'das pa na sbyor ba chung la de ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgya che zhing sbyor ba rgya che bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du rtsom pa chung la khyad par chen por 'gyur ba dang /_rtsom pa chen por 'gyur
[\[335b.4\]]la khyad par du 'gyur ba chung ba dang /_las yang dag par blangs pa gang nyan thos nyid kyi rgyu 'byin pa dang /_gang rang sangs rgyas nyid dang /_gang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du las yang dag par blangs pa gang de [#]ltar byung ba na
[\[335b.5\]]sdug bsngal la ma 'ongs pa na rnam par smin pa bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_da ltar byung ba na bde [#]la ma 'ongs pa na rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/de ltar na 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sems can rnams kyi
[\[335b.6\]]las gang yin pa dang /_rgyu gang yin pa dang /_rnam par smin pa gang yin pa [#]de bzhin gshegs pas de kho na dang gzhan ma yin pa la brten par yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/shes nas kyang de bzhin nyid du chos ston te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
[\[335b.7\]]pa'i las gnyis pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/da ni mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi [#]dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_'dod chags sogs kyi 'byung ba'i stobs kyis 'dod pa ni/_/shin tu sna tshogs dman [#]'bring gang yang khyad 'phags 'dod/_/de las gzhan rnams
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]kyis g.yogs mos la'ang mkhyen pa ni/_/dus gsum 'gro ba ma lus khyab pa stobs shes bya/_/'dir 'dod chags kyi sgra ni nyon mongs pa'i nye bar mtshon pa yin [#]pa'i phyir zhe sdang la sogs pa rnams kyang 'dzin par byed do/_/sogs pa'i sgras ni dad pa la sogs
[\[336a.2\]]pa dge ba'i chos yongs su bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/'byung ba'i sgras ni 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams kyi sa bon smos te/_'di las 'dod chags la sogs pa 'byung bas na zhes bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i phyir de ltar na 'dod chags la sogs pa [#]dang /_dad pa la sogs pa'i sa bon
[\[336a.3\]]gyis yongs su bzung ba'i bsam pa ni lhag par mos pa dang /_lhag par bsam pa dang 'dod pa dang mos pa zhes bya bar brjod la/_mos pa de las gzhan pa'i chos kun tu spyod pas [#]bsgribs pa de la yang rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par yongs su gcod par mdzad pa rnam pa thams cad
[\[336a.4\]]mkhyen pa nyid [#]gang 'byung ba de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi [#]mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs su rnam par gzhag ste/_ji skad du/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas [#]sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa du ma
[\[336a.5\]]dang /_mos pa sna tshogs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa [#]ji ltar sems can gzhan dag dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa du ma dang mos pa sna tshogs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes she [#]na/_gang zag gang 'dod
[\[336a.6\]]chags la gnas la zhe sdang la mos pa dang /_gang zag gang zhe sdang la gnas la 'dod chags la mos pa dang /_gang zag gang gti mug la gnas la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug la mos pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/gang zag
[\[336a.7\]]gang dge ba la gnas la mi dge ba la mos pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/gang zag gang dag sbyor ba chung ba bsam pa rgya chen po la mos pa dang /_gang dag sbyor ba rgya che la bsam pa chung ngu la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]mos pa gang gis sbyor ba chung la khyad par la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_sbyor ba khyad par du 'phags la chung ngu la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag pa nyid du nges la log pa nyid du nges pa'i khams la 'jog par 'gyur ba dang /_log pa nyid du nges la yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i
[\[336b.2\]]khams la 'jog par 'gyur ba dang /_ma nges la yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i khams la 'jog par 'gyur ba dang /_mos pa gang gis 'dod pa'i khams las shin tu 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang gis gzugs kyi khams dang /_gang gis gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_
[\[336b.3\]]gang gis khams gsum pa las shin tu 'da' bar 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las gsum pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/da ni khams
[\[336b.4\]]sna tshogs pa [#]mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_sangs rgyas khams kyi [#]rnam par dbye la mkhas rnams kyis/_/mig sogs dag gi rang bzhin gang de khams su gsungs/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen pa mtha' yas shing /_/rnam kun khams kyi
[\[336b.5\]]khyad par la 'jug stobs su 'dod/_/rang bzhin dang ngo bo dang stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni rnam grangs dag go/_/sangs rgyas khams mtha' dag gi rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mkhyen pa gang zhig mig la sogs pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang nang stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan
[\[336b.6\]]nyid can rab tu dbye ba du mar gyur pa de la thogs pa mi mnga' ba de ni khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs su rnam par gzhag ste/_ji skad du/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu shes
[\[336b.7\]]so/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du khams bco brgyad char [#]yang stong pa nyid gsum gsum dang sbyar bar bya'o/_/sa la sogs pa'i khams kyang rab tu shes so/_/ji ltar rab tu shes she [#]na/_nam mkha'i khams ji lta ba
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]de bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dag yongs su brtags [#]pa las yang dag par byung bar rab tu shes so/_/'dus byas kyi khams ni mngon par 'du bya ba'i mtshan nyid du'o/_/'dus ma byas kyi
[\[337a.2\]]khams kyang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i [#]mtshan nyid du'o/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khams ni glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du'o/_/rnam par byang ba'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid du'o/_/'khor ba'i khams ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i ma rig pa'i
[\[337a.3\]]mtshan nyid du'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni tshul bzhin rig pa'i mtshan nyid du'o/_/de ltar na 'jig rten gnas pa'i khams gang yin pa dang /_rab tu gnas pa'i khams gang yin pa dang /_rjes su khrid pa'i khams gang yin pa dang /_thogs pa'i khams gang yin pa dang /_bsam pa'i khams gang yin
[\[337a.4\]]pa dang /_brten pa'i khams gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las bzhi pa'o zhes
[\[337a.5\]]gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/da ni dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi [#]dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_kun tu rtog sogs ches rno nyid ni mchog bzhed la/_/'bring gnas skabs dang rdul [#]nyid mchog min par bshad dang /_/mig la sogs dang phan tshun sgrub
[\[337a.6\]]nus chub pa la/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa chags med stobs su gsungs/_/kun tu rtog pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa lhag par sgro 'dogs pa'o/_/kun tu rtog pa ni dbang po nyid yin te/_'dod chags la sogs pa skyed [#]pa la mnga' bdag nyid du gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/sogs
[\[337a.7\]]pa'i sgras ni dad pa la sogs pa dge ba'i rgyu can rnams sdud par rtogs par bya'o/_/de'i phyir mchog gi sgras ni phul du byung ba brjod de/_chung ngu dang 'bring gi gnas skabs ni mchog ma yin pa'i sgras brjod do/_/mig sogs zhes bya ba 'dis ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po nyi shu
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]rtsa gnyis 'dzin to/_/de'i phyir 'dir dbang po'i rang gi ngo bo thugs su chud pa dang /_phan tshun 'bras bu sgrub par nus pa'i rang gi ngo bo thugs su chud pa la mkhyen pa gang zhig thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'di ni dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs su rnam par gzhag
[\[337b.2\]]ste/_ji skad du/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po'i rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang
[\[337b.3\]]zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po'i rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes she [#]na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dbang po rtul po rnams kyang sems can dbang po rtul por yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du dbang po 'bring
[\[337b.4\]]yang rab tu shes so/_/dbang po rnon po yang rab tu shes so/_/yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ci 'dra bas mthar song ba'i 'dod chags skye ba dang /_mthar song ba'i zhe sdang dang /_mthar song ba'i gti mug skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/mthar song
[\[337b.5\]]ba zhes bya ba ni rab tu gyur pa'o/_/yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ci 'dra bas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug bcos ma skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po gang gis snrel zhi'i [#]'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti
[\[337b.6\]]mug skye ba dang /_yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po gang gis tshar bcad [#]pa'i 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang gti mug skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/dbang po gang dag dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_dbang po gang dag nges par 'byung ba'i rgyu las byung ba de
[\[337b.7\]]dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po rab tu shes pa nas kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po'i bar [#]rab tu shes so/_/dbang po gang mig gi dbang po'i rgyu las byung ba rna ba'i dbang po 'jig
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du rna ba'i dbang po la sogs pa rnams kyang rig [#]par bya'o/_/sems can gang sbyin pa'i dbang po can yin la/_de yang tshul khrims la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po mchog dang mchog
[\[338a.2\]]ma yin pa shes pas sbyin pa'i gtam byed do/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po can yin la/_de yang sbyin pa la sogs pa de la sbyor ba de la de ltar tshul khrims la sogs pa'i gtam byed do/_/de
[\[338a.3\]]bzhin du gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i dbang po can yin la/_de yang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa sbyar [#]ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin pa rnams ni dbang po yongs su smin pa rnams so
[\[338a.4\]]zhes bya bar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/yongs su ma smin pa rnams kyang yongs su ma smin pa rnams so zhes bya bar [#]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa rnams ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa rnams so zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji
[\[338a.5\]]lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa rnams kyang nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa rnams so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sems can gyi dbang po'i rnam pa gang yin pa dang /_sbyor ba gang yin pa dang /_gsum [#]pa gang yin pa dang /_
[\[338a.6\]]gang gi rgyu las byung ba dang /_rkyen gang yin pa dang /_dmigs pa gang yin pa dang /_mthar thug pa gang yin pa dang /_mtha' gang yin pa/_de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
[\[338a.7\]]pa'i las lnga pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de [#]ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_lam 'ga' rgyal ba nyid dang 'ga' zhig rang rgyal gyi/_/byang chub dang ni nyan thos byang chub yi dwags dang /_/dud 'gro lha mi rnams dang dmyal la
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]sogs 'gro ba/_/de la mkhyen pa chags med mtha' yas stobs su 'dod/_/de la lam gyi sgras ni lam shul brjod do/_/lam gang la lam thams cad du 'gro ba'i ngang tshul yod pa de ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mo/_/lam 'ga' zhig ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'dod do/_/la la ni
[\[338b.2\]]rang rgyal ba'i byang chub tu'o/_/la la ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu'o/_/la la ni lha dag tu yin pa nas dmyal ba dag tu yin pa'i bar ro/_/sogs pa'i sgra ni rnam pa sna tshogs bstan par mtshon pa'i don to/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pas lam gang zhig gang du 'gro ba'i lam de ni der
[\[338b.3\]]'gro ba yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pa lam thams cad kyi yul can thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'di ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs su rnam par gzhag ste/_ji skad du/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de
[\[338b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pas kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/ji ltar rab tu shes she [#]na/_yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/ma nges pa dang log pa nyid du nges pa'i
[\[338b.5\]]sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu shes so/_/nges pa dang bcas pa'i sems can gyi khams ni 'di ltar rab tu shes so[#]/_/sems can gang dag rgyu'i stobs can sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/_zur tsam gyis [#]go ba dbang po rnon po'i sems can de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas
[\[338b.6\]]chos bstan kyang rung /_ma bstan kyang rung ste/_rnam par grol ba'i skal ba [#]yod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi rgyu dang stobs shes nas chos ston to/_/ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang 'di ltar shes te/_gang dag rkyen gyi stobs can yongs su smin par bya
[\[338b.7\]]ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems can de dag gal te mthun par 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang phrad na rnam par grol bar 'gyur gyi/_ma phrad na rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pas [#]de lta de ltar rgyu dang rkyen dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par gsungs te/_/
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa las de lta bu'i chos thos nas tshul bzhin du rab tu sbyor bas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba de dag gi don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ngo /_/log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can gyi khams 'di ltar rab tu shes so/_/
[\[339a.2\]]yongs su sbyang ba ma byas pa/_kho re chung ba/_blun pa snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan kyang rung ma bstan kyang rung ste/_sems can de dag rnam par grol ba'i skal ba med pas de dag de bzhin gshegs pas snod ma yin par rig nas
[\[339a.3\]]btang snyoms su 'jog ste/_de dag gi ched du byang chub sems dpa' rnams go cha gyon to/_/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod chags kyi lam rnam pa gsum rab tu shes te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'dod chags kyi lam gang sdug pa'i rnam pa las skye ba yang yod/_'dod
[\[339a.4\]]chags kyi lam gang rjes su chags pa'i rnam pa las skye ba yang yod/_'dod chags kyi lam gang sngon gyi bag la nyal gyi rgyu las skye ba yang yod do/_/zhe sdang gi lam rnam pa gsum yang rab tu shes te/_zhe sdang gi lam gang khong khro ba'i rgyu las skye ba yang yod/_zhe sdang gi
[\[339a.5\]]lam gang bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa las skye ba yang yod/_zhe sdang gi lam gang sngon gyi bag la nyal las skye ba yang yod do/_/gti mug gi lam rnam pa gsum char [#]yang rab tu shes te/_gti mug gi lam gang ma rig pa'i rgyu las skye ba yang yod/_gti mug gi lam
[\[339a.6\]]gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu las skye ba yang yod/_gti mug gi lam gang the tshom gyi rgyu las skye ba yang yod de/_de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung zhing /_de ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'jug pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_ldog pa'i
[\[339a.7\]]rgyu las byung ba'i lam gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med par 'jug ste/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las drug pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/da ni bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i ldang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi [#]dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_'jig rten mtha' yas rnal 'byor bye brag la [#]tha dad/_/bsam gtan rnam thar brgyad gang zhi gnas gang dag dang /_/snyoms
[\[339b.2\]]'jug khyad par gang dag gcig dang brgyad gyur pa/_/de la mkhyen pa thogs med 'di ni stobs su bshad/_/de la 'jig rten mtha' yas pa na/_rnal 'byor pa'i khyad par gyis [#]rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas par gyur pa bsam gtan dag ni bzhi'o/_/rnam par thar pa ni brgyad
[\[339b.3\]]do/_/zhi gnas ni ting nge 'dzin dag ste/_dge ba la sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid can no/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag ni dgu ste/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa bzhi dang /_'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa'o/_/kun nas nyon
[\[339b.4\]]mongs pa'i rgyu ni ma rig pa dang /_tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i [#]yid la byed pa la sogs pa dag go/_/rnam par byang ba'i rgyu ni gzhan las rjes su mthun pa'i sgra dang so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ste/_de lta bu la sogs pa dag go/_/de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa'i dbye bas
[\[339b.5\]]so sor rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas par gyur pa bsam gtan la sogs pa de la mkhyen pa gang zhig thogs pa mi mnga' ba de ni bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i
[\[339b.6\]]ldang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs su rnam par gzhag ste/_ji skad du/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i ldang ba
[\[339b.7\]]shes pa thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/ji ltar rab tu shes she [#]na/_sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa skye ba'i rgyu gang yin pa dang /_rkyen gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag par
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]'gyur ba'i rgyu gang yin pa dang /_rkyen gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/de la rgyu ni gang /_rkyen ni gang zhe na/_sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'o/_/sems can rnams kyi kun
[\[340a.2\]]nas nyon mongs pa'i rkyen ni ma rig pa'o/_/ma rig pa ni rgyu'o/_/'du byed rnams ni rkyen to/_/'du byed ni rgyu'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni rkyen to zhes bya ba nas/_nyon mongs pa rnams ni rgyu'o/_/las rnams ni rkyen to/_/lta ba ni rgyu'o/_/sred pa ni rkyen to/_/bag la nyal
[\[340a.3\]]ba [#]ni rgyu'o/_/kun nas ldang ba ni rkyen te zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de la sems can rnams kyi rnam par byang ba'i rgyu ni gang rkyen ni gang zhe na/_rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis so/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_gzhan las rjes su mthun pa'i sgra dang /_so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o/_/
[\[340a.4\]]gzhan yang gnyis te/_zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa dang /_lhag mthong la mkhas pa'o zhes rgyas par 'byung zhing /_'di ni sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag pa'i rgyu'o/_/'di ni rkyen te de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du rigs kyi bu de bzhin
[\[340a.5\]]gshegs pa ni ye shes dang ldan pas 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs te
[\[340a.6\]]'gog pa las ldang ngo /_/'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs te bsam gtan dang po las ldang ngo /_/rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs [#]dang mthun par yang snyoms par 'jug go/_lugs dang mi mthun pa dang /_snrel zhir [#]yang ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin ni snyoms par 'jug par ston/_
[\[340a.7\]]snyoms par 'jug pa ni ting nge 'dzin du ston kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'dres pa gang yang med cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ni dmigs pas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya ba med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gcig gis ting nge 'dzin
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]thams cad mngon par 'grub ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin gcig las ma langs par ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la sems gcig nas gcig tu 'jug pa med/_de bzhin gshegs pa la sems mnyam par ma bzhag
[\[340b.2\]]pa mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sus kyang blta bar mi nus te/_nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis zil gyis gnon to/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zil gyis gnon
[\[340b.3\]]to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zil gyis gnon to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni zil gyis mi gnon pa ste[#]/_'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni zil gyis mi gnon [#]par 'jug pa'o[#]/_/gdams pa
[\[340b.4\]]dang rjes su bstan pa gang dang gang gis nyan thos rnams ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/gang gis rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis [#]ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu
[\[340b.5\]]shes so/_/shes nas kyang de bzhin du 'doms shing de bzhin du rjes su ston te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las bdun pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/da ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_ji
[\[340b.6\]]srid gti mug de srid srid gnas 'das bdag dang /_/sems can gzhan re re yi srid pa sems can ni/_/ji snyed de snyed mtha' yas gzhir bcas yul phyogs dang /_/bcas rnams la blo gang dang [#]gang yin stobs su bshad/_/ji srid gti mug ces bya ba 'dis ni skye ba
[\[340b.7\]]gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thog ma med pa sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i yul nyid du bshad do/_/sems can ji snyed ces bya ba 'dis ni sems can gyi khams mu mtha' med pa bsdu bar brjod do[#]/_/gzhir bcas smos pas ni rgyu dang bcas pa nyid kyi sgo nas de bsdu ba
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]bshad do/_/ga ge mo zhig nas bdag kha dog ni 'di 'dra bar gyur/_rnam pa ni 'di lta bur gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin no/_/de la kha dog ni 'di 'dra bar gyur zhes [#]bya bar rjes su dran pas ni rnam pa dang bcas par rjes su dran par
[\[341a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/che ge mo zhig na bdag gnas nas de nas shi 'phos nas ga ge mo zhig tu skyes/_de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar dran pas ni yul phyogs dang bcas par rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/lhag ma ni rgyu dang bcas par rjes su dran pa'o/_/de ltar
