[\[341a.3\]]sngon gyi srid pa gzhi dang bcas pa dang /_yul phyogs dang bcas pa dang /_rnam pa dang bcas pa [#]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pa gang zhig thogs pa mi mnga' ba ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin no/_/stobs 'dis ni sangs rgyas bcom
[\[341a.4\]]ldan 'das rnams sems dang sems las byung ba'i rgyu ba 'das pa dag ma lus par ji lta ba bzhin thugs su chud de/_skal ba dang ldan pa dang /_skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i tshul mkhyen pa nyid kyis chos 'bras bu yod pa ston par mdzad pa yin no zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag ste/_
[\[341a.5\]]ji skad du/_de sems can de'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no/_/sngon gyi rgyu ji lta bu dang /_rgyu gang gis sems can gang kun tu byung ba de'i sngon gyi rgyu de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes te [#]shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyu ba 'das pa
[\[341a.6\]]yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/sems gang gis [#]dmigs pa can gyi 'og tu sems gang gis [#]dmigs pa can skye ba dang /_dmigs pa gang gis skye ba dang /_dmigs pa gang dang bral ba [#]na 'gag pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/de ltar
[\[341a.7\]]ji tsam du sems can gcig gi sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de 'jug pa de lta bu zhig gi 'og tu sems 'di lta bu zhig byung la/_de'i 'og tu yang 'di lta bu zhig byung ba de bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang tshig tu bstan pas bstan par dka'o/_/de bzhin du sems
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]can thams cad kyi yang de lta bu so sor sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste phyi ma'i mur thug par bstan kyang de'i ye shes mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su
[\[341b.2\]]dran pa shes pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med la/_tshad med de/_de'i mtha' ni bstan par sla ba ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas khyu mchog tu gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag la/_kye sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskrun
[\[341b.3\]]pa'am/_nyan thos la bskrun pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas la bskrun pa de lta bu dran par gyis shig ces dran par byed do/_/'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus sems can de dag gis kyang dran par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa de dang
[\[341b.4\]]des ci nas theg pas rnam par grol ba las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston to/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las brgyad pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/da ni 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_
[\[341b.5\]]sems can rnams kyi sems can re re'i 'chi 'pho dang /_/skye gang 'jig rten la gnas nam mkha'i mthar thug dang /_/bkra mang de la mkhyen pa dus der 'jug pa yis/_/ma chags rnam kun yongs dag mtha' yas stobs su 'dod/_/'chi 'pho ba ni phung po 'jig pa'o/_/skye ba ni
[\[341b.6\]]phung po'i [#]nying mtshams sbyor ba'o/_/'jig rten ma lus pa'i 'chi 'pho ba [#]dang skye ba nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/_las shin tu sna tshogs pa'i bzos [#]sbyar ba gang dag yin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis skad cig gcig kho na la lhun gyis grub par yang dag par ji lta ba
[\[341b.7\]]bzhin du mkhyen la/_de'i ye shes yul 'ga' la yang chags pa mi mnga' ste/_rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pas thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chi 'pho ba [#]dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs su rnam par gzhag go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams kyi
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/_'on kyang lha'i spyan gyis 'chags pa dang 'jig pa la sogs pa sna tshogs pa mang po thams cad kyang ma tshang ba med par rab tu mkhyen to zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag ste/_ji skad du/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
[\[342a.2\]]lha'i mig ni 'di yin te/_mig des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/_tshad med grangs med pa bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na zhing du snang ba gang la la sems can gyi [#]rjes su bzung ba
[\[342a.3\]]'jig pa dang 'chags pa de dag mthong ngo /_/gang la la sems can du snang ba 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dang bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro dang las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba de dag thams cad mthong ngo /_/gang la la [#]byang chub sems dpar snang ba 'chi 'pho ba dang mngal du 'jug pa
[\[342a.4\]]dang 'byung ba de dag thams cad mthong ngo /_/gang la la sangs rgyas su snang ba mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba che'i 'du byed 'dor ba yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de dag thams cad mthong ngo /_/gang la la nyan thos su snang ba rnam par grol ba
[\[342a.5\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de dag thams cad mthong ngo /_/gang la la rang sangs rgyas su snang ba rdzu 'phrul ston pa yon sbyong ba de dag thams cad mthong ngo /_/sems can gang dag snang bar gyur pa dag dang gang dag phyi rol gyi mngon par shes pa lnga po rnams kyi mig lam du byung
[\[342a.6\]]ba [#]dang /_nyan thos rnams kyi ma yin pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dag [#]gi ma yin pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig la snang bar 'gyur ro/_/yang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi [#]phyogs na snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can
[\[342a.7\]]gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la snang bar gyur pa de dag ni ches mang gi_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang mi rnams ni de lta ma yin no/_/de bzhin du snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams tshad med do/_/de ltar sangs rgyas kyis 'dul
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]ba'i sems can gang yin zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can gyi khams la rnam par blta'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gyi ris ji snyed pa de dag gi mdun du de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing sems can
[\[342b.2\]]de dag 'dul yang de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan gyis mi shes te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las dgu pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/da ni zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_rnam kun mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis myur du rgyal
[\[342b.3\]]rnams kyi/_/nyon mongs dang ni bag chags dang bcas 'jig 'gyur dang /_/slob ma la sogs nyon mongs blo yis 'gog pa yang /_/de la mkhyen pa chags med mtha' yas stobs su 'dod/_/de la nyon mongs pa dag ni ma rig pa dang 'dod chags la sogs pa dag ste/_
[\[342b.4\]]'jig rten khams gsum pa nyon mongs par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gang gis sems kyi rgyud 'bag [#]par byed cing sgo [#]bar byed la rjes su bgrod par byed pa de ni bag chags te nyon mongs pa'i mur thug pa dang goms pa dang rtsa ba dang bag chags zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs dag go/_/de ni zag
[\[342b.5\]]pa med pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa spangs su zin kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis spang bar mi nus te/_til mar dang me tog la sogs pa bsal du zin kyang bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa rnams la de dag dang phrad pas yon tan phra mo dmigs pa bzhin no/_/'di ltar
[\[342b.6\]]nyon mongs pa spangs kyang bag chags yod pas dgra bcom pa sngon du [#]spre'ur gyur pa mchong zhing mchong zhing [#]'gro ba dang sngon bram zer gyur pa'i dmangs mor brjod pa'i kun tu spyod pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bzlog tu zin kyang ma log pa dmigs pa yin no/_/de la ma rig pa'i bag chags ni shes
[\[342b.7\]]bya yongs su dpyod pa'i gegs [#]su gyur pa yin la/_'dod chags la sogs pa'i bag chags yod pa ni lus dang ngag gi 'jug pa rnam pa de lta bu'i rgyu yang yin te/_ma rig pa dang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bag chags de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang sangs rgyas kho na la ldog
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]par 'gyur gyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin no/_/de'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i [#]bag chags lhag [#]ma lus par spangs pa dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa [#]de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen pa gang zhig thams cad du thogs pa mi mnga'
[\[343a.2\]]ba [#]de ni zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs su rnam par gzhag ste/_ji skad du/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas zag pa thams cad zad pas bdag gi skye ba ni zad/_tshangs par spyod pa ni bsten/_bya ba ni byas te 'di las [#]srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes te/_zag pa
[\[343a.3\]]med pa sems rnam par grol ba shes rab rnam par grol ba rang gi mngon par shes pa mngon sum du byas nas de [#]nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/[#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa shes pa de ni rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa yongs su dag pa 'od gsal ba bag chags kyi mtshams
[\[343a.4\]]sbyor ba thams cad [(]yang [,]kyang [)]yang [#]dag par bcom pa'o/_/nyan thos rnams kyi zag pa zad pa ni tshad yod pa bag chags yang dag par ma bcom pa'o/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi zag pa zad pa ni tshad yod pa snying rje chen po dang bral ba spobs pa dang bral ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
[\[343a.5\]]zag pa zad pa ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa/_thugs rje chen pos kun tu bzung ba mi 'jigs pa dang spobs pa dang ma bral ba/_'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi gnon [#]pa ste sems kyi skad cig
[\[343a.6\]]gcig dang ldan pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi bag chags med/_nyon mongs pa'i bag chags med/_spyod lam 'khrul pa'i bag chags med do/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pas [#]rdul dang du ba dang lhan cig mi
[\[343a.7\]]gnas pa de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa shes pa yang [#]las dang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad [#]dang lhan cig mi gnas pa'o[#]/_/de zag pa zad pa de lta bu la rab tu gnas ma thag tu zag pa dang bcas pa nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems can
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]rnams la zag pa zad par bya ba dang nye bar len pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/kye ma sems can yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su rtog pa las byung ba dag khyed zag pa dang nye bar len pa de dag la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtogs shig ces de dag la de bzhin gshegs
[\[343b.2\]]pas ci nas kyang zag pa rnams yang dag pa ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin [#]rab tu shes par 'gyur ba dang /_rab tu shes nas [#]chos gang yang nye bar mi len pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar nye bar bkod pa'i dpe rnams kyis chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu
[\[343b.3\]]'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i las bcu pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de ltar gang dag rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa nyid las de bzhin gshegs pa'i [#]ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' ba/_de dag las gzhan pa'i yon tan
[\[343b.4\]]mtha' dag dang ldan pa/_chos kyi sku dang tha mi dad par bzhugs pa/_yon tan rgyas pa re re zhing dpe nam mkha' gcig pus nye bar gzhal ba mnga' ba rnams/_'gro ba 'dod pa dang srid pa dang lta ba dang /_ma rig pa zhes bya ba chu bo chen po bzhi'i nang du chud pa mgon med pa'i
[\[343b.5\]]mgon du gyur pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od du rnam pa thams cad du yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/rgya bskyed pas chog go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga re re dang /_skyes
[\[343b.6\]]bu chen po'i mtshan dang /_dpe byad dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la sogs pa yon tan gyi khyad par yongs su gcod pa [#]ni sangs rgyas kho nas spyod la/_gal te gsungs na ni rang nyid kyi ye shes kyi yul du gyur pas [#]bskal pa grangs med
[\[343b.7\]]pa bsam gyis mi khyab par sku tshe'i tshad byin gyis brlabs shing phrin las gzhan mi mnga' bar skyen pa skyen par gsungs pa de ltar na yang yon tan dag yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpas lta [#]ci smos te rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mthar
[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]phyin par shes pa'am brjod par nus par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_don 'di nyid dpe'i sgo nas bshad pa/_nam mkha' med pas 'dab chags ldog par mi 'gyur gyi/_/'dir ni rang mthu zad pas ldog par 'gyur de bzhin/_/slob ma dang bcas sangs rgyas sras
[\[344a.2\]]rnams sangs rgyas kyi/_/yon tan mkha' ltar mtha' yas ma brjod ldog par 'gyur/_/'di ltar nam mkha' lding 'dab gshog yangs pa'i rlung gi shugs kyis pha rol gnon pa thob pa yang nam mkha' yongs su zad pas nam mkha' la ldog pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang rang gi stobs dang
[\[344a.3\]]pha rol gnon pa dang bral bas yin pa de bzhin du/_re zhig byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa bcu pa la rab tu gnas pa rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa brnyes pa de dag kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod par mi nus pas yon tan nam mkha' ltar [#]mu mtha' med
[\[344a.4\]]pa dag las ldog gi yon tan yongs su rdzogs pas ni ma yin te/_rang gi blo'i stobs yongs su nyams pas ldog par gnas na/_rang sangs rgyas sam nyan thos rnams kyis yon tan mthar thug pa rtogs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
[\[344a.5\]]yongs su shes pa'am brjod pa la de dag gi lo rabs 'di yin pa de'i phyir kho bo cag lta bu ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis ldongs pa/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shin tu lkog tu gyur pa rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod par bya ba la go skabs yod par ga la 'gyur te/_
[\[344a.6\]]de'i phyir 'di ni gnas ma yin pa kho na'o zhes bshad pa/_de'i phyir bdag 'dras khyod yon 'di dag ci/_/shes pa dang ni brjod par nus 'gyur ram/_/'on kyang de dag 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis/_/bshad phyir dogs spongs [#]cung zad tsam zhig smras/_/de ltar bdag la de bzhin gshegs
[\[344a.7\]]pa'i yon tan [#]shas tsam zhig yongs su shes pa yang med mod kyi/_de lta na yang bdag gis tsham tshom med par yon tan phyogs gcig gi cha tsam zhig glengs pa ni gzhan la brten nas yin no/_/de nyid smras pa ni/_'phags pa klu sgrub kyis bshad phyir zhes bya'o/_/mdor bsdu na
[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]bstan bcos 'di las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan zab pa ste chos nyid dang rgya che ba nye bar bstan to/_/de la/_zab mo stong pa nyid yin te/_/yon tan gzhan rnams rgya che ba'o/_/zab dang rgya che'i tshul shes pas/_/yon tan 'di dag thob [#]par 'gyur/_/da ni sprul pa'i sku nyan thos dang rang sangs
[\[344b.2\]]rgyas dang sangs rgyas dang [#]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don [#]thun mong ba dang thabs thun mong ba 'byung ba so so'i skye bo rnams kyi don yang ci rigs par 'byung la/_bde 'gro la sogs pa'i sgrub byed du gyur pa lhun gyis grub par nges par 'byung ba'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_slar
[\[344b.3\]]yang mi g.yo'i sku mnga' khyod kyis srid gsum byon nas sprul rnams kyis/_/gshegs pa dang ni bltams dang byang chub zhi ba'i 'khor lo'ang ston par mdzad/_/de ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten g.yo bag spyod can re re'i [#]zhags pa ni/_/mang pos bcings pa ma lus thugs rjes
[\[344b.4\]]mya ngan 'das par bkri bar mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'das ni khams gsum las 'das su zin kyang sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis yab dang yum dang sras la sogs pa dang 'brel par ston zhing 'jig rten dang rjes su bstun te/_khams gsum du gshegs nas ji ltar 'tsham pa'i
[\[344b.5\]]chos bstan pa 'jug pa'i sgo nas sems can gyi khams dang spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs can mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god par mdzad do/_/thugs rjes te grags pa dang phan lan la sogs pa bzhed pas ni ma yin no/_/de'i phyir de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rnam par gzhag
[\[344b.6\]]pa byas nas theg pa gcig la theg pa gsum bstan pa dgongs pa can nyid du bshad pa/_gang phyir 'di ni de nyid shes las dri ma mtha' dag sel ba ni/_/lhur byed gzhan med chos rnams de nyid rnam 'gyur dbye ba'ang bsten min zhing /_/de nyid yul can blo gros 'di yang tha dad 'gyur ba
[\[344b.7\]]ma yin pa/_/de yi phyir na khyod kyis 'gro la theg pa mi mnyam dbyer med bstan/_/gang zhig de kho na nyid mi shes pa des ni nyon mongs pa rnams ma lus par spang bar mi nus la dngos po ma lus pa la yod pa'i de kho na nyid skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin can yang tha dad pa med par sngar bstan zin to/_/
[\[345a\]]
[\[345a.1\]]mthong ba tha dad kyang de la dbye ba med pas de kho na nyid 'di rnam par mi 'gyur ba nyid yin la/_gang gi phyir dbye ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba nyid med pa de'i phyir de kho na nyid kyi yul can ye shes kyang rang bzhin gcig yin no/_/'di ltar ye shes kyi rang bzhin du ma nyid yin na ni ye
[\[345a.2\]]shes kyis de kho na nyid rtogs [#]par mi 'gyur te/_rang bzhin ji ltar gnas pa bzhin ma rtogs [#]pa'i phyir ro/_/gang gi phyir de ltar de kho na nyid gcig nyid yin pas/_/de kho na nyid [#]kyi yul can ye shes tha mi dad pa de'i phyir theg pa gcig kho na bas theg pa gsum yod pa ma yin te/_/'od
[\[345a.3\]]srungs chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs na mya ngan las 'das pa yin la de yang gcig nyid yin gyi gnyis dang gsum ni ma yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/theg pa chen po zhes bya ba la chen po zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/_ma rig pa ma lus pa spangs pas
[\[345a.4\]]sgrib pa dang bral ba'i ye shes mnga' ba'i phyir ro/_/de rnams kyi theg pa ni theg pa chen po ste/_pre Sho da ra la sogs pa yin pa'i phyir yi ge ta a nyid du 'gyur ro/_/yang na theg pa yang de yin la chen po yang [#]yin pas theg pa chen po ste/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa
[\[345a.5\]]mnga' ba rnams de la bzhugs pa'i phyir ram/_dngos po'i rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ram mi shes pa ma lus pa spangs pa'i phyir na/_theg pa yang de yin la chen po yang de yin pas theg pa chen po'o/_/gal te mya ngan las 'das pa gcig kho na yin
[\[345a.6\]]na [#]ji ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan zhe na/_bstan pa 'di dgongs pa can nyid du bshad pa/_gang phyir 'gro la nyes pa skyed byed snyigs ma 'di dag yod gyur pa/_/de phyir 'jig rten sangs rgyas spyod yul gting zab la
[\[345a.7\]]'jug mi 'gyur zhing /_/bde gshegs gang phyir khyod la mkhyen rab thugs rje'i thabs dang lhan cig pa/_/mnga' dang gang phyir bdag gi [#]sems can dgrol zhes khyod kyis zhal bzhes te/_/lus dang sems dag las su mi rung ba nyid du sgrub par byed pas na snyigs ma lnga bstan
[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]te/_sems can dang /_bskal pa dang /_nyon mongs pa [#]dang /_lta ba dang /_tshe'i snyigs ma rnams so/_/gang gi phyir nyon mongs pa rnams 'jug pa shas che ba'i rgyur gyur pa de dag ni lhag par mos pa khyad par du 'phags pa 'joms par byed pa yin pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs
[\[345b.2\]]pa'i ye shes bla na med pa la 'dod pa yang 'gog par byed pa yin te/_de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zab pas gting dpag dka' ba la 'jig rten 'jug par mi 'gyur la/_bcom ldan 'das kyang 'gro ba rnams snod ma yin pa 'di tsam gyis de dag rnam par dgrol bar bya ba la g.yel ba bsten
[\[345b.3\]]par mi mdzad de/_gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das la mkhyen rab thugs rje'i thabs dang lhan cig tu gyur pa mnga' ba dang /_gang gi phyir bdag gis sems can rnams dgrol bar bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]sngar smon lam stsal ba de'i phyir de dag rnam par grol [#]ba la snyom [#]las
[\[345b.4\]]la brten par mi mdzad cing de'i rnam par grol [#]ba'i thabs tshol bar mdzad de zhal gyis 'ches pa rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas gdon mi za bar bsgrub par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/gang gi phyir 'gro ba rnams theg pa chen po la 'jug pa la gegs [#]byed pa'i rkyen mang po 'di dag
[\[345b.5\]]yod cing 'jig rten rnams kyang gdon mi za bar mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god [#]par bya dgos pa/_de phyir mkhas pas rin po che yi gling du chas pa'i skye tshogs kyi/_/ngal ba nyer sel grong khyer yid 'ong bar du rnam par bkod pa ltar/_/khyod kyi theg pa 'di ni slob ma nye bar zhi
[\[345b.6\]]ba'i tshul la yid/_/sbyar bar mdzad cing rnam par dben la blo sbyangs rnams la logs su gsungs/_/dpe 'di ni 'phags pa dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las nges par bya'o/_/bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin te/_ji ltar bsti ba'i phyir ded dpon des rin po che'i gling du ma phyin
[\[345b.7\]]pa'i bar du grong khyer mngon par sprul pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thabs kyi sgo nas theg pa chen po'i tshu rol du de thob pa'i thabs su gyur zhing zhi ba'i bde ba'i rten [#]du gyur pa theg pa gnyis po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gsungs pa yin no/_/de la 'khor
[\[346a\]]
[\[346a.1\]]ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa thob pa rnams la ni phyi nas theg pa chen po kho na nye bar bstan la/_de rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas rnams ltar tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byas nas gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa'i [#]ye shes thob par bya dgos so/_/theg pa gcig
[\[346a.2\]]bstan pa 'di yang mdo kun las btus pa la sogs pa dag las nges par bya'o/_/da ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i dus dang /_bzhugs pa'i dus kyi dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_bde bar gshegs pa ma lus phyogs shing sangs rgyas yul dag na/_/phra rab
[\[346a.3\]]rdul gyi rdul rnams bdog par gyur pa ji snyed pa/_/byang chub mchog rab dam par gshegs pa'i skal ba de snyed de/_/'on kyang khyod kyi gsang ba 'di ni bsnyad bgyi [#]ma lags so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sprul pa'i sku'i sgo nas bltams pa dang mya ngan las 'da' ba nye bar ston
[\[346a.4\]]mod kyi/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i sku 'byung ba'i rgyu gang yin pa de'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i dus ji tsam yin pa de'i tshad brjod par bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i skal ba dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
[\[346a.5\]]shes kyi yul du gyur pa ji snyed pa de na rdul phra rab kyi rdul dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed do/_/'di ni sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa rnams kyis lhag par mos par bya bar dka' ba'i phyir na bsnyad par bya ba ma yin te/_'ga' zhig tu de la lhag par mos par byed pa rnams la bsod nams
[\[346a.6\]]gzhal du med pa bsags par bya ba'i phyir bshad do/_/de ltar re zhig mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i dus brjod nas/_de'i 'og tu bzhugs pa'i dus kyi dbang du byas nas bshad pa/_rgyal ba ji [#]srid 'jig rten mtha' dag mchog tu rab zhi bar/_/'gro ba min zhing nam
[\[346a.7\]]mkha' rnam 'jig 'gyur [#]min de srid du/_/shes rab yum gyis bskyed pa de la thugs brtse ma ma yi/_/tshul lugs byed pas rab tu [#]zhi bar 'gyur ba ga la mnga'/_/bcom ldan 'das ni yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin mas bskrun nas [#]snying rje ma ma la gtad pas bcom ldan 'das kyi ma
[\[346b\]]
[\[346b.1\]]'ongs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad ni ji srid 'jig rten mtha' dag sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang /_ji srid nam mkha' brlag par mi 'gyur ba de srid yin par rig par bya'o/_/gang gis sems can thams cad kyi don bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir dus mu mtha' [#]med par 'di dag gso bar byed pa
[\[346b.2\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje ci 'dra ba zhig ce na/_bshad pa/_gti mug skyon gyis 'jig rten kha zas dug bcas za ba yi/_/skye bo nyid kyi nang mi de la khyod brtse ji lta ba/_/de ltar dug zos nyen pa'i bu la ma yis [#]sdug bsngal min/_/des na mgon po mchog tu rab zhir [#]gshegs
[\[346b.3\]]par 'gyur ma lags/_/'jig rten kha zas kyi sgras ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga brjod do/_/de dag kyang 'di nyid du mngon par zhen pas zos na dug dang bcas par 'gyur te/_sdug bsngal rgya chen po'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de dag la 'di nyid du bden par mngon par zhen pa yang gti mug
[\[346b.4\]]gi skyon las skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das la skye bo 'khor ba pa 'jig rten gyi kha zas dug dang bcas pa za ba la brtse ba 'khrungs pa de ltar ma la bu gcig pa phangs pa de las gzhan pa'i dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas za ba la gdung ba skye ba ma yin te/_de'i phyir
[\[346b.5\]]snying rjes btsas pa la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ko ga la mnga'/_thugs rjes mya ngan las 'da' ba'i thugs las bzlog pa'i phyir na/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su 'bab pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i [#]rjes su gzigs pa la yongs su
[\[346b.6\]]mya ngan las 'da' ba mi mnga'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa/_gang gi phyir na mi mkhas dngos dang dngos po med par zhen pa'i blo can gyis/_/skye dang 'jig gnas skabs dang sdug dang mi sdug bral phrad kyis bskyed sdug bsngal dang /_/sdig can 'gro ba thob pa de phyir 'jig rten thugs brtse'i
[\[346b.7\]]yul du rab dong bas/_/bcom ldan thugs rjes khyod thugs zhi las bzlog pas khyod la mya ngan 'da' mi mnga'/_/de la gang gi phyir mi mkhas pa dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i blo can las dang 'bras bu la yid ches pa yod pas [#]lha dang mi dag tu skye ba yod par lta ba pas ni skye ba [# ]
[\[347a\]]
[\[347a.1\]]dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal nges par thob cing /_yul sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang yul mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal yang myong bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos po med par mngon par zhen pa'i blo can log par lta ba dang ldan pas ni sdig to can gyi 'gro ba
[\[347a.2\]]dmyal ba la sogs pa dag dang /_gong du bshad pa'i sdug bsngal yang 'thob pa de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje ni skye bo sdug bsngal ba la dmigs nas thugs mya ngan 'das pa las bzlog ste gnas so/_/lugs 'di dge slong zla grags kyis/_/dbu ma'i
[\[347a.3\]]bstan bcos las btus [#]nas/_/lung ji bzhin dang man ngag ni/_/ji lta ba bzhin brjod pa yin/_/'di las gzhan na chos 'di ni/_/ji ltar med pa de bzhin du/_/'dir 'byung lugs kyang gzhan na ni/_/med ces mkhas rnams nges par mdzod/_/ji ltar dbu ma'i bstan bcos ma
[\[347a.4\]]gtogs par bstan bcos gzhan las stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos 'di phyin ci ma log par mi brjod pa de bzhin du/_kho bo cag gis 'dir lugs gang zhig brgal lan dang bcas par bsnyad pa'i lugs 'di nas 'byung ba de yang stong pa nyid kyi chos ltar bstan bcos gzhan na med
[\[347a.5\]]do zhes mkhas pa rnams kyis nges par mdzad du gsol lo/_/de'i phyir kha cig gis mdo sde pa rnams kyi [#]lugs gang zhig don dam par smras pa de nyid dbu ma pa rnams kyis kun rdzob tu 'dod do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni dbu ma'i bstan bcos kyi don gyi de kho na nyid mngon par mi shes pa kho
[\[347a.6\]]nas smras pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o/_/yang gang dag bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyis gang don dam par smras pa de dbu ma pa rnams kyis kun rdzob tu yin no snyam du sems pa de dag gis kyang bstan bcos kyi don gyi [#]de nyid yongs su ma shes pa de [#]kho na ste/_'di ltar 'jig rten las 'das
[\[347a.7\]]pa'i chos ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dang chos mtshungs par mi rigs pa'i phyir te/_lugs 'di ni thun mong ma yin no zhes mkhas pa rnams kyis nges par bya'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir slob dpon gyi thugs dgongs mi shes shing don gyi de kho na nyid nges par zin pa med par yi ge tsam nges pas 'jigs par
[\[347b\]]
[\[347b.1\]]'gyur ba rnams kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'di yongs su spangs pas de'i phyir bstan bcos kyi don gyi de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log par bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_dbu ma'i bstan bcos la 'jug pa 'di sbyar ba yin no zhes bshad pa/_klu sgrub blo mtsho shin tu rgya che'i kha dog gis
[\[347b.2\]]'jigs pas/_/skye bos lugs bzangs [#]gang dag rgyang ring spangs pas de yi tshig_/le'ur byas pa'i kha 'bus ku mu ta kha bye ba'i chus/_/da lta zla ba grags pa re rnams rab tu skong bar byed/_/gal te gnas brtan dbyig gnyen dang /_phyogs kyi glang po dang /_chos skyong la sogs pa
[\[347b.3\]]bstan bcos rnams kyi mdzad pa po byon zin par gyur pa de dag gis kyang yi ge tsam thos pas 'jigs te/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don phyin ci ma log par ston pa [#]'di yongs su spangs sam zhe na/_de skad du smra'o/_/yang 'di ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na/_bshad par bya ste/_de nyid
[\[347b.4\]]bshad zin zab mo 'jigs rung 'di ni sngon goms nyid las skye bo yis/_/nges par rtogs 'byung [#]'di ni gsan rgya che yang gzhan gyis thugs su chud mi 'gyur/_/de phyir tshul lugs rang blos sbyar ba de dag mthong nas bdag tu brjod pa yi/_/gzhung lugs rnams ltar gzhan lugs
[\[347b.5\]]bzhed gzhung 'di las gzhan la dga' blo dor bar bya/_/ji ltar mu stegs can sngon sems kyi rgyud la stong pa nyid la lhag par mos pa'i bag chags ma bzhag pa rnams kyi [#]khams gsum po 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs shing grub pa'i mtha'
[\[347b.6\]]gzhan nye bar sbyor nus par mthong du zin kyang thub pa'i dbang po'i don dam pa nye bar ston pa la lhag par mos par mi nus pa de bzhin du/_de dag gis kyang mang du gsan pa rnam pa de lta bu mngar zin kyang stong pa nyid la lhag par mos pa'i sa bon dang bral bas stong pa nyid thugs su chud
[\[347b.7\]]par mi spyod [#]do zhes bya bar shes par bya'o/_/'di ltar deng sang nyid na'ang tshe rabs gzhan du stong pa nyid la lhag par mos pa'i bag chags gzhag pa kha cig gis rgyu'i stobs kho na las stong pa nyid kyi gting rtogs par snang la rgyu'i stobs kho na las mu stegs kyi gzhung lugs rnams la [# ]
[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]'di bden par mthong ba rnam par nyams pa rnams kyis kyang stong pa nyid kyi gting dpogs par mthong ngo /_/de'i phyir dbu ma'i gzhung lugs las/_gzhan pa'i gzhung la tshul lugs rang gi blos sbyar ba de dag bltas nas kyang bdag gsal bar byed pa'i gzhung
[\[348a.2\]]lugs rnams la bya ba ltar dga' ba'i blo gros dor bar bya ste/_lugs gzhan po rang gi blos sbyar ba la ya mtshan par rtogs par mi bya'i/_rang gi stong pa nyid kyi lta ba la lhag par mos pa kho na la ya mtshan rtogs [#]par bya'o/_/[#]slob dpon klu sgrub lugs bzangs [#]bsnyad las
[\[348a.3\]]bdag gi [#]bsod nams phyogs kyi mthar/_/khyab cing yid mkha' nyon mongs kyis sngon [#]ston ka'i rgyu skar ltar dkar ba'am/_/sems kyi sbrul la gdengs ka'i nor bu dang 'dra gang zhig thob pa des/_/'jig rten ma lus de nyid rtogs nas myur du bde gshegs sar bgrod
[\[348a.4\]]shog_/[#]dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bshad pa zab pa dang rgya che ba'i tshul gsal bar byed pa/_slob dpon zla ba'i [#]grags pa theg pa mchog la thugs gzhol ba/_mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang [#]thugs rje mnga' ba/_ri mor bris pa'i ba drus ma las 'o ma bzhos pas
[\[348a.5\]]bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba rdzogs so//_//khungs rnams phal cher mdo bzhin bris/_/phyin chad skad gnyis 'byung [#]srid na/_/rtsa 'grel sgra don bzhin bsgyur la/_/gzu [#]bor byos la dpyad par gyis/_/kha che'i yul
[\[348a.6\]]gyi grong khyer dpe med kyi dbus rin chen sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang du/_kha che'i rgyal po dpal 'phags pa lha'i sku ring la/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ti la ka ka la sha [#]dang /_bod kyi lo tsA [#]ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dang mthun pa ltar bsgyur/_
[\[348a.7\]]phyis ra sa ra mo cher rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang /_bod kyi lo tsA [#]ba de nyid kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs pa'i dpe dang gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//_//gzhung 'di'i tshad ni bam po bcu gcig dang bam po sum gnyis so[#]//_//[# ]
[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]{D3863}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma d+h+ya mi ka a [#]ba tA ra pradz+nyA nA ma/_bod skad du/_dbu ma shes rab la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbu ma shes rab la 'jug pa'i don ni bdag
[\[348b.2\]]gis bshad par [#]bya ste/_dgag bsgrub [#]gnyis ka dgag 'ba' zhig_/dngos la dgag sgrub gang [#]yang med/_/de lta bu ni goms byas na/_/phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur/_/mi dge bcu ni spangs nas ni/_/dge ba bcu ni dang du
[\[348b.3\]]blang [#]/_/dngos por zhen pa bkag nas ni/_/rang la bsgrub [#]tu cung zad med/_/slong [#]ba'i dngos po 'di yang ni/_/yang dag pa yi rang bzhin med/_/du ma dang ni gcig bral phyir/_/sgyu ma'i glang po ji bzhin no/_/cha shas sna tshogs
[\[348b.4\]]gnas pa na/_/rdul phran gcig pu nyid ma yin/_/de nyid med pas du ma gang /_/phan tshun spangs te gnas pas [#]na/_/gzhan gyi dngos po ga la yod/_/de nyid med pas de bsags pa'i/_/rags pa'i gzugs dang rdzas sogs gang /_/
[\[348b.5\]]rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba dang /_/shes pa tha ni mi dad pas/_/shes pa du ma nyid du 'gyur/_/rnam pa brdzun [#]pa nyid kyis na/_/shes pa de yang brdzun [#]par 'gyur/_/de lta min na bden nyid 'gyur/_/de nyid phyir na sems byung [#]gang /_/gcig dang du
[\[348b.6\]]ma spangs pa yi/_/dngos po gang yang mi gnas te/_/phan tshun spangs te gnas phyir ro/_/mngon sum la sogs 'gal zhe na/_/ma yin ma brtags nyams dga' ba/_/de ni bdag gis bkag pa med/_/tha snyad tsam zhig bsgrub [#]pa'i phyir/_/
[\[348b.7\]]dam bca' gtan tshigs nyid ma yin/_/ye nas skye med rang nyid [#]la/_/dgag bya med la bsgrub [#]bya med/_/mya ngan 'das dang ma 'das pa/_/skye med ngang du khyad par med/_/skye med nyid kyang ma yin te/_/skye ba'i dngos po med phyir ro/_/kun rdzob med la
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]don dam med/_/sangs rgyas med la sems can med/_/lta ba med cing sgom pa med/_/'bras bu med cing spyod pa med/_/de yi don ni bsgom bya ste/_/rtog med blo ni rang zhir gzhag_/ngos gzung med cing yengs pa [# ]
[\[349a.2\]]med/_/mtshan ma med cing gsal bar bsgom[#]/_/langs la dngos por snang ba kun/_/sgyu ma tsam du shes byas nas/_/sdom pa rnam gsum 'bad pas bsrung /_/yan lag bdun pa la sogs bya/_/snying rje [#]phan sems che bar bya/_/yul la
[\[349a.3\]]chags pa spang bya zhing /_/'gron po'i tshul gyis gnas par bya/_/sems can ma dad spangs nas ni/_/bdag nyid dgon par gnas par bya/_/de yi 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi[#]/_/'bras bu chen po thob pa ste/_/chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs/_/
[\[349a.4\]]sprul pa'i sku ru gnas pa yis/_/sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed/_/de phyir 'bad pa [#]thams cad kyis/_/dngos [#]po lta ba [#]thag bcad de/_/bar du sgom [#]pas nyams su blang /_/tha mar 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_/de bas 'bad de brtson par
[\[349a.5\]]bya/_/de ltar bdag gis bshad 'di la/_/phyogs 'dzin pa yi sems bor la/_/rigs pa yis ni dpyad par bya/_/chos la skur pa gdab mi bya/_/g.yeng ba thams cad spangs nas ni/_/bsgrub pa la ni [#]brtson par bya/_/bdag gis 'di byas bsod
[\[349a.6\]]nams kyis/_/sems can thams cad grol gyur cig_/dbu ma shes rab la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//[#]paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo ts+tsha ba 'gos khug pa [#]lha btsas kyis bsgyur pa'o//_//_
